column1: Bunny Rabbit. Kate was going to go to a party. Her boyfriend told her he thought bunny rabbits were cute. Kate did not want to disappoint him, though. Kate decided to hide her rabbit for once. Kate got so scared, she almost laughed at herself.

Good Terms. The company advertised for deals online and in person. As of late January, it had closed. I contacted a local salesman to get a quote. He showed up and agreed with my offer. We were able to put our money together to buy the company in the next month.

What And Itch. Anna was taking a hot bath. She smelled something weird. She looked in the sink but couldn't find the bottle! She looked everywhere but couldn't find it. Anna's mom tried to call Anna but it was out of the window.

Empty Club. John had a club in town that only had a few good dancers. So he had to call in sick for work. When he finally arrived, the club was closed. But a few friends had offered him dancing lessons. John was able to dance at the club.
Wrestling. Ricky was at the park one afternoon. And he wanted to try wrestling. He asked his brother about it. His brother told him he wasn't sure. So Ricky was very happy to try it.

Magical Fruit. Bob wanted to make homemade fruit pie. He decided to make lemon fruit pies with some strawberries. Bob pie was tasty and everyone loved the fruit. After the pie was finished he put it in a jar. Everyone ate the whole pie afterwards.

Schedule. John was late for work one morning. John got in his car and began to drive to work. John forgot to put the schedule in place. He began to get upset because it was late. John decided to change it so he wouldn't get late.
Candy in the dirt. Ralph had a lot of candy in his pocket. He was tempted to get rid of it. He went to the store and found a jar. He made a peanut butter bar from it. Afterwards, he ate the bars.

Robins cruel exit. Alicia was sitting on a bench when she heard a loud crash. Alicia quickly backed up to avoid being caught in the storm. She walked past the storm drain and looked outside. She found her house shaking from the storm. Alicia was disappointed she'd lost her house, but she was glad she could have gotten it over with.

Good Fences. One of the streets on the new side of town was very crowded. A homeless man approached me with a flashlight. He asked me what I am doing. I explained I am a man that is afraid of needles. The man gave me a dollar.

Carnival Games. A carnival was a favorite of our daughter's friends. We spent all summer playing carnival games. My daughter's favorite carnival was the rodeo. We put on all the games and went home. We were very disappointed in her decision.
New Neighbors. There were two new neighbors in the neighborhood. My friend was visiting. My neighbor's car had broken down. I didn't know what to do. I told my friend how much I loved them.

The Face Wash. Allie wanted a new makeup brush. She searched online but couldn't find it. She got a coupon and finally got it. Allie looked very happy. When she got home she opened the bottle and took it out.

Bill started a company. Bill started a clothing business. He saw his job was difficult and he had a hard time. He started hiring people at a fast food place. The manager asked Bill to take them to the mall. Bill was able to do the job very well and became the new manager.

Pool. Lacey wanted to find a nice pool. She called a local pool company to make a recommendation. They told her to try one out. Lacey went over the pros and cons of the pool. Lacey decided to try a different pool.

Megan sees a ghost. Megan is hiking in the woods. She is afraid of a ghost. She decides to go with a guide to the area. The guide tells Megan the ghost is a white male. Megan feels guilty and hugs the guide.

Francine Has her Ears Pierced. Francine was out at night in a parking lot and saw a guy wearing a baseball cap. Francine went outside to change the cap. While she was out her ears pierced! She had to go to the hospital. Francine is now in an operating room for the infection.

Penn. Today I saw a Penn statue in my yard. It was for my mom, a nurse. She is my aunt's favorite nurse. I took a picture and posted it on Facebook. Now I have a Facebook friend that keeps a Penn statue.
Flower Shop. Maggie needed to find a flower pot. She found a shop near her home. The shop was near a park. Maggie took some flowers with her to the shop. Maggie bought some flowers for her friends.

Shoes. Lola had a great pair of shoes for school one day. When she went to walk the first step she tripped. Her shoes were soaked with mud so she decided to buy a new pair. The next day she ran into a neighbor who gave her her new shoes. Lola got in the car and went home and got to wearing new shoes.

Spare Change. Cara had to buy some new clothes for the school holiday. She had a lot of extra cash. She decided to split the bill with her friend. But, her friend was able to borrow $50 from the store. Cara had no extra cash to spend on clothes.

Balloon Fight. Bob was walking home from the theater. A man asked Bob where his favorite balloon fight is. Bob was confused and looked around. He could not find it anywhere. Bob then went inside to find it and it was his favorite.

Stripley. Aya woke up late and realized she was having a miscarriage. She immediately started taking a pregnancy test. The results came back negative. The doctor said she had had an abortion. The doctor put a pregnancy test on her.

Milkshake. I bought a milkshake from a grocery store. I took it home and gave it to my mom. Afterward, I made her my favorite snack. I forgot about it for a while. After dinner, I realized I forgot about it!

Vintage toy. Karen wanted to give her grandfather a toy for Christmas. The toy store was closing this week. Her mom told her they didn't have anything. Karen was very disappointed in the decision. She told her mom it was very expensive to get the toy for Christmas.

New Underwear. Sam was washing his laundry at his house. He noticed something floating around in the water. Sam was able to figure out the source of it. Sam put the underwear in his pants. His new underwear was so clean that it fell out of the laundry.

The Psychology of Grades. Sammy had always been good at math. She studied hard every day to be perfect. She would memorize and multiply fractions. When she passed, her teacher called her to a contest. Sammy was in first place in the contest.
New Dog. Jackie went to the pet store to buy a new dog. The new dog was too small for the dog to get. Jackie searched everywhere for the dog. Finally, she found her. She purchased the new dog.

Music Band. Manny had just started playing music as a teenager. He wasn't paying attention to his rhythm and melody and had no rhythm to begin with. Suddenly, he began to play his guitar too fast and it gave him trouble. He wound up breaking his arm in two places. The band members took him to the hospital and he was rushed to the hospital.

The Concert. John had a new gig at the local bar. He wanted to impress everyone with his cool music. He went to get the keys and played the music loud. It wasn't as loud as he thought it would be, though. John was upset that he didn't see his favorite band.

Dinosaurs. Amy liked dinosaurs and was a naturalist. She was researching how dinosaurs are made. She looked up dinosaur bone fossils. Amy found one that was of a large size! Amy took the bones home and loved the creature.

Pickles. Tom had made himself some pickles for breakfast. When he got home he realized he didn't have any pickles. He called his neighbor who helped him. Tom's neighbor gave him a recipe for pickles. Tom now has pickles all year.
Raking Leaves. Jenny was picking leaves on her porch. She had decided she would rake them in the morning. Jenny pulled the leaves out. She picked a bunch of big flowers. Her porch looks lovely.

Dangerous Campfire. John woke up early to check the temperature. It was twenty-two degrees and he was scared to walk outside. His dad walked up behind him and told him to go ahead. John ran down the street and out the door. He heard the roaring of campfire bells and heard sirens!
Bianca Dyes Her Hair. Bianca was so tired of having long hair. She decided to dye her hair blonde. Her favorite color was white. Bianca did it anyway. Her friend thought it was a great idea.

Dancing. I wanted to learn how to dance in a different way. However, I didn't know how to dance at all. I went to the dance center. I learned how to dance without being afraid of dancing. I danced at home and became much better.

Buying a New TV. My son has always wanted a new video game system. We went to a new computer store. My son got an old video game system and purchased it. I think he would love it. Now, my son is playing a new game.

Deaf Kid. Jane was playing basketball with her friends. Suddenly, a boy walked by and snatched her basketball. Jane looked at the boy and his black eye turned red. Jane knew that he was deaf and had to stop playing. Jane was so mad that she had to walk home to tell her parents.

Race. Sue's friend was driving a jeep. One of the jeeps pulled out and stopped. She was trying to pick up a raccoon. She was able to take the raccoon to the vet. Sue had to wait another year before it could leave the vet.

The Puppet Show. Tim was a puppeteer. He'd gotten an extra job. Tim got to perform tricks at parties. Everyone loved him and liked to see his show on TV. He was given a spot on the show for his trick show talent.

New Hobby. Tom was going to have to go to the library in his home town for a book. He was excited to find out if it would be good enough for him. But when it came time to go he didn't find anything! He then realized it was a different type of book. It made him sad, but he was going to do his homework.

No Jumping. Liz was getting ready to start school. She had to jump over a school wall before she got to school. She was really scared because it was only a couple of blocks from school. When she got to school she was really embarrassed. She had to jump right into the wall to get into school.

Comparison. I was watching tv. I started to make an order for food. I went to the store and bought some canned goods. I put the food in the oven for several hours. The food burned within a few minutes of making it.
seafood. John wanted to try sushi at home. John went to the sushi place at his home. John ordered the sushi. After tasting the sushi, John wanted to order more. John went home with the sushi.

Burritos. I ordered some burritos from the local burrito shop. The delivery driver let me pick them up. The burrito I picked tasted so good that I threw a burrito away. The driver said I may have forgotten to pick up the burrito. The cashier paid the burrito back and let me pick it up.
Spinach. I cooked spinach for dinner. My wife and I were very distracted. After a bit, we realized the spinach was mushy. We ate the spinach instead. We were happy that we could relax.

Exercising. Ivy decided she wanted to be more active today. She went to a gym in her hometown. She did very well in the workout class. She started exercising immediately. After the exercise class she felt much better!

New Year's Resolution. Last year I had a New Year's resolution. I felt very bad because I couldn't play videogames. I also wanted to take the time to do something more fulfilling. I decided to work on the next game I wanted to play. I found myself playing video games for the first time since I was a teenager.

John Buys An Umbrella. John notices a strange smell when he walks in the house. He notices that his umbrella is covered in dirt. John buys a vacuum and cleans up the dirt. He finally looks outside to see what it is. He notices that his house is a mess.

Embarrassing Mistake. I took my cat to the vet for a check up. I gave her some medicine and she was okay. However, after some time she started acting weird. It was getting late and I had to bring her home. Luckily the vet gave her some rest.

Greenery. Bella and her husband were getting married. They were going to build a beautiful house. They went to a local park and looked around. They saw a beautiful oak tree. They decided to buy a lot of green grasses.

The Weight Loss Expert. Rihanna decided to lose some weight. She tried to run for a week straight. When she took a shower she noticed that she was missing a few pounds. After the shower she went to the doctor. The doctor diagnosed Rihanna with anorexia.

Library Book. John had a huge collection of newspapers. He was excited to book a copy of a new book at his library. He was having so much fun with his collection. When he finished he checked out several books. He got excited that he'd book the next one.

Low Blood Sugar. Kate has a large cholesterol problem. She tries eating less and taking cholesterol pills. However she does not seem to be doing much. Kate finds out that her cholesterol has decreased. Kate begins to take anti-cholesterol pills.

Broken Nose. Joe had been working in his cubicle. He had a piece of glass in his mouth. He tried to ignore it as much as possible. The next day he had a bad nose bleed. He never went back to work again.

Eternal love. One morning, a stranger greeted me in the front seat of his car. He looked at me very attentively and asked if I had any presents. We sat there for awhile, talking to each other, then drove off. He left the next day and I realized that my gift was a ring. I couldn't believe he gave it to me!
Lost Phone. Tom was at the beach with his dad. They were watching a movie. He lost his phone on the sand. His dad told him it was safe and he was glad. Tom's phone was back in the water.

Eviction. I worked at an agency for 40 years. One day, we were having a hurricane. The agency offered to help if there were a vacant lot. We rented a house and bought an apartment. We were able to live comfortably in our new apartment.

Thunder. The sky started to clear after a long while. The winds started to roll in. They were picking up speed and the sky cleared quickly. The thunderstorm was as strong as lightning. A few hours later the power went out.

Lost poncho. Jenny had been cooking Thanksgiving dinner for 3 weeks. She decided to throw a dinner party. She spent the night playing a few of the best games of her life. All of her friends invited her out to dinner. She made her family dinner at her place.
Swim. It was the final day of swimming lessons. Tina didn't have to take a water park class. She got into the pool. She swam. She got a great grade on her swimsuit.

Sticky. I got home from the store and I looked everywhere. The store was all closed, so I had to go home. I looked around until I saw a large tree branch. I grabbed the branch and walked towards it. It was sticky!
Mother. Tim was working at a grocery store. His mother was very mad. She asked Tim for money but Tim refused. He didn't want to see his mother angry. He decided to get back at her.

ID. Tom had to drive to his favorite bar every day. He used to drive the same car that he always used. He liked to drive it so much that he bought a driver's insurance. Tom is no longer driving his car. He was happy to be able to use the car after his death.

The Inheritance. When John turned 17, he took his wife for a walk. She bought him a lottery ticket to buy a new house. John's wife died in 2004 at age 90. She is now a widow, and she lives in Illinois. John's daughter is in nursing school to teach her how to read.

Mike Drinks White Wine. Mike decides to try drinking some white wine. He realizes he drinks too much and burns out quickly. Mike decides to call in sick. Mike is admitted to the hospital and prescribed medication. Mike feels better and is able to have his health improve.

Broken Bike. I bought a new bicycle at an auto parts store. I looked through my inventory and found a good bicycle. I was happy with the quality of the bike. I took it home and drove to the mechanic. It was repaired and I was very happy.

The Blind Date. Kelly had a blind date with a man. Kelly was nervous and didn't know what to say. When they came out the man kissed her on the lips. Kelly wanted to kiss him. The man broke the kiss and Kelly felt really happy.

The Stormy Day. There was a hurricane predicted for the morning. Bob woke up early to go to school. He went to the front door to take a shower. When he came back home, his dog was gone. Bob had to find a new job that would pay more attention to him.

White Cast Christmas. Maggie was celebrating her 10th birthday. She bought gifts for her son. Her son was so happy to receive the presents. Her daughter felt proud of the gifts. She hoped she didn't lose the gift.
The volleyball accident. Seth was playing basketball. His friend Tami was throwing the ball. Tami's brother caught it. The ball went into Seth's hands. Tami was so upset.

Turtle Fears. My wife has been having a lot of problems with turtles. She has never been afraid of turtles. Her children are very protective of turtles. She knows her husband likes turtles. My husband has decided to leave turtles alone.
Shoelaces. Jane had a big project due today. She needed to polish her shoes. She got all the items together. She spent the day polishing. When the polish dried Jane smiled.

Easy mac disappointment. Allie was going to bake cookies. She got everything ready when the doorbell rang. She had to give her mother a hug. She thanked her mom and went in. When she opened the door it was her mom's birthday!

Puppy Litter. Maddie decided to take her dog for a walk. Her dog got out of the yard, and she was going to put it in a litter. Maddie took the dog outside and placed it outside. The dog felt a lot better. Maddie got the dog another litter and went for a walk.
Old Friend. Tom had a friend named Brian. They had been together for almost four years. Brian was a mean boy. Tom was no longer friendly. Brian started hurting his friend.

The Easter Parade. One day our children and we went to the parade. We had to go to a party that was sponsored by the county. We had a lot of fun. When we went home, we ate candy and played in the parade. We went home and cheered for our family.

No Littering. The neighbors found a little girl sitting outside. The girl's littering was beginning to get into her home. They set a hose to get some out of her house. The neighbor said no littering was in her house. The neighbor had to clean her house.

Ham Sandwich. I took a ham sandwich out of the oven. When I put it in the oven, it was still burning. I asked my girlfriend for help. She had to call the store to check on me. She fixed it within an hour.

Confession. My sister in law was cheating on her sister's doctor. She asked the doctor if she knew who he was. The doctor denied it. When she called him back, she had a big lie. She admitted she was lying.
Janet. Janet had a new pet. She kept it outside her house. Janet was afraid of birds. Janet decided to check on it. Janet found out the bird was afraid of chickens.

The fishing trip. Kelly decided to go fishing with her friend. The two went to the local lake. Kelly caught a lot of fish. Kelly brought her friend home with a dinner. Kelly loved her dinner at the lake.

Rex Drinks Tea. Rex decides to drink tea every day at work. He decides that his health is important. However, he cannot stop drinking tea. He decides to eat more tea. He is very happy with his health now.

Scared Teddy. Tom was driving to work with his dad. He had a huge test in front of him. His dad warned him not to get lost. Tom decided to stay in his car to do the test. He ended up passing, and Tom never talked to him again.

Power Outage. My electric bill started going up. After a month, I didn't have anything left over. After that, I was stuck at home with a $1 bill. It was nearly impossible to get new electricity. I had to call an electric company to get a new one.
A new hobby. Lucy went to the fair with her friend. She had no idea what to expect. All of the sudden she had an idea. She went outside to play. She really enjoyed it.

Photo. Tom had been watching a documentary on dolphins for several weeks. He had never seen them in person and was worried. He asked friends if they had seen any dolphins. They told him they had! Tom never saw them again.
The Deadline. Tom wanted to get back on the road. Tom wanted to be on the road with friends. Tom felt ready. Tom walked down the street and met someone he liked. Tom became friends.

Wine tasting. Alicia went to a wine tasting. She had been planning on drinking some for awhile. The wine came on the tongue and was not sweet enough. Alicia was so disappointed she called a glass expert. Alicia bought the bottle of wine.

The bed. Sam's mother was having trouble moving her out of the house. She couldn't see the bed on the other side. The only thing that made her mad was the dog in it. She took it away when it bit her. She was very sad to have to go through that again.

The saxophone. The saxophone player made some arrangements for the concert. They played for hours. After the concert, they began to get hungry. The waiter was angry. The singer gave his waitress a sandwich.

The Farm. John was a farmhand. He spent the day looking for a good spot for his farm. The only thing that got him thinking about it was the cows. He went to a farmer who gave him his own field. John made a lot of money and enjoyed it.

Outside the Window. I was hanging out with friends one night. As I was doing a big push, a dog ran out. She wasn't moving. I saw her sitting in the front yard with her paws on the fence. She was afraid to walk home.

Making it gluten free. Gina made a pan of pasta for the kids. But she was hungry so she asked the cook to take her food. But as she was making the pasta she dropped it. And she felt bad because she was out of pasta. But Gina was proud of herself and decided to eat healthier food.

The plane trip. Alicia was taking a plane to her parents country of Japan. Her parents had just arrived and the plane started to make an odd noise. It was the plane hitting the sea. Luckily, the engine stopped. Alicia decided not to go back to Japan since they were safe.

Jen's Game. Jen had been training for the next 5 years to play the video game. She wanted to impress her manager. She bought a new video game to play. When Jen started, the manager thought Jen was very fit. Jen finally accepted and made the team.

More Alone. My mom and I decided to start dating each other. It was fun. It started with us trying out for the lovebirds. We spent time and money trying out for ourselves. We have been married a few weeks now.

Theme park excitement. Tom's favorite holiday is the theme park. Tom decided to go to the theme park. He spent many hours on rides. He enjoyed himself on a lot of rides. Tom was a big fan of the theme park.

Futsal. Mary was at her grandmother's funeral. She had been married to a man for 6 months. Mary thought her grandmother loved her husband. Mary wished she had taken up the argument. Mary said she was tired of being so outspoken.

Bluebirds. Amy wanted to feed a bluebird. She made a bird feeder to be in the backyard. She then put the bird feeder in the water. When she was done, she sprayed the bird feeder with a garden hose. The bird was grateful.

The Trip. I was going to visit my friend in NH. So I got on the airplane. I arrived at NH and boarded the plane. The first thing I noticed was a man walking down the aisle. I sat and watched him for a long time.

Carnival Ride. My sister and I went to a carnival. We walked around the boardwalk and sat down to ride the ferris wheel. The ride was fun but I was sick of the ferris wheel. I had to do another ride in the park. It was great because the ride is an animal park.

Lost Throughout the Process. Mike woke up one morning and decided he couldn't find his wallet. He tried calling the bank, but no one answered. Mike called the cashier and was told to call her. When he arrived she was able to return the wallet. Mike was relieved to have found his wallet.

The Murderer. When I was seven, I saw a horrible man. A very ugly man was walking around the street with a large stick. I walked toward him, then saw that he had killed a family. I walked past, then stopped at a neighbor's house. The killer got out, and got into a car with the murderer.

Home Run. Jim was a great baseball player. One day while practicing for his baseball game he saw a sign for the home team. Jim was excited to see his team compete for the team title. Jim hit a homerun and the team won by one run! Jim is so proud of his home run that he is going to go back next year.

Greg Visits the Zoo. Greg wants to visit the zoo but he needs to buy a ticket. He calls the zoo and asks why he can't get a ticket. He finds out that the zoo is closed until he arrives. Greg feels sad that he doesn't have money to buy a ticket. Greg decides to visit the zoo instead of driving.

New Shoes. Bob was a young man in need of new shoes. He was very proud to have saved money. When he went to the store he tried on some shoes. When he went home he noticed they were not very nice. Bob looked everywhere for his new shoes.

Cole. Cole is always looking for a girl for a girl. He is always tired of the same girl. The one who finally makes him date her is his. Cole is so happy to have finally met a girl. He is so happy he is finally able to ask for a girl.

Shirley Temple Doll. Shirley wanted to get a Shirley doll for her son's birthday. Her son told her he could not find one. Shirley took his son to the pet store to find a Shirley doll. After looking, Shirley found one that she liked. Shirley named the doll The Shirley and gave it to her son.

Patty's Sleepover. Patty was going to her friend's sleepover for dinner. She knew the food would be delicious and she had to take a nap. Patty didn't want to wake her friend up too early. The food was ready by the time Patty got there. She went home and ate and had a great time at the sleepover.
New Shears. Kim was going to the store. It was her first time wearing her new clothes. She bought some new heels. They fit perfectly. Kim loved them.

As I Sit Here. Miles was playing basketball at a game. He was very nervous because he had practiced all season. He started to hurt his ankle. The pain got worse the more he played. Miles ended up missing a game and missing his friend.

Going to School. Jane wanted to become a better teacher. She started taking classes at the local community center. Jane also went to the community center to learn about the state. She was very excited to learn about life after college. After three years, Jane has an excellent teaching career.
Hit. Dan was walking home. He saw a dog. Dan's dog had an itch. Dan took the dog home. It was covered in fleas.

The dog. Anna went to the store and bought a puppy. The puppy was named Jake. Anna bought the puppy to keep him company. Jake took Jake outside and he was lonely. Anna decided to adopt Jake from the shelter.

Fears. I went to the doctor to see if my friend's house was okay. After a thorough physical examination, the doctor said my friend was fine. Since I'm not allowed to have an appointment, I called my friend to call me. He agreed to go with me. We decided to meet up and have lunch after.

Driver. Beth was driving down the road. Suddenly she noticed a car in front. Beth took her to the police station. The police told her that her vehicle was stolen. Beth was relieved because she didn't have to worry about driving.

Man's best friend. Jake's best friend Jake was very depressed. He felt bad, but didn't want to talk. Jake decided to have a good friend, and helped him feel better. Jake had his best friend take him to the doctor. Jake felt better, and felt very much better.

The First Birthday. Aya wanted to surprise her father at a new birthday. Her dad had invited her to his house for him to surprise her. Aya knew her parents were going to miss her. Her father was very happy and she didn't cry. Aya and her dad got into a conversation about the new birthday.
The fair. We went to the fair with my brother. We watched a bunch of different types of activities. The first was a bunch of rides. We had to ride a carousel. It was really fun!
The Bison. There were no bison left in the park. They were being kept as pets at the park. My friend Joe fed the bison. He got an idea. He bought a bison from the pet store.

A Good Samaritan. I was looking through my son's backpack. He was holding the suitcase on the floor. I tried to reach him but he was already dead. I looked around and he was lying on the floor. I ended up hitting him and he died immediately.

Pictures. My wife's baby niece is only 2 months old. Her mother asked me to take her picture last night. I took the baby. Her mom came to pick the baby up. When the baby was picked, she smiled and smiled.

Appendicitis. Mary was pregnant and was in labor. The baby was very small and did not want to reach its belly. Mary realized that the baby would need an outlet in case it got sick. Mary went into labor and got an ultrasound. Mary was relieved and went to work to remove the umbilical cord.

Money. Gina wanted a new car but was afraid to pay her rent. But then she remembered she saved up the money and bought her one. She finally had enough money! Her parents were very excited and she was excited to go get it. It was great.

Genre Disagreement. Tiffany wanted to sing a piece of French history. She wasn't sure if it would be good or bad. She felt that it wasn't good enough for her. Finally she found a song that sounded good enough. She was happy that the song made her feel better.

For a Five. I went shopping for a gift. When I arrived, I was handed an envelope. It was a five page book about me. I told my parents I would return it. My parents were so angry that they sent me back a refund.
Sardines. I went to the store to buy a few sardines. I didn't know what I wanted to buy. I ended up picking up some bread. I was really sad. I got home and thanked my mom.

Too Curious. I walked across the road today with the traffic light on. I could hear someone laughing. My dad ran out and gave me a big shake. He looked at me confused. I said I'm just a student in an art class.

The School Fight. There once was a little boy named Timmy. Timmy liked to go trick or treating. Timmy would take a bunch of candy and pretend to be a clown. Timmy would then go around playing with other kids. Now Timmy doesn't like to do that.
Video Game. Tim always played video games. He would often turn the game off. Tim always was very frustrated. He started playing more games. Tim lost his old ones.

Milkshakes. When I was in fourth grade my Dad asked me to bring out a few milkshakes for my birthday. I was hesitant to bring them because my Mom wouldn't let me do it. He gave me a big bucket of milk. But he was very nice and I drank the milk. I was happy that I brought out a few milkshakes.

Bad Haircut. Tom was looking for good style hair. He went to a hair salon and asked a girl for advice. Tom was told that she didn't have a good style. After a while Tom cut his hair and found his style. Unfortunately, it made his hair fall out too.

The New Airplane. Kelly wanted to take a plane. Her friends encouraged her to try out. The plane was so cool that it looked cool. She bought a black and black leather model. When it was time to board the plane, the seat was very comfortable.

Bruised Knees. Jim had long brown hair and didn't have long brown eyes. One day, his mom gave him a big brown box for Christmas. It was his big brown box for his birthday. Jim was very upset about this, because he didn't have much money. When his mom gave him the box, it fell apart and he cried.

Heavy Belly. Dan was walking to school one day. He looked in the mirror to see if he had lost his belly. Dan looked in the mirror to see how he felt about it. Dan started crying and then ran home crying. Dan realized it was normal for his belly to grow back.

The STained Glass. I went outside in the rain to look at my windows. My dog's eye caught on something wet on the ground. It was a stain. He was staring at it with his mouth wide open. The stain on the ceiling was too bad.
The pregnancy prank. I was at the hospital for the first time. I was having a baby. I was nervous. My boyfriend started crying. I had to cry because I was crying so much.

Special Treat. I wanted to make my wife dinner. I went to the store and got all her favorite vegetables. I got some chicken strips from the grocery store. I mixed them in the pot. They turned out perfectly.

A Ship Without Direction. Sammy wanted to learn how to sail a ship. He had his parents teach him about it for many years. He learned very quickly that there were ships without direction. He wanted to learn how to sail the same ship twice. Sammy sailed his ship very well in the end.
Bad decision. Jim had a terrible birthday. It was his birthday. Jim couldn't decide what to do. Jim was depressed. Jim felt worse from then on.

Unicorn. A young woman was riding her bike outside. She was walking slowly towards a tree stump. As the woman got close, she saw a raccoon. She chased after it and chased as best as she could. Eventually, she realized it was squirrels, after all.
Egypt. The kids wanted to travel to Egypt. They went to the mall and bought food. They bought a brand new car. They ate their food. They were happy.

Office job. Mary had to go to a local university. There, she saw a lady who seemed really nice. She asked if they had a project they could help her with. Mary's boss told her that she was the lead in her project. Mary felt really happy that she'd gotten this job.

sweet tooth. I was making pancakes. I accidentally dropped a potato and it broke. Since I wasn't prepared, I left it at room temperature. It came back to room temperature. I immediately tried to find another recipe.

abusive. Sam and John were very good friends. John's girlfriend was abusive and Sam became upset. She would berate Sam and John at dinner. Sam's girlfriend called Sam and said she had been in a relationship with John. The two became a little friends again.

umbrella. Anna was in a rush to get ready. She couldn't find the umbrella she was supposed to wear. Then her mother told her she couldn't wear it for a while. Anna could barely walk! Her mother was very happy to help her, even though she couldn't do anything.

Go. Kate and her friend were playing in the park. She was afraid the monkey would bite Kate's finger. Kate and her friend had to get the monkey off of the park. The monkey was stuck in Kate's palm. Kate and her friend could not go back to the park.

Companion Physical. I went to the orthodontist to get the most needed prescription. I was afraid of getting the surgery, which was expensive. I was in the waiting room when a technician came in. The technician made an appointment and then I went home. I'm glad I went home that day!

Cable TV. Sam went online to buy a cable TV. He chose a small television with a low price. After several tries, he was able to get a good deal. After hours and hours of watching shows, he had a great experience. He couldn't wait to watch television again!

Broken collectible. I went to buy an arcade game with my niece. As soon as I got in it, it broke in half. I ran to my car and asked for help. I was scared but luckily it came back within minutes. I was so happy and relieved.

Hooray for vacations. John was about to move out of the city and start a new life. He knew he would be late for his vacation by the end of the year. Incognito Mode. Maurice's computer froze. He didn't know where to turn the volume up. He turned it on but it didn't work. Maurice had to reboot the computer. He had to call a locksmith to get it fixed.

Road Trip. When Sam and Mark were driving to work one day, they noticed a car coming towards them. Mark backed up and called the police. They arrested the man driving the car. The man was caught. Now Sam and Mark have to go buy a new car.

Acting lessons. Tina had always dreamed of working in a professional voiceover industry. She went to school in the US to audition for a local voiceover company. She was nervous but excited to learn about voice over. When she saw them she wanted to join them, so she studied for months. She became an agent for their voiceover company.

Robert formed a band. Robert is a singer and drummer. He has been working very hard in his band. Robert recently signed with another record label. Robert is going to make money. Robert is very happy that he has become a successful singer.

Kim the Waitress. One day Kim was working as a waitress at a coffee shop. She told her coworkers that she loved working as a waitressing. She told them all to look at all their coworkers. Then Kim saw that one of the coworkers was being very nice. Kim began working as a waitress the next day.

Tree. It was a cool fall afternoon. I had just gotten a brand new tree. I sat in the shade all summer. When it was time to cut it, my head got swollen. I went to the doctor and they removed the swelling.

Family History Banquet. Tina's mom was going to a birthday party. Tina hadn't invited anyone else. Tina and her friends played a prank. They had the best birthday party of the year. Tina was embarrassed and couldn't afford to stay out of it.
Washing Hair. Jan was washing her hair. She tried a few things. Her hair looked pretty clean. Then she noticed her hair was stained with soap. She decided to not wash her hair that way.

The Hearing. Amy was a lawyer and was studying for an MA law degree. She was so stressed that she had to leave the exam room early. Her mother told her that she could retake the exam and not to worry. The hearing took place at 10:30 am. Amy was very thankful that she got the exam.

Gap Tooth. Tiffany needed a new gape tooth. She could not see anywhere in the house she needed it. She called her sister in the house. Her sister came over and told her it was too big. Tiffany put the new gape tooth on the back of her head.

Homework Hater. I went to the library to study for my English test. I waited a little while before doing the test. However, my teacher informed me it would take 2 hours to finish. I finished my paper before I could do any homework. Now I am having to wait for another hour for a retake.

Colorado Cold. It was a beautiful day and a brisk walk down the road. Jake decided to take his dog outside to see the sunset. Jake watched the sunset and felt relaxed. The weather got cooler and colder. Jake felt cooler and warm.

Cd. Linda was a big dog owner. She had four large, fluffy white fluffy puppies. One day she got sick of having dogs in her house. She decided to have her dogs keep their own home. Linda's puppies grew quickly, and Linda was very happy.

Chase. The two were driving to a baseball game. Both men were going very fast. They tried to go into the bushes and hit a bush. The car then sped off into the bushes. It eventually got stuck in the bushes and they both laughed.
Molly and Devin. Molly and Devin were best friends. Devin and Molly started dating. Molly decided to go on a date with Devin. Devin and Molly got engaged. Now both Molly and Devin go to dinner.

The New Girl. Sally was a waitress at a famous sushi restaurant. She loved how the customers kept coming. She thought that she would be great at it soon. Unfortunately, she didn't have the money to be a waitress anymore. She started a new job to get her income back.

Missed Alarm. John was having a really bad day. John realized that his alarm went off a mile away. He turned it back on a mile ahead of his time. John then ran to his car. John never missed his first alarm!

The melted colander. Alicia's mother had a huge colander. She asked her mom for it. Her mom gave it to Alicia. She filled it up with hot chocolate. It was so hot, she spilled the melted milk on Alicia's face.

Interrupted. Tom was working hard to do homework. But he had to do more homework in the morning. He called his boss to complain about his work. Tom's boss complained he was interrupting the day. Tom was told to turn off his computer after he complained.

Skating too fast. Nita wanted to learn to skateboard faster. She went to her mom to ask for lessons. When Nita got home, her mom asked her to teach her. Nita learned quickly and easily. She now uses her speed as a goal to practice.

A new PC Mouse. I decided to buy a new computer mouse for my daughter. She is very big and loves to play games. I decided to save some money for a new mouse. The mouse arrived in the mail the next day. I immediately started getting very used to the new mouse.

Squash. I had a squash and a carrot. I threw it into the trash can. I picked up the carrot and threw it back into the trash. I threw it out into the sun. I threw the squash and the carrot into the creek.

Skiing. Jill decided to join the state track team. She was scared to try and go solo but she tried. In the first few days she was great and very confident. She made the team and was very motivated. Jill is really proud of herself.

Spider Jump. I love spiders, so I decided to try a new trick. I went for a jump on my skateboard. I jumped in the air so I could roll down. When I landed, I landed on my foot. Afterwards, I went to my room and got dressed.

Burger To Go. I was hungry. So I decided to order some burgers. I tried the burger for lunch and left. But I didn't get any burgers! I decided to throw it away.

Sharing Bread. My daughter was very excited for Thanksgiving morning. She and her husband have been at the hospital and now we eat. When we got home she got out of bed to her stomach. She ate breakfast and went outside. She was happy and excited for the turkey.

wing sauce. I bought a fancy sauce from the store. I loved it. But I was about to order it. A waiter stopped to help me out. It was too hot to put on the sauce!
The Tiger. The tiger was looking at the lake for food. She had seen her family eating. She decided to feed it anyway. The tiger ran right in. She ate the food and went home.

Vanilla Cake. Toni went to the store for some chocolate. She was excited to try some vanilla cake. Her son and her son were really into vanilla cake. They ate the cake and had a good time. Toni was happy with her purchase.

Lisa. Lisa decided to write a story about the trip to the zoo. She wrote many characters, including a frog. Lisa loved her story, and loved her characters! She made a fun addition to her story, the story about the zoo. Lisa loved her new story!
bank trip. Tom went on a bank trip with his friends. Tom was going to Iceland. Tom wanted to see the biggest banks in the world. Tom decided to go for the tour. Tom had a great time.

Treat. A boy asked Santa Claus to give him a ring for Christmas. The boy told him it would be a huge deal for him. Santa Claus thought for a moment and gave the boy a very small present. The boy was so excited he didn't want to give the gift. The boy was too embarrassed to give the gift.
Bridal shower. Today I got a brand new tub. My mom took me out to the shower. I tried to get in it but couldn't. It was a lot of work. Thankfully it helped.

Poor Lighting. Janice was walking in the park one day. Her son got very sweaty. Janice decided to change the lighting. She changed the bulb for the children. The children enjoyed the new light and continued walking.

Drunk Story. Mary was out of money and didn't have much money. She went to the bar to find a bartender to pay for her drinks. Mary asked if she could use the bathroom next to her friend. The bartender showed her a room with a bathroom. Mary was happy and felt free to use the bathroom again.

Two Years. Ethan had been working for a very long time. He had been unemployed for two years. He had been working for four months. Ethan was finally able to get his check. He thanked the IRS for giving him his benefits.

Bad Visitor. Gina was worried about her friend Tom, who had gotten in a car accident. Gina worried her friends, as she'd only visited Tom three times. She worried Tom's family because of his bad attitude. She was able to convince them to see her. Tom's parents were very thankful.

New kitten. Kelly wanted a new kitten for Christmas. She begged her mom but her mom never said yes. Kelly's mom told her she couldn't pick a new one. Kelly found a kitten in a shelter. The kitten loved Christmas and was adopted.

Too small for playing piano. I decided to take piano lessons. However, I didn't know how to play a scale. So I asked my mother for advice. My mother bought me a scale and gave me practice. Soon I was better than I was at playing piano.

Bad CLothes wash. Rena decided she needed new clothes. She went shopping on a clothing store. The clothes she saw were not what she was looking for. She found a nice looking pair of jeans. Then she bought them back and washed them all.

Sam The Video Game Addict. Sam was the type of person that always liked to play video games. This was because he couldn't find his favorite game on his computer. Sam's friends took him to the store and bought him one. Sam bought it and played it everyday. Sam's friends had a blast playing him.
Pizzeria. The woman sat in the front of the pizzeria looking around. A woman sat behind her. The woman asked for the cash register. The woman asked for the credit card. The woman got the credit card.

The tattoo removal. My wife and I were playing around on the bench in a park. I started to get really annoyed. When I tried to get the tattoo I accidentally cut my finger. I had to get an X-ray for the wound. We decided to wait until it was healed.
Work. I went on a summer job. I decided to do a lot of reading on a hot day. I read everything on the weekends. I did a few more readings on Monday night. I went back to school on Friday.

Dog. Mandy loves dogs, but doesn't get them very often. Last month she found out she had a dog named Jax. She decided to get Jax a dog trainer. Mandy's dog loved Jax. She was happy she got Jax a dog trainer.
Soccer. Tom loved to play soccer. Tom decided to try out for his school's soccer team. Tom joined the team. Tom got a lot of new friends. Tom is now the best soccer player in his school.

Rice Milk. Ida went to the store and bought rice milk. Ida didn't realize it was frozen so she just ordered some. She tasted it a little bit but thought it was okay. It was still too cold. She was very upset about it so she ordered the ice cream anyway.
Party. I was invited to a party last Saturday. I had invited over all my friends. I had a great time. Unfortunately I was sick and not invited anymore. I really wanted to go home.

The Chicken. Tom had just finished cooking dinner. He was sitting outside cooking on his stove. He heard a loud noise. It was the chicken. He grabbed the chicken and rushed out the door to tell his mom.

Karma. It was Christmas Eve and I could not wait. I woke up to find out my son was having trouble sleeping. He had taken his sleeping pills. He decided to stay home from school and play video games. He slept peacefully and went to bed very quickly.

Unwanted apps. Allie wanted to add a new app. But she couldn't get a second copy of it. So she took it out of her purse and threw it on the floor. When she opened it, her son got a virus. So she had to buy it from the store.

Too heavy. Gina had been taking up ballet. She was only in eighth grade. But she felt confident about her ability. Her teacher showed her her a piece she didn't recognize. Gina felt very proud to get it on TV.

A Dog on a Boat?. My wife loves to take our dogs on a boat every summer. Today we are having a family reunion at the park. We went to a shelter to find a dog. We brought him home to my wife and we are all excited. We love our pets and they are very friendly.

Smoke. I was out partying with friends one night. I noticed a weird odor coming from my shoes. I grabbed my dog's jacket and sniffed the smell. After a few minutes, my dog sniffed me and ran away. We realized it was the wind blowing at the time.

The Bodybuilder. Jodi was a bodybuilder. She trained for years, but she had to diet. Jodi decided to work out every day. Jodi was surprised she had so much free time. Jodi was glad she had a new diet!

Malaysia. I lived in South Asia for 5 Year's. My husband had moved in back home when he was a baby. We were moved from Boston to Singapore for the first time in years. I stayed in Singapore for 6 Year's then moved back home. When I came back I realized it was actually Malaysia.

A night at the city. Tom was bored. He took the bus to the city. There, he saw a lot of beautiful places. He could not wait to go home. He stayed up all night.
Work. Tia had a new job. She applied at a retail store for weeks. Soon the job was complete. Tia loved her new job. Tia was able to take the job on time.

change. It was very cold and the heat made me ill. My brother decided to change his temperature. I was sick so I felt sick. He got the food at the store. I didn't feel sick anymore.

Toy shopping. I was looking forward to playing a new game this weekend. The weather was nice. When I got home, it was raining heavily. The game was ruined. It turned out to be a mistake.

My drone. I needed a new drone for my wedding. I searched all over the internet for an expensive drone. I went to the local garage and found the perfect one. I ordered the drone online and took it to the wedding. They sent me the drone and it arrived within minutes.

New friends. The new friends had always been my best friend. The girl who I had known since I was young had recently moved. They met on the way to my first dinner. She was in a different town, but I had her number. We stayed at the restaurant all night.

Susie's favorite Doll. Susie wanted to go outside to play with the doll. The doll was a beautiful pink doll. Susie wanted to go to the store to buy some dolls. She went to the store. She bought all her dolls.
Public Speaking. I applied for the job of public speaking. The interview was about to begin. However, I was nervous. I didn't want to ruin the presentation. I ended up getting an F.

Truss. A couple wanted to try a new Truss. The couple found a pair of cheap one in their local shoe store. They looked around and found what they were looking for. They got a pair of black trusses. The pair they bought looked great.
Brian made the baseball team. Brian wanted to play baseball. Brian did not have baseball experience. Brian practiced every day. Brian learned how to play baseball. Brian made the team.

Lost. John was walking through the park one day. Suddenly, a large gust of wind blew over his shoes. He looked all over for his lost shoe. Finally, he checked on it. It was only his foot and he could not see.

Date Night. Today, Joe is excited to go to a party. It will be his first time at his new home. He is nervous, but he really likes it. On the day of the party, he was nervous about how his hair looks. After he walked around, he was proud of his new hair color.

Labor. The workers were having a lot of work, but they still didn't want to. They worked extra shifts on the weekends, but never worked more than they should. My iphone. I was walking home one day. My iphone was stuck in my pocket. I tried to walk it back but it wouldn't budge. I had to call customer service and ask for another one. Thankfully they were able to fix the issue.

Holding a Parking Spot. It was late at night and no one was parked near me. So I took the bus back and I called my landlord. I told him I was late because I couldn't make it. Contest. The county fair had a contest in the morning. The county fair director gave the names to every winner. The winners were announced at the county fair. It was very exciting to see who could make the most money. It took an hour to enter and it went to a tiebreaker.

Sandy Shoes. Sandy had to buy a new pair of shoes for work. She went into the store and picked out the right size. Sandy went into the store to look at the shoes. Sandy saw that her feet were very different from hers. Sandy was very upset that she couldn't find the right size.

Dragon. Tom was on a long hike in the desert with his family. He went over a giant rock in the middle of the hike. It was a giant dragon. Tom loved it and kept looking for more. Tom never found the dragon again.

Song. The band performed their new song. It was called The Last Letter. Tom was very nervous for his reaction. He sat with the band and watched it. He felt a big tug when the band was singing.

Fishing. I decided to go fishing. I was excited about it. The fishing line was about 2 feet long. I decided to get a long pole and hook. The line was perfect.

Dent. I went to visit my family in NH on vacation. As I was there, I decided to take a walk. I ended up going on a roller coaster. I felt the heat on my arm and began to cry. The nurse told me to get some medicine.

Translating. Kate's first project was to transcribe an original song. She knew she had to make the best song and had been trying to. She was very frustrated when she couldn't get to her song. She tried to transcribe, but couldn't. Finally she decided to make a better song.

Making a New Friend. John felt like he was in the middle of something. He decided to meet a new girl to hang out. John met with her and became closer. John also learned she's his mom's boyfriend. John was happy he met his new friend.

Exterminator. I was supposed to get an abortion in India. My doctors told me it was a terrible idea. But I went and got a stay of death in India. I learned to pray for the best in India. I'm still sad but proud of the abortion I did.

Procrastinator. Alyssa had recently finished her paper due to a math assignment. But she was too tired to complete the paper. She went to the library to borrow a pencil. She studied hard for the rest of the night. Alyssa was able to complete her paper on time and grade it!

Bloody Nose. Tom was at the bar with his girlfriend. They were drinking a little too much, but she did not mind. Tom tried to stop by, but her nose became infected. He took a laxative. The infection was removed and Tom felt better the next day.

Jewish. I recently met a Jewish girl at a coffee shop. We had a lot in common. After dinner, she said she was sorry. She said her boyfriend had not called her since he forgot his wallet. I was happy, but upset.

Volunteer. I love volunteering at the local soup kitchen. I volunteer with local school to help students. I also volunteer for a local homeless shelter. I like it so much, I just don't know why I can't volunteer. I am very happy with all the help I get from my volunteers.
Sugar. Sam was having a bad day. He didn't feel good. So he went to the store to buy some sugar. But when he got home, he was disappointed. His mom had made him some sugar!

My dad is crazy. My mother told me that she wanted to move into a small town. I thought that was a bad idea. I thought of the worst idea. I decided to do it alone. I did it alone and the townspeople were kind.

The Heart Attack. I was driving down the road when I heard a loud pop. I looked into the engine as it went off. It was the sound of a baby crying in a pool. I knew I must have hit my wife on the shoulder because I was hit hard. My wife had to get help and thankfully she is fine.

Hide n Seek Game. Jasmine didn't like to hide in bushes. So she always hid under her dad's car. One day she tried to run from his car. Jasmine hid under her father's car. The car hit another tree.

Larry Loses His Sunglasses. Larry had an old pair of sunglasses. The ones that he had been wearing were now gone. Larry's brother bought him new ones. Larry felt very sad because he had lost his sunglasses. Larry wished he had kept them.
Relationships. Bill wanted to have children. He was very sad. He decided to start dating. He did everything he could to make it work. Bill had a great life.

Becky's New Dad. Becky's first day at school was bittersweet. She had missed her dad by a month. She told all her teachers she was no longer feeling well. However her teacher told Becky that she was no longer sick. Becky smiled and was happy that she hadn't missed her dad.

Bad coffee. I was making breakfast this morning. I was trying to get it out of my coffee bowl. All of a sudden it got stuck in my cupboard. I had to go to the store to buy another bowl. It was bad but I didn't have to worry about it.

Racing Competition. Joe trained hard for his 100m dash. He took a training session and worked his abs every day. In the morning he made sure to stay in shape. When he got into the race he looked very fast. Joe finished his race and had a lot of fun.
Birthday. Timmy was expecting a new baby. He had never conceived before and was nervous. But his parents came to pick him up for his birthday. They showed him the new baby! Timmy was very happy.

Old House. There once was a house in the city called Old House. In 1975 it was worth a little over $1 million, a lot for the local area. The old house got demolished in 1982. The community lost a lot of money due to the sale. The neighborhood now has a large pool that is much less popular.

Suspended!. My mom's new puppy was very playful. He did not like playing on the couch. Last night my mom put on her new puppy bed. She tried to play with her puppy on the couch. She got into a huge fight.
Smoker. Tim was looking for a new job. His friend convinced him to buy a cigarette. Tim was shocked. He had a habit of smoking cigarettes. He quit smoking without realizing it.

Smelly Cat. It was a hot summer day, and the neighborhood cats were making noise. Suddenly, I saw a cat running through a window. I chased after the cat, but I didn't see any way of stopping it. The cat looked down at me with a deep breath. I turned around to see the cat lay on its back, covered in mud.

Chicken Soup. Ida loved to cook but hated cooking with her children. She always ended up making some chicken soup. This time she had them pick it and they loved it. The kids loved it so much they bought it for them. It is so good they were able to watch all of the family eat it.

Return to sender. Kia returned to her mother's house for the holidays. She was excited to see her grandma for the holidays. Unfortunately, her grandmother had passed away. Kia was upset to see that her grandma had been so distant. Kia was glad to see her grandma again.

Future Engineer. Lori recently graduated from high school. She has been working for the city for many years now. Lori has been teaching English to her class for two years now. At the last school year she got into a big fight. Lori had to leave the class and go to work for another city.

Growing Plants is Hard. Tom was going to plant a plant in his yard. It was very difficult, but he had to. The plants were hardy and he was not sure how. He bought a bag and watered them for a while. Soon he was all grown in the morning.

New Attitude. Josie was nervous about the big game in her hometown. She wasn't sure she was going to be there. One day she got ready to play. When it was time to enter she didn't have any luck. She was very upset that her nerves caused her nerves.

School Play. My cousin and I went to the elementary school play. We had a large group and we got in the car and started to play. We ended up talking in the car for several hours. As we talked we talked about our favorite subject. After a few minutes, our ears popped open.
Champ. My friend Sam got kicked out of our class. He was not in good shape. The bus driver came in. We were able to talk him into talking to him. He also helped us out.

new boyfriend. Gretchen was in love with her new boyfriend. She was going to the beach but didn't have time. She arrived at the beach and put her clothes in a bun. She went back to the beach. Gretchen and her boyfriend went swimming.

Sydnee's Song. Sydnee loved to sing in school. She always sung in class. One day the teacher asked her if she could come over. Sydnee agreed. She had a great time at school and learned a lot from her classmates.

Bad Joke. When the Jones family decided to eat at a Mexican restaurant, they laughed. They thought it was funny for a long time. One night they noticed a man eating tacos, his face turned beet red. The man thought it was funny, but kept eating. He left without the man saying anything.

Visit. Sally was going on a holiday in the spring. She couldn't figure out where she was going. She realized it was somewhere close to her hometown. She asked her dad for directions. He kindly brought her some water and they went to the beach.

Sleeping Early. Tim was sleeping late one morning. He decided to turn on the thermostat. He waited for the alarm to go off. The thermostat went off and he was not able to wake up. He had to watch Netflix and fall asleep at work.

The Noisemaker. Kia was a great cook. Her mother always reminded her to always take out the garbage. She always did it, but the smell was annoying. She had never been told to do that in her life. But then her mother was born and Kia was born healthy!

Banana Peel. Jill wanted to try a banana peel but could not eat it. So she bought a jar of fruit peel from the grocery store. When Jill tasted the peel she got the biggest surprise. The peel was very ripe and juicy! Jill loved her banana peel so much she bought an orange peel for next time.

Pool trip. Jim went to the pool every morning. This morning, he got down to do some exercise. He went into his swimsuit, but it was too small. Jim decided to leave his swimsuit in the bathroom. He had to take it outside, though.

New Kittens!. When my two year old granddaughter came home from the garden, she played a video game. I looked around, but couldn't find her kitten. I grabbed the kitten's leash, and ran. Then I brought her back inside. The little kitten was not there, but I was glad I found her.
Black Friday. I went to a black Friday sale. I purchased a lot of cars. I drove to a few stores and waited. I finally found one that I really liked. I bought it a couple weeks later.

A dog. Gina was taking a walk. And her dog bit her. She ran to the bathroom. But she didn't have any food! So she grabbed a bag of cat food from the kitchen.

Ready Supper. We decided to grill an easy brownie for dinner. We used the same kind of brownie but it was very messy. We started to boil the hot mix. I used the old brownie but the burnt out. We decided to just grab the can of coffee from the refrigerator.

Teased. Tom got a new car. He was afraid of heights. He didn't know how to drive. He talked to his wife. Tom's wife understood.

Paws. I was a pet dog, which loved playing with other dogs. It wanted a cage that was large enough to hold all of its toys. I called animal control, and they said they could not keep it. I called the pound to let them know that they had to do it. The pound eventually gave up.

No makeup allowed. My girlfriend's friend recommended makeup for her in a color. She said it wasn't as nice. I told her I wanted blonde, red, green, or blue. She wasn't satisfied. I decided to get another color.

False Alarm. Annie was waiting for the bus. She was sitting in the backseat waiting for her bus. Suddenly she heard a crashing noise in the driver's seat. She turned to see a police car approaching her. She was scared to leave, but thankfully she wasn't.

The Card Collection. When I was a kid I collected cards for a lot of different uses. I started collecting cards in the fall of 1981. We went out of town and got a card catalogue for the local bank. I had the cards shipped to me by UPS in 1981. I collected more than 300 card boxes to that day.

Migraine again!. Ava was nervous about her morning walk. She looked out the window. She was feeling down! She realized that the rain was coming in later. Ava went back to the kitchen and had her own walk.

Snake in the grass. When I was little I walked around my house. I went up to see a snake that lived in the grass. I picked him up and put him in the cage. I took him home and he was fine. I went to the vet for more tests on him.

Too Much of a Wait. Gina's phone got lost. She could barely find it anywhere. But she had to take a long time to get to school. She finally had enough. She had to wait a long time for school to return.

Erin and the dog. Erin wanted to keep a dog as a pet, but her parents were against it. Erin's parents finally conceded to her. Erin tried many things but couldn't keep the dog. When her parents finally conceded, Erin cried all the way to school. She was so happy to finally have a dog of her own.

Statistics. We bought a new car a year ago. We were excited about the new one but didn't think it was very expensive. On our way to work we got a flat tire. We couldn't find a mechanic so we had to drive out a bit. When we got there they said we got to keep track of how much we paid.

Comeback. I had a hard time with my friends. I realized my friend was a huge fan of my school sports team. So I called up his parents to come pick him up. They arrived at the school the next day and we sat down to watch the game. I learned a lot from him.
Tadpoles. The family went on a trip to a pond. The fish moved around the water. There were too many fish to eat. The kids played around for a while. They had a great time.

Space Heater. Kara and her husband wanted to move to the city to build a house. So they went to a space heater store. They chose a small room and got one in the store. They spent an hour heating up their room. After a long day of work, they were ready to move.

Perfect polish. Sandra had a friend with brown hair. She asked her friend to get her hair polished. Her friend got her red hair and they loved it. She got a second job and decided to do it herself. Her friend and her friend both ended up loving it.

Free Food. Carson didn't think he was getting enough food for himself. So he decided to cut down on food and buy a grocery list. He also signed up for a meal program. Carson's food helped him feel better and felt much better. Carson is now a millionaire.

Reader. John's teacher was giving his students a class on the topic of reading. John didn't want to give his students too much trouble, so he would give them a chance. He did this for three days straight. John's students didn't get much trouble in the class. John got a B on the next question!

Roadtrip. We went on a roadtrip. It was a long one. I had to wait a while and we got in some problems. It took me an hour. I got home with no problem.

Awkward Shave. Jim loved to shave. He would do it every single day. One day, he got very uncomfortable. When he came back, he noticed he had shaved. Jim apologized to his wife.

Runaway Dog. Jake had a very loose dog named Spot. Jake and Spot got into a big fight. Jake ended up throwing the dog in the toilet. Jake and Spot got in a big fight and the dog went to his yard. Jake's dad gave him a litter of puppies to keep Spot.

Cold Shower. Today was very hot with a very little breeze. I decided to get a hot shower. I went to the shower. I took off my clothes. After the shower it was much cooler.

Searched. I was trying to buy a new pair of shoes. I couldn't find any on sale. I finally looked everywhere and finally found the one I needed. I went to the store and picked it up. It arrived on sale for $15.

Pool closing. I went to a friend's pool to get the best ice cream. When we got there, we saw a long line. I tried to move the table, but it got stuck. I had to wait for an hour until the line was finally close. I'm not sure if I'll go back next time.

Eyesight. I wanted to be an eye doctor. I had to look in a patient's eyes to make them healthy. I looked for eyes that were bright or narrow. I followed the recommended prescription. I got an average grade of 99.

Lifting Weights. Sandy always wanted to lift weights, so she went to the gym. Sandy also went to a gym with a trainer. The trainer helped Sandy lift weights in the gym. Sandy went to the gym every day. Sandy was happy that she was finally going to lift weights.

Jasmine's Ring. Jasmine was celebrating her 40th birthday with her family. They all went to the beach to go for a swim. Jasmine's husband put her in the car and they drove back to the beach. The family made an amazing breakfast. Jasmine's husband made her the perfect ring!

Mistake. I went to the pharmacy when I went in. There were four kinds of medicine to choose from. The first two were expensive and I didn't know what I was getting. Then I went to the first one and it was $100. I was embarrassed and angry.

5 Years. The Smiths went to the store to buy cookies. They were going to bake cookies for Christmas. When they got home, they had enough to make. They realized they forgot to buy the same cookie. They were disappointed.

hostage. John was trying to clean the house. He realized his cat had fleas. John went to the store and bought insect repellent. He put the insect repellent into the cat's food. The cat felt better within two days.

Bad aloe gel. Ethan was in the market for a new pair of aloe gel. He was desperate for cheap aloe gel. But the one he wanted was too expensive for his taste. He decided to go to an antique store and get some. He found it was only a few bucks.

New guitar. Jim loved playing in guitar and wanted to get a guitar. He went to the guitar store and bought a guitar. Jim had a lot of fun playing guitar in the store. Jim loved listening to all the new guitars. Jim was excited to buy a new guitar!

Jay at the concert. Jay had a very small car. But his music video came out. Jay wanted to see a concert. He bought tickets online. Jay got a great view at the concert.

Gun range. The gun range had a meeting at the end of the week. It would be all guns, but we had a lot of guns. We got to the meeting in an empty room. My gun shot through the ceiling, and through the cabinet. I decided to make a copy of the magazine and not leave the meeting.

Stylist. Tom's girlfriend asked him to try out for the school's school club. Tom thought the whole club was lame. After a while, Tom tried out and was accepted. He didn't make any friends and got a bad rap on the first day. He wound up getting fired because he was so lame.

piano lessons. Tom loved playing the clarinet. But his friends were only playing one type. Tom asked them to play the bassoon. They all said they couldn't do it. Tom felt embarrassed for them.

Soccer. Tom played soccer for two years at his high school. Tom was very good, but didn't seem to get the job. Tom was hired as a soccer scout. Tom worked very hard and enjoyed the job. Tom got a call that he had become a professional soccer player!

Breakfast. Cindy was hungry and didn't have any eggs. She tried to make eggs but they didn't taste good. Instead of eating, she decided to cook her chicken and toast. After dinner, she took a nap and then finished eating. Cindy was pleased that she had no eggs.

Pool and ice cream. John needed to make his house special. He bought all the ingredients and got ready. John set up the kitchen and ice cream. John poured some ice cream. His kitchen was great and John had lots of fun.

Nick Goes to England. Nick has always wanted to go to England. He has been saving money for months. The money is not as good as he thought it would be. Nick finally saved up enough for a hotel. He flew there and spent the week there.

Breakfast Noodle. The neighbors came over and gave me breakfast. I tried my best to make breakfast and they were all very nice. However, my brother started to eat a piece of the meat. He made a huge mess in his bowl. I quickly washed his bowl, the mess was ruined.

The list. Joe was eating a large burger at a bar. He was drinking a juice. Joe got very thirsty and went to get a cup of juice. Joe had no clue what to do and drank a small glass of juice. Joe never wanted to go back to that place again.

Desktop Christmas Trees. I love Christmas trees. They are the perfect Christmas decoration. They are great for me because they are small and green. I love trying to decorate them. My tree is becoming very popular.

Trash in the Closet. I put on the bag and walked into the house. There was an open mess in my closet. I picked up a can of laundry detergent. I placed it in the clothes dryer. Now the closet was a mess and a mess.

afloat. Tom was a good cook. He made a good batch of pasta. He used the garlic in place of pasta. The sauce turned out great. Tom was happy to have made pasta again.

Taxi Fight. Yesterday I was at the taxi stand with my friend Tom. They were taking the same route twice the day. Tom asked me to wait for him. I waited a little longer than I should have. Eventually Tom got mad and attacked me.
