Alone away from home. Lulu was looking for a new pet. She decided to walk outside and look for a dog. It took her a while but finally she found the perfect dog. The dog was cute and friendly. Lulu couldn't wait to go home with it.
Figure Skating. Tim had just gotten a new toy. It was a roller skate toy with red stickers. The new toy was going to cost half as much. Tim didn't want to give up. He bought a lot of toys.

Haircut. Amy needed a new haircut. The salon was closing for a week. Amy went to the salon and bought the hair cut she needed. The stylist cut Amy's hair into a new length. Amy was very happy with her new haircut.

Obvious but Truthful. Alyssa was invited to a wedding. She didn't know what she wanted to get to say. She was really confused as to what she wanted. She had a lot of friends and was very confused. Finally, the wedding was in a week and she was happy!

Limitless Embarrassment. Liz was doing her best in class. She was confident that she did not slip up during her presentation. But when she got into the lecture hall the teacher threw it on the ground. Liz immediately became embarrassed. Liz had to spend an entire day with detention.

Food Challenge. Rory was competing in a grocery store. He was trying to get some items in order. However, a man asked for his food. He asked what was in his cart, and he refused. Rory was forced to go to a different store to get his food.

Mountains. Neil was walking in the woods one day. A big black bear approached him and attacked him. He looked around and saw that the bear was not big. He looked closer and saw that it was just a large grizzly bear. Neil immediately called for help.

Unknown Fees. I was late to my son's class. I hadn't seen him in ages. He looked at me with a worried expression. He asked me to pay for snacks. My wife got him a cookie for half the price of the food.

Bird. I had a bird feeder at my apartment in my backyard. The bird would take bites of everything in my kitchen. One day my bird went over a food tray. He was very hungry and bit me. I was so embarrassed I ran outside and got a small piece of pizza.

Candles. Jane's parents were getting very old and needed a little cash. She found an old candle in the attic. It was the only one Jane could find. Jane put the candle in her mother's window and put it on. She was grateful her parents were no longer old.
Figure Skating. Beverly decided to try skateboarding. She was excited to skateboard. She practiced hard everyday. Soon she was ready for the school competition. She was a happy girl!

Restaurant. The Johnson family decided they should try a new restaurant. They drove to a nearby town and visited the restaurant. They bought all the food they wanted and a seat in the service. They spent a nice amount of money to make some pizza. The family loved the food and went back to their favorite restaurant.

Last Minute Decision. Bob had recently had to get his last kidney checked. It was a very bad situation, he was going to miss his school. His mom told him it would be a good decision if he was allowed to leave. Bob decided to leave and go to the nearest library. Bob was relieved when his next check came.

The Quota. Sara was struggling to pay her rent. She made an appointment with the landlord. She was told to pay her rent on time. She was then given a call. The landlord called her to schedule an appointment.

Arrested. Cody was a young man at a bar. He was talking to another guy about a good date. The other guy asked for directions to a gas station. Cody said that they were in a city next to his. They decided to stop at the gas station.
Pixy. Tom was an old guy. He was very lonely. Tom decided to try and find someone to spend time with. He searched Craigslist for a couple. He found a girl who liked him.

Presentation. When I was little, I was allowed to talk to my friends. We did this by signing up for a conference. I didn't have a lot of friends in school. Eventually, I was in a really bad mood. I had to talk to a lot of people at school because of this.

Adoption. Jane wanted to adopt a baby for adoption. She found a shelter with a few adoptions. She met with many parents and loved each person. Jane took the child to a big adoption center. The kids were very happy with their new family.

Sign Language. Maggie was learning to sign. She could not find a sign for her area. She decided to ask her friend for help. She was so happy to learn her area. Now she can use sign language very easily.

Going Fishing. My friend took me fishing this weekend. We had to line up our line and set up our gear. We caught a few salmon, a few trout and a few pike bass. Then we had a good time watching them catch! The salmon were the best we had ever caught!

Parking Spot. My coworker works on a public transit service. I asked him about the spot in the park. He said no, but he had to walk it. So he took me to the park's parking spot. I took photos of him walking in the park.

Burned cookies. Anna had been making cookies for a while. One day, she realized that she had forgotten to add butter. Her cookies ended up burning up the oven. Anna was sad and cried. But later that day, her cookies were perfectly okay.
Risk. Kathy was on a long trip. She decided to drive by the zoo. Suddenly she saw that there was a bear. She screamed and chased it away. Luckily a guard was there to help her.
Front step trout. Timmy was having a birthday party. He wanted to show his friends how to win. His friend, a very handsome man, challenged him. He showed him how to get a front step trout. Timmy won!
Hillary is determined. Hillary is a politician. She wants the country to vote for Hillary. Her election day arrives. She votes for Hillary in the primaries. She wins the presidency.

Purse envy. Tom hated his wife's work-free day. He used his own money to pay for her day at the spa. His wife's day at work was free. He was unhappy with his work-free day. He bought himself a pizza instead.

The Catch. I played baseball with my friend the other night. It was late and I was really nervous. I went out the door and I put on my cleats. I ran for the bases, hit the ball, and scored a run! I was very proud of that.
teacher affair. Gina was about to teach an English class. She wanted to see who could help. She had some friends that needed help. But Gina was nervous about it. She did not have enough time for it.

Cowboy Doll. Tom was doing dishes at a restaurant. It was his turn and there were only 10 kids. He made a mistake and spilled his dish. All of his friends laughed at Tom for being so insensitive. He left the restaurant the next day.
Fish. Tom loved his fish. He thought that it was just a hobby. He kept checking it out. Eventually, his fish died. Tom had to sell it all.

Wet Ending. Sue was cooking spaghetti for dinner. When she was finished she decided to throw the pasta in the pot. She put some boiling water in it. When she went to check on it, she saw it was soaked. It was still wet, but it had to be changed.

Gravy. My sister-in-law's dog has gotten very sick. Her owner is not doing very well and she is having trouble. The family gathered together in the driveway to help. They put her in a sling. She is now back to normal.

Baby. My daughter's 2-year-old niece is in labor. She is being delivered in the morning, and I hope she gets better soon. We were waiting in the hospital for an ultrasound to confirm the baby. When the ultrasound came back, I was very disappointed. I hope the delivery doesn't happen.
The Eyesore. The girls had a big party at school. When the time came for them to eat, they were hungry. They ordered pizza. They got food. The girls ate a pizza.
The Thief. Mike was on a mission. He would steal a lot of people's things. He stole a lot of cash. Mike was sentenced to prison. Mike became a thief.

Walking to school. Drew was excited for his first day of school. He was so nervous. He needed to make sure his teacher didn't mess up. However, after the class, Drew realized that he wasn't wearing a seatbelt. Drew was extremely nervous for his first day.
Jumping. Abe was jumping over a bridge. His team was having a competition. Abe took a large ball. His team scored a goal and they were going home. They lost the first game in a shootout.

New iPad winning. Sophia really wanted a new iPad. She shopped at Apple for weeks. The best sales numbers were announced in the store. Sophia went home and took pictures. She won the biggest number on the show.

The Pizza. Bob was trying to make his girlfriend his new favorite restaurant. He asked her to order pizza but she refused. He decided to try a new brand. It didn't taste good. Bob ended up throwing it away.

Sparklers. There was a girl named Kim who had a pet spaniel. Kim always had a pet dog called Sparklers. They went out to eat some candy and drank. They played sparkling and laughed at the girl who didn't get the spaniel. They ate some chips and soda and had a happy life!

Classic car. Beth loved her classic car and thought it was her favorite. But after many Years of buying it, she knew she would love it. She finally asked her mom for a job as a car repairman. Her mom told her to check out the dealership website to see if she had any options. Beth then drove to the dealership and had her car fixed!
The Game. Tim was playing basketball. He was playing a game. Tim went up to the hoop. Tim hit the ball from three. Tim was able to dunk the ball.

Clara's Algebra. Clara was an algebra teacher in her field. Clara was always asked to tutor for the students. Clara was a very bad Algebra teacher, however, she was able to help. Clara's Algebra class received many wonderful people. Her Algebra teacher was very proud of her and made a huge impact.

Getting Mugged. Nancy was out of a job. She needed to find a new job. She looked online to find what she needed. When she came home she found that she was mugged. Luckily someone showed up to help her.

Cleaning Windows. Susie decided she needed to clean her windows. She went to the store and bought some cleaning supplies. She filled them out and put them in her car. Afterwards, she vacuumed her windows. Susie was glad she had done the chores.

Milk. Tina's family made it a point to buy milk on Easter. Her mom and dad bought the milk at the supermarket. Her sister asked for a box so she could buy it. Tina couldn't decide which was the best gift. She was sad she couldn't buy her milk.

What the Earthquake Made. I woke up to a strong shaking. The tornado headed towards the town and I was scared. However, the power was out and my house was shaking. I decided to just put on a pair of gloves and keep to myself. After I got home from work, I realized I didn't have to worry anymore.

The new friend. Jake was very excited to visit his friend at the park. Jake met his new friend at the park. Jake was excited to see the new friend at the park. Jake's friends were very excited to see Jake. Jake was glad that he had seen his new friend at the park.

Hangover. Jim had a hangover one night. He was afraid he wouldn't sleep any more. When he woke up it was pouring down on Jim. Jim got very tired from his hangover. Jim decided to stay home until he could go back to sleep.

Home. Kate and her boyfriend live far away from her house. Kate loved her house and did not mind spending a day in the house. On the way home she realized the house was very empty. She went to the store to buy a new place to live. The house was far enough from Kate's house to save her money.

High Blood Pressure. John had a high blood pressure. He had to make some coffee in the morning. John went to get it from the coffee shop. His coffee was very weak. John felt really uncomfortable and had to go home.
Yoga. My son wanted to learn a new skill. He bought a set of yoga pants. His mom made him teach the yoga pants in the school. He was amazed at how well it worked. He felt much better after that.

The Dog Race. The big dog entered the house. The little dog ran around on the yard for a bit. The big dog got on his feet and started running. The little dog stopped and began running after the dog. The big dog won a gold medal.

Apple Tree. When I was six I went to get a haircut. My friends asked me to pick apples from the tree. So we started by going to the store to pick apples. I picked a red apple that was my favorite one. I put the red apple in my hair and it looked like a real apple.

Fun Times. A few hours ago I went to lunch with my friends. We ended up playing at a new restaurant we had never seen. We tried a few beers and the service was good. Then we played some golf at a nice golf course. I ended up winning a game.

Food. Tom needed a new kitchen sink. He went to the local grocery store. There were a lot of options. Tom decided on a blue plastic one. He went to the store and bought it.

New Phone. Tom was in the market for a new phone. He finally got the one he wanted. Unfortunately, he didn't have enough money to upgrade. He tried to get the phone anyway. Unfortunately he lost his job.

Animal Instinct. Alicia always wanted to ride a turtle. She begged her parents for it for a while but they refused. Her dad decided to buy her a toy turtle. They both knew they could not afford a turtle for the money. Alicia finally found the toy turtle she was looking for.

Bishop. The school board voted for the Bishop. The board asked the candidate to speak for the whole board. The candidate was not pleased. The board decided to allow the candidate to speak on the board. The Candidate felt satisfied and thanked the board.

Jimmy Races. Jimmy always loved playing sports. He loved his friends. He decided to go for a race to see who could best finish first. Jimmy played for a couple of days until he was able to win. Jimmy's friends congratulated him on his success.

Playing in a Band. I was in my early thirties and I needed to play in a band. I was nervous but didn't have the money to go out and buy one. I listened to some good music and started playing guitar. A friend told me I could do that. I am still nervous but I made it to the gig.

Spaghetti. I decided to make spaghetti for dinner. I started with the spaghetti and added a garlic powder. Then I stirred the pasta into the sauce. I put the pasta back and set it on the table. When I was done, the pasta was burnt.

Tail rider. Joey had just turned 13. He decided to go to the skatepark for a skateboard. He was so excited! He got so much ice on his board! He had so much fun riding his new skateboard!

Becca's Christmas Kitten. Becca decided that she wanted to adopt a kitten. She went to the pet store and looked at all the cute kittens. She selected a kitten she liked. She bought the kitten for her little girl's Christmas. Becca is so happy to have adopted a little kitten.

Robot Fighting. We were playing robot fighting. We decided to go with a friend. I was trying to hit something and it ended up being a good hit. We ran around and had a lot of fun. We then got a ton of free food.

Knitting. Ruth bought a new knitting kit. She was going to be knitting every weekend. She loved having the tools for a long time to use. However, she had trouble keeping her eyes open. So she bought a new set.

Cat eats the Dog Treats. Jill always thought cats were unhealthy. One day she decided to give cats treats. She went to the pet store and bought a box of treats. They are the best cat treats available. Jill felt better and started going to the store again.

Surfing Scare. Sam had recently been bullied at school. He was afraid of heights and dangerous. When he felt safer, he got up and began to surf. The next morning, he felt really scared and scared. Sam tried to swim back and the school took the bad news.

Girl Friend. The little girl had gone to a party at her grandmother's house. She didn't know anyone but asked if she could go alone. She ended up meeting the friends at a coffee shop. They started dating all night. She asked them for their number, and they ended up making a wonderful couple.

Chatty Kathy. Kathy is the girl who lives with two older brothers. Everyday Kathy watches TV while the boys play basketball. Every afternoon Kathy sits by the bench outside their home. Scuffed. Mitch is in a car accident. His car is completely wrecked. He cannot afford to fix his car. Mitch goes to a thrift store to pick up some items. He arrives to find that he lost his wallet at the store.

Slow Internet. Tom got into a bad situation at work. He had an internet issue on his computer. Tom realized that the internet was slow. He called the support desk to see if there was a replacement. After trying everything they gave him a new replacement.
Baseball Slide. Tim was playing with his friends. He made a swing. The batter's eyes started to close. Tim's swing tipped over. His friend laughed and gave him an out.

Lester Jumps Rope. Lester was having a hard time jumping rope. He couldn't go faster than 3,000 feet. He decided to jump in a pond and jump for miles. Lester ended up falling into the pond. He eventually learned to use a chainsaw instead.

Peanut. John wanted to eat some food but didn't know what kind to eat. He searched for the perfect food. He bought some peanuts for his dinner. He decided to eat some at the bar. John was satisfied with his new food.

Angkor Wat. Angkor was a member of the Watcher's family. He watched as the village was surrounded by armed men. One of the men was caught in the act and sentenced to death. Angkor's family was scared of the man. Angkor was eventually found guilty.

Construction Workers. I wanted to work on the new construction work. After I finished my work I asked the workers to leave. The workers said no. They were afraid of getting fired. I had to find a better way to deal with the situation.

Borrowed Money. Bob's credit score was low. He was so frustrated. So Bob borrowed a car and used his credit score to pay for his car. Bob didn't have enough money to pay his car bill. Bob borrowed his car and forgot about the car.
Scuba Diving. Tom went scuba diving. He didn't have a scuba suit. Tom wore a harness. Tom took off his harness. Tom was fine.

Preacher. Benny's teacher asked him to do a lesson on preachers. Benny studied very hard for the lesson. After the lesson, Benny received an A. After the lesson, Benny asked for his name in the paper. Benny is happy he got his name in the paper.

The evil dad. Bob went to church to meet his priest. He didn't really see his father. Bob was really disappointed. Bob prayed he didn't see his father anymore. Bob told him that it's time to move on from religion.

sad news. Jim's school was in the middle of an elementary school storm. They had no umbrella to protect themselves and no other place to go. Jim and his mom went to buy food and water. They were very upset at first, but then they all had some fun. They had a great time on the school bus ride.

College. Jane worked very hard to get into college. She applied for many jobs but none were accepted. Finally she decided to apply for the best university job. She applied in the prestigious University of Illinois. Jane was hired and accepted the job after an impressive school year.

Punishment. Lily went to the store to buy some chips. But then she saw that the cashier wasn't paying attention. Her mother was mad. Lily was too embarrassed to go to the store again. She promised to pay for the food when it was over.

Skip almost drowns. I went swimming one summer afternoon. I didn't want to swim. I decided to go for a jog instead. As I got closer, I started to feel a bit better. Before I knew it, I was at the bottom of the water.

Dog. Amy and James went to the store. They needed a new dog to get rid of their dead dog. The dog was not going to work. Their neighbor brought it into the store. They brought it home and went back and gave it to the dog.

A big hike. Lily and her friends planned an adventure to hike. Lily's friends decided to climb a tall mountain. They climbed the mountain for an hour. They finally came to a summit. They climbed the summit.

Ice Cream Day. I wanted to take a photo for Ice Cream Day. I went to the store and purchased some ice cream. I put on my favorite sweater. It was pink ice cream with strawberry frosting. I had a great day with the ice cream!

I love her too. Allie is from France. I have an amazing aunt who works there. She makes her own clothes and I make hers from scratch. She helps me out a lot, because she is very nice. I am very grateful.

Jeff goes to the lake. Jeff decided to go for a swim at the lake. Jeff and his friends got ready for the swim. Jeff hit his swimsuit on the lake. Jeff was embarrassed that he was wearing his swimsuit. Jeff was embarrassed to do this.

Tara's Hat. Tara was wearing a very fancy hat. She had a huge wedding coming up. Her dress was perfect! She went to a party with her friends to celebrate. Tara was happy to get her hat.
Recycled Cans. Cindy wanted to clean her house. She bought all her reusable cans. She bought fresh canned canned chicken and veggies. Cindy was excited to get the chicken. She was so happy.

Cake. I woke up feeling refreshed. I decided to eat a cookie. As soon as I opened the package it was gone. I immediately looked around and saw a box in my room. I was able to get some candy for my birthday.

Jake Falls Off Ladder. Jake had just been off of the school's water park. As he was taking a deep breath he heard a small rumble. Jake could tell the water park was closed due to a water storm. Jake pulled out his shovel and saw a huge drop. Jake was so scared that he fell off the ladder.

Slide. I went to the beach one day and saw a lot of sea It was a really nice sight. I really wanted to try it. I went to the beach and it was so much fun. I had fun that day and did not regret that trip.

Track and Field Star. It was my fifth trip to the track and field team. I didn't realize it until I got to try out for the track team. I was so nervous I kept getting nervous. My team did a great job. My teammates were proud of me for the effort.

wallet. Kelley went to the grocery store. She bought the correct size and payment. Kelley went back to the store. She purchased the correct size. She received a wallet.

The water on the books. I was reading a book when my brother went to pick me up. I got in a big rush and ran. I had to wait for them to arrive. When they arrived, they said it was the best day ever. The kids got on the boat and I was very happy.

Cookies. Tim wanted to make cookies for a birthday party. Tim was trying to make vanilla cookies but they were too soft. He bought a lot of fruit. He put the fruit in the fridge for a while and took it out. Tim made enough chocolate for everyone.

Stage. Gina had been training to be a lawyer for six months. She was finally about to get ready for school. Her mother sat down in front of the courtroom. She explained her plan for teaching a new lesson. When she was finished her mom was very proud.

Bacteria. John and his wife were fighting over the refrigerator. They argued because John was very messy. John didn't want to be upset because he knew his wife was messy. They took the refrigerator apart. It was very messy.

The Dog. Mandy went outside one day to get a pet. She got a very big, red dog. She named it Brier. It was the fastest dog she'd ever had. Mandy was happy she had made the dog fast.

Choose. I was on my way to work on a project at work. I noticed a man and woman kissing each other. I got on my phone and asked them if they were okay. They agreed to talk about a problem. After that, I talked to them about it and they both got to work on it.

Expired plan. Jane was having trouble getting an overdraft card. She checked her credit score, and found that she was overcharged. She decided to go to the bank. She went through the entire process. She finally got an overdraft card at the bank.

A Milk-Tooth. We got our new puppy, Kitten, from a local pet store last week. Kitten was healthy and seemed to love us. One day, he fell and broke his tooth. We gave him a bath and nursed him to health. Kitten is now a great pet and our new puppy loves him.

Tired. Amber was getting ready for the big test. She had just finished the last one. She hadn't taken a shower in weeks. She went to her bathroom. It was the first time she had ever been in an elevator.

Money for Groceries. Mary had to make $200 on her bills. She made one dollar on a dollar bill. Then she took it to the grocery store. They said they were giving her $200! Mary decided to get a second dollar for her groceries.

The Cave. The cave was beautiful in its beautiful natural beauty. It was made up of beautiful things and fascinating creatures. The man walked around the cave and saw people. He walked along the edge of the cave. He saw people.
Messed up baking. I had a craving for bread. My friend told me I should order one. He came to my house and asked if I'm ready. I said I'm ready. He went to my kitchen to grab bread.

Acting strangely. Lara didn't like school. But at school she always took an initiative. She asked her class teacher if they were busy. She made an effort to take a break. The teacher was impressed and gave her a big hug.

Digs. Amy was shopping for dolls. She was really excited to see the doll she wanted. When she got there the doll was all sold out. She had to wait and found another one. Amy had to wait and then find another one.

Note. I was sitting on my porch. A little girl named Mary was walking on the porch. Mary ran past me. Mary was walking to my porch. Mary ran away.

Rich Family. Rich wanted to move to a new city but could not afford to move. He applied for a new job that required a lot of work. A friend told him he could work at McDonalds and then get his raise. Rich's friend offered him the job but he refused. Rich was never allowed to work at McDonalds again.
Cheating. Beth was at her friends house when she got distracted. Suddenly, she felt a strange sensation. She saw a snake in her neighbor's yard! She screamed! It had attacked her!
Birthday. Drake was going to his dad's wedding. He needed to eat and clean. He wasn't able to find the time to make it to his dad's. He asked his mom for help. She said she could help Drake out.

Store. Bob was a hard working father who always made the most of his kids. One day, his oldest son, Jayden, lost his job. He was so sad to find his son missing. Bob had to pay for Jayden's funeral and get him back. Bob is so thankful to have Jayden's funeral.
Cavities. The man went to the mall. He saw a new bicycle. It cost a lot. He decided to buy it. He went and bought it.
Walking in the rain. Gina decided to walk outside on the first day. But it started to rain. She decided to take a different route. But it was not clear at all. So she decided to go home.

Best Christmas. Tom was getting ready for school one morning. He couldn't wait for his Christmas presents to arrive. He went to his first store and chose to buy some cookies. When he got home he put a box of Christmas lights on top of them. Tom's mom was so happy when he put the lights back on.

Karen. Karen was the best football player in the country. She was playing for her high school. At the end of the game, she won the game. Everyone cheered. Karen was so excited to be the high school star.

Fued. Diana was about to go to her first college reunion. There were already hundreds of college students at the reunion. She hadn't seen any of them before, and didn't want to be alone. After some contemplation she made a decision. She went home and was thrilled she hadn't seen any of the rest.

The Tie Choice. Alfred was a great tailor. He always loved to tailor, but he could not get a job. His fiancee, Amy, decided to apply for a job with him. Amy really wanted a wedding tie, but Alfred didn't have time. Amy was forced to make Alfred a tie by the end of the week.

Cracked Screen. One day I installed the Roku Remote. I turned it on for a few minutes. When I turned it back on it wouldn't work. I had to go to the store to get another one. They only had one screen with the other.

The Chalk. Kate was in the lobby of a local department store. She was having a good time making sales. Suddenly, a huge snowstorm came through. The customers became scared. Luckily they just left and had their coats taken away.

The School Year. It was time for the new school year to begin. The entire year was spent planning. I couldn't wait until the next day to start school. I finally arrived on the school day. My parents were so excited for the new school year.

The Missing Keys. Tim was going on a cruise. He was afraid to leave his keys in the car. But he went and looked at them all. He was amazed at how small the keys were. He decided to go with his friends and find them later.

The Last Towel. I went for a walk one night. I was very nervous about my last night at home. I felt like I had a hard time getting out of bed. When I got up, I realized I didn't have any sleep at all. After a half hour of trying, I had exhausted myself.

Circus. It was a warm, sunny afternoon. The kids loved seeing the circus. They'd come to see the elephants in the trees. They'd eat a cone of ice cream. Then, they'd see the lions and elephants together.

The Music Lover. John heard a new song coming on his radio station. He liked it so much he went to play it on the radio. The station announced that it was going to be on an air date. The song was about the life that everyone loved to live. John listened to the whole show for the entire week.

Old Dog. I was driving home from work one day. Suddenly, I saw a dead dog in the road. I got out and called animal control. The dog was being kept at the vet for a couple of days. Now, I have no choice but to give the dog to a loving owner.

Ice Cream Truck. Bob went to a frozen pizza truck. He had some extra food for him. Bob drove the truck for a few hours to a new pizza place. Bob left the truck on a cold, snowy night. Bob went back to get a pizza on the way home.

Skating Lessons. John loved to skate, but hated to take lessons. His mom took him every year, until he finally decided to learn to skate. John spent weeks learning how to skate. John practiced for weeks, and eventually won the state championship. John went back to take lessons again the next year.

Gambler. I started my own business in 2011. I made a small fortune when I sold a car to the highest bidder. Today, the car is on display at the auction house. My company's chief executive is expected to tell the whole company. I hope he is sincere and does not sell the car.

The Jail. Sam was sentenced to 2 months in jail. He is very sad because he was innocent. He sat in the front row in his cell for 2 hours. When he got out he realized he did not know anything. Sam got a black eye because he was wrong.

Talk. I have been a single man for two Year's. I know that I'm still married, and I love my wife. I talked to my girlfriend on facebook yesterday. She said that I should move away because I was lonely. I have talked to her about it, but she still doesn't want to talk to me.
bag. Amy was walking to school. She saw a bag she liked. She ran to the bag. She picked it up and tried to run to the restroom. After an hour of walking, she returned the bag.

Starbucks Wi-Fi. One day a few workers noticed their wi-fi was not working. They asked Starbucks about their issue and the worker told them to replace it. On the way, one worker saw a small change. He plugged the switch in and it worked fine. The worker told them they had a better solution.

Doll Show. Cora wanted to go to the golf course with her friends. It was their first time in the club. Her friends didn't realize she was going. She felt terrible and had to admit it. Luckily, her friends agreed to take her anyway.

Personal Dignity. Tom was having a hard time at work. He was in charge of his finances. He decided to look at other employees. They all ended up being rude to him. Tom felt awful for all his troubles.

Boredom Sets In. I was very bored one night when my brother walked in. I decided to go get him a drink and take a walk. He immediately started to shout at me for being so silly. After I finished my walk, he started crying. He wasn't mean, he just wanted to sit still.

Push on the Swings. John loved to rollerblade and loved to try to be brave. One day while he was skateboarding his brother tried to jump him. He tried to stop John but lost control. His arm came off and he fell over. John was paralyzed and had to go to the emergency room.

Fixing my car. Today I was fixing my car. I put a brand new transmission on it. When I pulled up it looked just like the car I bought it with. I did a little bit of research and discovered I had to get a new transmission. I bought the new transmission and started driving my car.

Yancy. Yancy wanted to start a new school. She decided to go to the local library. She found a few books she liked. She then checked out a few books she didn't like. Yancy was disappointed to not get to read much.
Broken mug. I got mugged one day. I tried to get the mug back. However, it took forever. I finally managed to return it. I learned how to make it again.
Doing laundry. Bob didn't want to wash his house. He decided to do it alone. Bob's neighbor made a fire and his house was ruined. Bob's neighbor decided he didn't care. Bob now does laundry alone.

Car wash. I hated doing the car wash when I was a child. I always had to walk to my car to get there. I never did it while my parents were busy. So I bought a carwash at a garage sale. My kids got a new car wash!

Henry Bear's Park. Henry is going to the park on Saturday. He bought a pack of deer spray. Henry got on the car and drove to the park. Henry saw the deer spray coming towards his car. He pulled over and sprayed it.
Chloe gets a haircut. Chloe is getting a new haircut. The new one is a little weird. Chloe does not like it. She says it's her favorite haircut ever. Chloe is happy.

The Movies. The girls all got ready to go to the movies. They got in the car and drove to the movies. The girls sat in the car while they enjoyed the movie. They took a break and enjoyed the movie more. Afterwards, they decided to have more fun with friends.

So What's With Coffee Anyway?. Sam always wanted to learn to play a piano. But he had no piano books at home. So he read a book on how to play. And he went on to play with his friend. And he became a pianist after all.

Faded Jeans. I took off my jeans at the store. They were too old to fit into my pants. The store had a dress and gave me $500 for it. I bought them, changed the dress, and shopped. They fit perfectly in my pants.

The Ice Cream. Gina was walking home from school one afternoon. She was distracted by an ice cream truck. While she was walking she tripped and hit her head on the ice cream. Her head began to bleed and she went to the emergency room. Her friends made fun of her for it, but Gina felt much better.
Nap Mistake. Dan was at the mall. He wanted to get away from his girlfriend. She saw him sitting with a magazine. He decided to read through the magazine. Dan had missed his girlfriend's book.

Piano. Kelly loved to play the piano. She wanted to play a symphony. So she studied hard every night. She finally practiced and was ready to perform! Kelly was thrilled that she had made a lot of money.

Lucky Penny. I went out to buy some candy this morning. I realized that the candy was given out as free gift cards. The coupons said that if the ticket was a lucky penny, it would be a free ticket. I took the ticket home and paid $5 for it. I thanked my lucky pennie and thanked the lottery.

The Speakers. Kia was on a school field trip to Hawaii. She couldn't get a speaker for the class. She decided to find a cheaper one. She found an Amazon Echo. She was happy with her decision to buy her speakers.

The Garden. Gavin took a fresh cucumber from the garden and opened it up. He had a big, red tomato on top. He carefully started the plants. After planting, he added a few more seeds to the garden. He added new fruits and vegetables.

The Friend Fight. The Jones family had a housewarming party for their anniversary. All the kids had a big party together at the party. The Jones family brought food and drinks. When the party was over, they threw the food out. The Jones family lost the party.
Sleepy Cat. My cat wakes me up every night. The next morning I wake him to go to bed. I sleep on the couch for the first time ever. I also wake him up with a big yawn. He is asleep now in a ball.
bottles. Amy was cooking her soup. She decided to try her best. It tasted delicious. She decided to add more. Unfortunately her soup was very bland.

Bananas. Kathy went to her first banana stand. She noticed several different types of bananas. She chose a few. The worker asked Kathy to pick a couple for her. She picked a giant banana with the name of the person who would buy it.

Mother's Day Cruise. Kim was so excited to see her favorite cruise. But then she realized the ship was closed. She was very disappointed. And she could never afford to go to the new ship. She finally got to go on the cruise.

Regrets. Kate was taking a flight. Her flight attendant told her it was late and she had to be late. Kate wasn't sure what to do. She ended up at the airport with an alarm. The airline apologized profusely for the inconvenience.
Tight Shoes. Travis was walking around the house. His shoes were very tight. He took off his shoes. Travis tried to run to the store. He ended up having to jump on the roof.

Christmas time. Janice wanted to surprise her boyfriend in the school Christmas parade. She didn't know how to count, so she just wanted to play with him. When she went to count to ten, she realized she was out of his hands. She knew it was a mistake but she didn't care. Finally, the next year, Janice was able to count to ten!

Beads, Beads, Everywhere. Allie and her friends had a yard sale at a restaurant. They wanted to buy some beads so they could hang out. Allie spent the day sewing and putting beads on the table. The next day, the girls had a good time at the yard sale. Allie decided to buy a dozen more beads.
Pizza. Tia's family was eating dinner. They decided to make pizzas. They all got to pick a pizza flavor. The pizza flavor of the pizza was spicy. Tia was annoyed and vowed to never try a new recipe.

Good Spot. Kathy was running for school bus. She was nervous about her bus ticket. But it was worth it because she had just run a marathon. It was the last stop on her long walk. Luckily, her seatmate was excited for the bus ride.
Cartoons. Fred wanted to make a cartoon. He wrote a script and printed it out. He put it out on the internet. But as a joke, the internet was blocked. He went to school to make his own cartoons.
My New Puppy. Today I bought a new puppy. I brought her home yesterday with me. When I got home it was covered in fur. I cleaned it and put her in a warm spot. It was perfect with me.

Tennis. Jim bought tennis shoes to go out for the tennis courts. Jim found tennis shoes at the store. When he got home he played tennis with his dog. He also had the tennis shoes for a picnic. Jim won the first game of his tennis career.

Movie. I had a dream about a movie I never saw. The movie was so scary and frightening. I went to the theater and I went through the motions. Then, I went back to bed and I was exhausted. Luckily, I was able to finish the movie.
Grumpy. I'm at a meeting at the office. I want to ask my boss for something. I have a question in my mind. He does not know what he is talking about. So I ask him for his opinion and get some advice.

Age Difference. I am a 42 year old man with only 30 kids. I live with a young boy and a young girl. My son is playing on his swings and swings. They both had been told they would be older in the next two years. It is unfortunate that they don't play outside.
What to do. Tami was an avid baseball fan. Tami would watch every game she could find. But then she saw a bad baseball game on TV. She decided to watch it live. Soon she was tired of it.

Summer Job. My wife and I decided we would start a summer job in September. We decided to start at the fire department in March and have our first day on the job. At the end of the summer we had saved $1,300. We were glad to be able to go home and watch TV. Our new summer job makes our job easier than ever.

Mints. Janet loves to drink wine. She has a bottle of mints in her purse. She likes to drink them as often as possible. She always gets home with a few bottles to keep. Janet was recently given a big surprise at the local store for her winemaking.

Bad ice cream. My wife loved ice cream. One day she came home and found a box of cookies. I was so excited to eat them! But when she opened the box, she found that she actually got 2 bad cookies! She realized her mistake and promised to send her another box to eat.

Riding a Bike Drunk. My friend had an open date for me. I had to give her my number for the party. We rode a bicycle to and from the pub. While she was there, I felt sick. My friend was embarrassed she did that.

Kris' Kids' Christmas List. Kris had to put her kids' Christmas lists on the internet. Her friends encouraged her to get them to go on the list. She posted them on the internet. At the end of the day, Kris had posted a ton of good lists! She won the biggest gift of all her kids!

Family Picture. Lily wanted to take her granddaughter to a family portrait. They went to the local coffee shop for their day. They had a great time. Lily picked out the perfect one. She and her granddaughter enjoyed the beautiful portrait.

Mop. My friends and I decided to make the mop. I went to the store to buy some materials. When I arrived, they had a very large mop. I went home to finish the mop. My friends and I made the mop and we all looked great.

Dairy Diary. Beth wanted to write a diary. She gathered her things from her pantry and put them in a book. When Beth finished the book, she wrote down her notes. Her diary was complete! Beth felt great about her new diary!

Rain. Today, the sun started to get really hot. I went to the store and bought a pack of sunscreen. I bought my own set and it was a huge success. However, the sun was terrible the next day. When I saw my sunburn I started to feel really sick.

The free seasonings. When I was a kid my family got a new Christmas tree. We could not get our hands on it so they had to get one. I bought a bunch of different ones but they all fit us well. My family really enjoyed our new tree. I am very happy that they took my tree home.

The Circus. I was looking forward to going to the circus with my parents. I went to the front of the line. We sat and watched the performers perform their routines. I had a blast watching the performers. I loved being at the front of line.

The Trampoline. Timmy took a trip to the river in search of a trampoline. He looked all over the area for a trampoline. Eventually, he found a large one. He bought the trampoline and drove home. Timmy was happy that he had found a trampoline.

Larry's car smokes. Larry bought a new brand of car. He drove to his local Ford dealership. Larry was very impressed. The salesman was very good at driving. Larry drove the car on the first day of the dealership.
Sunk. It was her first day on the job. She thought she looked good. But she didn't see her husband as he was looking. She didn't think he looked sad either. She didn't want to look sad either.

Ebay Scam. John was desperate to find a job. He applied for jobs and did not get one. John realized that he made a mistake. He was very angry at his employer and told him to quit. He lost the job after that.

The Drag Race. Linda went for a run in the local mud pit. She knew her instructor well, but she was ready. She knew she should put her foot in the water. She put her foot in the air and started the race. Linda was ready to face her instructor for her race.

Car Wash. Amy had just woken up late this morning. She was nervous about her new car wash job. Amy was not sure how she would spend the afternoon. She went to the salon and waited for the cashier. Afterwards she was told she was going to get a new car.

The blanket over the head. Nora was afraid to play in the snow. She was afraid of falling over when the snow fell. But her mom decided to make her play. She bought her blanket and made her head fall over. Nora was so happy!

The Heavy Pizza. My wife loves pizza. I decided to make a heavy pizza for her. She loves to eat pizza but doesn't like pizza in general. We both decided to make a pizza and she loved it. She ate a full pizza and loved it!
The Son. Tom wanted a dog. His family wanted a dog with a human owner. He saved all his allowance. He finally bought a son. Tom's dog was a great addition to his family.
Seth gets a girl. Seth was trying to find a new girlfriend. He got a text message from a new girl. He asked her to dinner. He asked if he could see her at a club. The new girl answered yes.

The Nest. Tom was building a pet house. The new neighbor needed new lights and cabinets. Tom's landlord had to buy them. Tom decided he would do the same. Tom's new neighbor was pleased with his new home.
Zoned Out. The school bus was running late. They put a stop to it. They tried to wait for it. They gave up when they heard the commotion. They went home.

A Cat for Mom. Jill took her family to the pet store. She had a lot of money in her purse but no money for a cat. Jill had to carry a lot of paper due to her bills. When she got home Jill brought a new cat to the pet store. She loved the new cat and was very happy.

Basement. I found a tree by my bedroom window. The trees had branches and branches were too long. I was worried that the trees would rot. The kids were playing outside with a box of wood sticks. They eventually caught a fly and tore the branches off.
Try Hard. Joe loved to play sports. His friends convinced him to try harder. He practiced every day for hours. Joe never did it, so he quit. But he was never able to beat anyone in his field.
story. Brett felt really bad. He tried telling a story. He made up a good story. He was very proud of his story. He went back to the office for more.

Mini golfing. Sandra was always golfing. She liked to put in hours every weekend. One summer, Sandra was practicing. When she got to the last hole she was very confident she would win. She went over her last hole at the last second with such grace!

The Mountain Lion. John was taking pictures of the beautiful scenery with his phone. He wanted to make some money to buy a mountain lion. John saw that the lion wasn't very fast. He decided to purchase the lion for just a few dollars. John was very grateful for his generosity and love of nature.

Jackson is a star. Jackson is a star baseball player. Jackson plays every day with the team. His favorite team is going to win the game. Jackson is very confident because he played in the big game. Jackson is so confident that the team won the game.
November. I was so excited for the Christmas holiday. It was the end of the year. I went to the store to get some gifts. I got all kinds of gifts. I ate a lot of candy!

Snorkeling Trip. I went snorkeling in the winter with my friends. When I was there I was very scared. I realized I should not go out alone in the woods. We decided to stay out until dark. It was very cold and we made it out ok.

Puppy Training. Tina bought a new puppy for her family. She took him home and trained him on how to climb trees. The puppy was very happy when it arrived. When it was time for the winter she brought him home. Tina is glad she took a look at her puppy.

Roy's Big Move. Roy's favorite basketball player is his brother Mike. Mike loves playing basketball and Roy's brother loved him so much. Roy wanted to get Mike a basketball but he couldn't afford it. He asked his parents for a gift certificate. Mike is happy now that his dad gave him the certificate.

New Kid. Joey wanted to have a baby. He was told he had to work long hours to save up the money. When he found out his first baby was his, he was sad. He went back to school and made a lot of new friends. He was now very successful and proud.

Worry About Others Or Myself. One day, I ran over to the window to look for another man. He was sitting at the table playing a song. I thought it was very pretty and I knew it was me. I couldn't believe it was him, but I kept hearing his voice. The song was about love, so I put it on my playlist.

Looking. I went to go see my doctor. I asked her what she needed to see. When I got there, she said she needed to see a dermatologist. After the appointment, she went to the doctor. The doctor was happy for me because I looked great.

Engineer. My niece's car broke down in an accident. My niece had not been to the auto parts store. The store clerk was out of town and asked for my car. I was able to buy my niece's car. My niece thanked the clerk and drove away.

Ship Your Car. Joe was a cruise ship captain. He did everything he could to save the ship for a return trip. Joe's best friend, a friend with no life experience, was the best ship captain on his boat. Joe was so proud of his friend, Joe decided to leave his current job. Joe went on to become a successful cruise ship captain.

Playing at the Beach. I was sitting on the beach one night. I sat on my back enjoying the sun and breeze. Then a bird flew into my eyes and I looked around. A bird jumped out and landed right on me! I screamed because I had lost my balance and got into a lot of trouble.
The broken screen. The phone fell on the floor. My screen broke. I put a lot of duct tape on it to catch it. The screen went under. I then tried to open it up.
Snorkeling. I took my son to the city snorkeling. We put on a set of skis. Our skis kept our distance from the lake. He didn't take a note of the skis. My son told me he was bored.

Pay. Tanya decided to be a waitress after school for some extra money. She started working at a new restaurant near her town. She noticed that the line was so long. Then, she saw that the line was going to be longer. Tanya decided that she should quit her job.
The Vase. I got a new vase today. I threw the vase down the street. It was ugly. I tried to replace it but it wouldn't work. I decided to ask someone to fix it.
The Ship. The crew of a small ship went on a cruise. There was a large storm coming up. All of the sudden a large tornado hit. The crew of the ship got out. They were able to evacuate.
No More Beard. I had just shaved my beard. I was really embarrassed by it. I told everyone what was going on. Nobody did anything. Now I don't have a lot of confidence to shave again.
The Blanket. The kids had a favorite blanket. They thought it looked terrible. They bought it for their friend. They threw it out. The parents were very mad.

Thanksgiving Dinner. Allie was so excited for Thanksgiving dinner. It was going to be a family tradition. She hadn't planned much for Thanksgiving and she missed a lot. She was very disappointed. So she was able to make up for it by making turkey for the whole family.
The Tree. Bobby loved his tree. He had it trimmed the morning of the first day. He put the tree in his front yard. His neighbor came by and came by. He cut the tree and made it big again.

Subscription. Tom had a subscription to a DVD service. He waited a long time before he could download it. After it was downloaded he decided to cancel. Unfortunately it was too late and his phone died. He had to call customer service for a refund.

Friend's bicycle. Randy had recently found his bicycle missing. The bike was under a lot of dirt and he decided to take it back. Randy got all sorts of offers but nobody was interested. Eventually Randy decided he'd put up a bike display and it would sell. Now Randy has a place that offers his bike as a present.
Muscle. Jane went to the gym. She exercised for hours everyday. On her last day, her muscles hurt! Jane felt terrible. Jane decided to go back to the gym.

Illness. Tom's wife was sick so he took her to the hospital. He did not like the doctor so he asked for help. The doctor gave him some pills and told him to be careful. Tom did not listen and did not take the pills again. His wife never recovered from her sickness again.

Chekhov's Warning. Chekhov had planned for the summer. He had gotten a letter telling him to take a bath. The letter said it would start early. But Chekhov stayed until night. He was very embarrassed.

Joe's Cars. Joe wanted to learn to drive. Joe got his license and hired an instructor. Joe took lessons and improved every day. Joe's car was ready for the driving test. Joe was very happy he learned to drive.

Bad Kids. The neighbors were very rude to Thomas. One day he decided to bring in a new dog. Thomas put the dog on a leash and tried to walk away. Thomas ran out of his house yelling. The neighbor didn't even bother to help him anymore.

Plants. Tina's mother told her to take care of the plants at the nursery. Her mother would come and pick them up from the nursery every morning. One day Tina tried to take care of one of the plants at the nursery. Her mother yelled at her to clean the area. She took care of the plants and she was able to return them.

Lost Bird. Bob was running late on the weekend. He realized that he lost his bird. He called his friends to see if they could help him. They helped him catch a few birds for him. Bob was able to find his bird back in the tree.

Class Reunion. It was my turn to go to class today, but I wasn't ready to go. I looked around and my teacher was still there. It was a big deal and she said I couldn't sit here and study. I looked all around and still didn't know what to do. I had to sit in the office.

Presidential Vote. Donald was running for president. His opponent was very unpopular. Donald made a speech that insulted his opponent. Donald made a speech that everyone thought was funny. Donald won the presidential election.

The Hot Springs. The family went to the hot springs to play in the park. The boys loved to climb up there. They wanted to play in the pool but needed water! The kids were tired of swimming at the hot springs. They took lessons in the hot springs.

The Topiary. Timmy loved to dig his very own grave. He liked it because it looked like a giant pine tree. His grandmother found it with a special marker. She said it was a great way to remember her. Timmy had a lot of fun digging his own graves.
Japan. Ivan was visiting Japan. He saw a huge penguin that loved penguin food. He wanted to visit it. He took him there. He had a great time.

Angel has sex. Angel is walking down the street. She notices that she gets pulled over for speeding. Angel pulls over and asks her if she wants to go home. She tells Angel she is going to go back to sleep. Angel tells Angel she has the night off and they get in.

craft. My boyfriend took me to the craft store. He took me to one of his craft stores. He picked out a design I really liked. We started working on it together. It took us months to complete the final product.

The Embarrassed Girlfriend. Tom was dating a girl. Tom got an email from her mom. Tom got a phone call. Tom wanted to hang out with her but she said no. Tom felt embarrassed and wanted to have a few drinks.

New Dress. John wanted to make a dress for his girlfriend. He asked her if she wanted a blue one. She said yes, and John put the blue one on her dress. John tried to find out what color it was. He had to wait and see what she liked.

Pumpkin Smashing. My daughter was making pumpkin carving last weekend. She thought it would be a great idea to use pumpkins for the decoration. She turned the stove on a low setting, so that the pumpkin was in the middle. The pumpkin twisted in the middle of the stove. Now the pumpkin is stuck in the middle of the pot.

Bubbles. Gwen's crush's brother had a crush on her. She thought about hiding it but it was okay. When her crush came home she threw her flowers in the sink. It turned out that they were bubbles. Gwen's brother was able to get rid of the bubbles.

No Ride. When I came home, I got a text from my dad. He was telling me he was looking for me. I looked under my bed to see if it was me. I told him that he was taking me to see him. Then, he called back saying I wasn't there and I had to go.
A Jump Start. Tommy has been training for months for a jump start. He jumps like crazy every time. Tommy practices everyday. On the last day of the race he was up first. He got the first jump start!

Acknowledge. Anna felt something on her head. She was too embarrassed to tell anyone. She went to the library to find out what was wrong. She couldn't remember where she had been. She could only guess that something was wrong with her.
Dried lake. I went fishing in the lake. The lake was very dry. The fish didn't come out until two in the morning. The fishing was very loud. The lake was closed for fishing.
Kids. Sam wanted to give away her favorite toy. He gave it to a group of kids. One kid didn't like the toy. They asked Sam if she wanted to give him another. Sam didn't care so he gave it to the kid.

A Friend Indeed. Sam's mom was expecting her to be an aunt on her third birthday. She asked her mom what her favorite color was, and how she could buy some. Sam's mom said black, which helped her decide which color to buy. Sam bought a nice blue gown and some white gloves. She was excited to see how much her aunt loved her hair.

Lost Homework. Jim lost his homework assignment this morning. He got up to see if he could do it. He didn't find the homework after he checked his desk. Jim was very worried that his homework might have gotten lost. Jim's teacher found him writing his homework on his desk.

The Disgusting Pie. Tim was working at his house when something weird happened. He heard some scratching in his kitchen and decided to throw a party. He cooked some bread for the party and went to see what was going on. Tim had a great time and was going to cook for the whole family. Everyone in the house thought it was delicious!
Down we go. Bob went fishing on the river. He was on his way to catch a fish. Bob's boat had run out of gas! Bob yelled out for help. Bob was able to get his boat back on the river.
Drove. Tom had a bike. He didn't have a license. One day he wanted to ride his bike to work. Tom tried hard but failed. It was too expensive and he stopped riding his bike.

Choosing Just One. I was having lunch. I walked around a block. The bus driver told me I needed my ID. I did not think he could remember to call me when he came to pick me up. I felt very sad and did not want to go home.

glasses. When I was 15, I went to the doctor for my vision. I was nervous and told him I could not do anything. At the end of the test, I had trouble seeing anything. I gave him some glasses and told him it was ok. He liked the glasses and they looked amazing.

How regretful. I walked into the living room. I realized I didn't get anything at all. Then, I saw my dog licking my hand. I realized I left his food in the refrigerator. My dog looked at me for a long time afterwards.

Soul Mates. One night, I was on my way home from work. My roommate told me to get some soul mates. I went to the liquor store, and bought five whiskeys. I took one and tried to drink it, but was shocked to find it was broken. I immediately went to the store, and bought five spirits for myself.

Try. My daughter and her friends went to the bar on Friday. They ordered a couple drinks. All of them made bad jokes. We didn't take the time to yell at each other. It's okay, I said we will make up.

music with sticks. I love to sing in the park. Everyday we will put on our sticks. This year we had to put in extra music for the party. The kids love it. I think that we'll never forget how fun it is.

School Winter. We had a summer school project. We decided to take two days off to do it in the fall. We set out for the field and took some breaks. We went back home after the first day of work. We did a great work.

Family. Tom was an unemployed man. He had a house to call his parents over. Unfortunately there was no internet. Tom called his friends and they talked about what he could do. Tom felt very lonely.
