Riding Lawn Mower. Jane's dog had gotten so bad that it had to be taken to the vet. The vet said it would be expensive for Jane to care for it. Jane drove to the vet for an appointment. The vet said the dog was too sick to care for himself. Jane felt good knowing that he was no longer sick with his dog.
Leaving. Tom was leaving for work. His friend offered to pay him to leave. Tom accepted the offer. Tom waited on the train. Tom was relieved when he got home.

Boring Main Event. I went to a lot of parties this year. I bought a few tickets. It was a very boring day and the music was awful. I was also not paying attention and ended up skipping. Afterwards, I left feeling depressed.

Chair Claimed. Tom was playing basketball on the court. A teammate's teammate was making a hard throw. Tom's teammate caught the rebound and gave him the ball. The next day, Tom's teammate apologized to Tom. Tom never paid attention.
Running. Ivy really wanted to run a race. She studied hard. She decided to try out for the local track team. She was nervous to try it out. Ivy made the cut and won the race.

Fired in One Day. Tim was doing a survey for his school. He wanted to know how much he would save. He went to a website and wrote an email. It was an estimate and he felt like it was too cheap. He was fired and was upset.

The Spite of Rodents. Dani decided to play on a small dog toy. When she was a kid she had a little dog named Rod. Dani loved the dog, so she took him to the park. When Rod got out of the park she saw a snake crawling around. Dani had to take Rod to the vet to get the snake removed.
Softball Tryouts. Drew wanted to join the softball team. He took a year of classes and practice. Then he signed up for a tryout. It was a lot of work, but it was worth it. Drew made the team!

New Sister. Carla was a lesbian. Her mom tried to make her feel better by giving her a new sister. But Carla had to stay home from school so she could care for the new sister. Carla learned a lot about love and was very happy. Now Carla and her new sister love each other every chance they get.
Drews big date. Drew had just gotten married. He had been meeting with a new girl. He was meeting her to see who they are. Drew decided to meet her in person. They had an amazing time.
First Day. The Smiths took their kids to school. They were so excited. They didn't know anything else. Finally, the first day of school was out! They all went home happy.

Water Slide. Tim liked to slide across the water at the park. Tim was good at the water slide but not very good at the slide. Tim tried his best, but it was always hard to get him to fall. Eventually Tim got up and the water slide was easier. Tim was so good that he tried out for a swim team.

The Blender. I used to work at a chemical plant. I worked in a bathroom stall that held dozens of jars. The customers complained of poor quality. One day they made a mistake. They were able to fix the problem with a blender.

Scared. A man went to school in fear of being attacked. The victim was so scared, she refused to move forward. The attacker began to beat her up and she was scared of the attackers. The man made a plan, he took her to the nearest playground. The attack had stopped at that school.

Joy. Joy loved to do laundry. Her favorite part of it was doing the dishes. She would wash them and then return them. Every night she would put them back and go to work. Joy had a lot of friends over to help her do her laundry.

The Compassion Of Crazy. Sam wanted a puppy to love him. Sam did not have the money to purchase a puppy. Sam decided to get a new puppy. Sam took the puppy to the pound. Sam got a new puppy and they fell in love.

Countdown. Bethany and her husband were heading to the airport. Bethany noticed her husband looking worried. She went inside to ask him why he wasn't there. His wife didn't see him and was worried. She called 911 and told them about her fears.

The bird. Amy was watching television when a bird came up to her. She watched as it flew by and started eating. The bird became hungry and grabbed the TV. Amy watched the bird eat until it left the kitchen. She then returned it to the bird.
Waterfall. Lulu had wanted to play in the waterfalls. She bought supplies and a swimsuit. Then she went in her swimsuit. She fell down the stairs. The water was so cold she had to get out of bed.
Ride. Joey needed to go to the bathroom. He looked in the mirror and saw he had a flat tire. He looked at the road signs. Joey got home. He made a turn.

An accident. Tom was driving along the highway with his wife. He was speeding and didn't have time to react. He hit another vehicle. He took his wife to the hospital. He was diagnosed with a concussion.

Coffee Coffee Coffee. My boyfriend invited me to visit the coffee shop. I ordered his favorite coffee beans. They tasted delicious. I wanted to try another drink. I decided to order a cup of coffee instead.
J'accuse!. Jade made a mistake. She spilled her drink on a classmate's clothes. He was disgusted. Jade apologized to the girl. The boy was never punished by Jade again.
Wild Scare. The kids were playing outside. They heard a huge boogie board falling. They hid under the boards and jumped. They were scared and panicked. They screamed and ran back inside.

Cancun. I went to the Cancun airport in Cancun. My tour guide brought me a large lunch in his backpack. He was talking about Cancun. I asked him what he thought. He said Cancun was a wonderful place to visit.

Laundry. Kelly needed to dry her clothes before her son came. She looked under the sink and there was no change on the floor. She asked her son for directions so he could load some clothes. Kelly grabbed his clothes and hurried back in. She realized that she had left the wrong clothes in the sink.

computer class. Mary was working on her computer. Suddenly, she fell asleep. She woke up to find that she couldn't stop working. She went to school and saw a substitute. She was able to fix her computer for free.
Lasagna. Kelly wanted to make lasagna. But she only had enough ingredients. So she made a huge batch of pasta. And everyone loved it. But she was disappointed that she didn't have enough broth.

The New Bike. Sam was excited for his birthday. He brought home an old bicycle with many accessories. It was his favorite, and he wanted to keep it forever. But Sam was quite excited to show it off. When he saw the bike he loved it!
New PHone. Tom bought a new phone. He asked the store to refund him a part. The store had it fixed for a low price. Tom called to complain. The manager was happy with Tom's decision.

Rock climbing fun. I have been training myself to rock climb. The first time I tried it I got up and almost fell. I immediately felt a burn on my arm. It is something that can be cured if you do the basics. It is something that I will continue to train.

Angry Mom. Amy and Sally have been fighting a lot lately. One day Amy's mom told Amy she'd seen her dad while at the park. The next morning they decided to play baseball. Amy's dad hit Sally hard and broke a hip. Amy decided to stay home and see the doctor.

Lunchtime. Mary woke up and went to school. She went to her desk and started typing a note. Suddenly, she heard a buzzing sound. She looked up and saw that her phone had dropped. Her lunchtime had ended and she was late again!

The Bears Game. It was a big game for the Bears. It was the third time that they'd won in a row this season. All of the sudden it began to rain. Bears fans were freaking out. The Bears lost by 20 points in a row.

The Roadside. The family was going to take their car. It wasn't getting any faster. The traffic was very tight. The only way to get home was through a parking lot. They got home after ten minutes of waiting.

Jay's Garage. Jay and his family were taking the kids to the mall. The kids saw a lot of cars on the way down. Suddenly Jay noticed a truck in front of their house. He stopped at a gas station to get gas and drove to the truck. Jay's kids got out of the car and were glad they got to see the truck.
Sick Day. We were out at the beach. We found a friend's dog. The dog had been playing in the sand all day. We realized we needed to call a tow truck. The dog finally came to pick him up.

Barking Dog. Jackie always got a barker. She would bark it out every time she got to her room. When she got home she noticed that her dog was getting louder. She didn't know why so she went to the vet. It turns out that barking makes it easier to control.

Release the Stress. Gina was walking around the gym after work one day. And her crush walked across the gym looking like he saw a spider. Gina noticed the spider's face was really swollen. She told her coach but her coach was happy. Gina was happy to be in front of the teacher again.

City. Toby had a big idea for a city. He would create a large skyscraper. He started off building the tallest building in the area. Unfortunately it was very slow. Eventually Toby decided to make the city bigger.

Bomb threat. Kia's teacher noticed a bomb on her desk. Kia hid under it. When her teacher looked out of the window, he saw her. Kia told him her teacher had warned her to stop. Her teacher never got off scot-free.

Rocket Surgery. I had a baby in 1997, with an unknown cause. He had been diagnosed with cancer. The only thing I know was that I needed a radiation removal program. I was devastated when my surgery began. It was the best surgery I've ever been on!
Gum Hair. Kia wanted to get her long hair straight. She looked at some reviews of her current style. She liked the way it looked. It looked great. It was an idea she wanted to get her own.
Plane. My family was on the boardwalk. A cop stopped us. He gave us a ticket for illegal crossing. He gave us five hundred dollars for each violation. I thanked him for his kindness.
Lucretia Prints Her Paper. Lucretia has to do a project for school. She needs to print the paper. Lucretia does not have any time. Lucretia finishes the paper. Lucretia is glad she printed her paper.

The Accident. Jill was driving home from work. She was driving fast when she got hit by a truck. The truck flipped over on the side of the road. Jill fell down hard. She ended up getting a broken leg.
Christmas shopping. I opened my presents in the car. I got so excited to see all of my gifts! I looked everywhere for it. My neighbor gave me one that I absolutely loved. I told him it was perfect!

unrealistic. A man tried to run a fake restaurant. It took him 10 minutes to get a permit. The real restaurant called him into their building. He was denied a permit. They sent a new operator to be his apprentice.
Clown Lover. I was on a camping trip with my mom. We went camping with our tents. I saw a bunch of clowns. We walked down a huge path. After a few minutes we stopped and decided we weren't clowns.
Fire. Bob was on the freeway at night. His tire went flat. Bob's car didn't respond. He decided to fix it. Bob drove the car around the neighborhood.
Games. Jim went to the arcade to buy some games. He sat down and looked at his cart. He got to the arcade. There was an arcade card game. He bought that game.

Pizza Delivery. Anna went to the pizzeria one morning. She ordered a box of pizza. As she went to take a picture, the delivery man came up to her. Anna had to pay the man $40 for her pizza. Anna ended up having to pay another $30 for pizza.

Disney World. Allie was excited about the first Disneyland. The rides were great. But all the rides were boring and boring. Then she saw the Magic Kingdom and how boring it was. Allie vowed to never go to Disneyland again.

The Pets. A family had just been home from a vacation. They were trying to decide what to get for the holiday. The last thing they wanted was a new cat! They got a new cat as a gift from their parents. They decided they would have a cat on Christmas Day!

The suet and the squirrel. Bob got home from school. He grabbed a blanket and set it on the floor. He walked downstairs. He saw his dad's dog! He jumped in the kitchen and he took care of the squirrel.

The Football game. The football team was down by two points. It was so close that it started to rain. The coach decided not to practice that night. He did not feel confident after playing all week. The game was cancelled.

Ears. Nancy had a problem with hearing. She had earrings in her ears. Nancy tried to fix the problem but couldn't. Then Nancy learned that it was not the earring she needed. Nancy stopped wearing earrings.

Work's a Beach. Tom was out doing his first swimming at the beach. He didn't know how to swim, but he did. He was too tired to dive into the water. His friends helped him swim so he could learn. After a few days he got his back up and felt good again.

Apartment Repairs. The landlord asked the tenants to get a new car. The tenants were so mad they got out of the house. They all ran out to the next room to get it. The landlord told them to get a new car. When they got there it was fixed and the lease was free!
Bad temper. Tom loved to play football. He would make an excuse to play football. One day, he decided to play kick the ball. It went to Tom. Tom was suspended from the football team for one year.

Picnic Clean Up. Jan and her family went to the park for a picnic. Jan's mom told her to clean up the picnic area. When Jan's mom arrived, she told Jan to clean up the rest of the area. Jan worked hard cleaning up all of the surfaces of the picnic area. Jan ended up having fun working with her new hobby.

Morning. I woke up with a huge headache. I tried to go to work but the alarm clock wouldn't turn on. I called my friend to pick me up at work. The next morning, he was able to wake me up. I was glad that I was able to wake up.
Rally. It was Friday night. I was really bored. I decided to join in. It was not fun to join. I decided to go to a different club.
New candy shop. Amy had just moved into her new home. She had not seen the candy shop she wanted to go to in years. Amy went and found one. She ordered it. After she ate the candy it was delicious.
Cook Work. Barry was looking forward to the holidays. He made his wife breakfast and lunch. However, his wife noticed he was out of bread. Barry was upset. She decided to cook dinner instead.

Chess. Tim was a college chess player. He was playing against another player. Tim did well, winning against the other player. The other player found out and beat Tim. Tim got upset and quit playing chess for a month.

Gamestop. I was sitting at the store. I had a lot of fun trying to pick something from the menu. Then I looked at the prices. I bought five different foods. Finally I bought a couple different types of snacks!

Detention. Tom was always afraid of detention. He wanted to learn the rules of detention. So he signed up for lessons at a local college. He learned how to write a report. Now Tom's parents don't mind paying more attention.
Frank's Diet. Frank was having a bad day. He went to the store. He asked a customer if they could buy hamburger buns. The customer said yes. Frank was really proud of himself.

The Dusty Puppy. It was August and Maryann was babysitting her little puppy. Her puppy was very dusty and smelly. Maryann cleaned the dog's room and the garage. On her way home, she saw the puppy laying on the floor. Maryann had to clean up the puppy's room and garage.
Mascara. Gina wanted a dress for prom. Her dad thought the dress was lame. However she did think it looked cool. She decided on a purple dress. Now she was happy with her dress.

Our Visit. Alicia was a little girl who lived alone. She was always having problems with her family. One day her grandmother was not looking and she saw that Alicia was alone. She invited her to a party that Alicia had never had. She was very happy, but sad that she had no money for dinner.

Cockroach. I found a cockroach in my apartment. I went to the store to buy a new one. When I went to pay for the new one, the cage didn't come in. I ended up with a huge black box. I decided to keep my cage, and I'm now more careful.

Survival. The man walked to the grocery store. He found the biggest bag he could find. He began to put in the groceries he was carrying. The man began to look for more groceries. He heard a loud crash and ran.
Bread. Rita loved bread. Her favorite was a little white bread. Rita liked it so much she bought tons of breads. She could bake bread for anything. She loved bread so much she made a big batch!

Tired in the line. Amy was a waitress at the grocery store. She was working late to complete a bill. While she was in line her friend asked her for an autograph. Amy was so excited to get autographs. Amy waited in line for an hour.
Case. Ben was going to his first football game. He bought tickets. He was going to sit in his car and enjoy the action. His wife told him it wasn't safe. Ben was upset and apologized.

Cat Fur. When my cat had a litter of kittens it fur was a lot of fur. But she would eat the cat fur and try to lick the fur from me. I tried feeding her some cat fur. She liked it. But she ate it and got a bad stomachache.
Car Wash. Sally wanted to wash her car. She went to the store. She purchased a new car wash. She went to the car wash. She washed her car and it was still dirty.

The preconceived notion. Gina had been dating a girl for two years. She was tired of being stuck in the past. She started to question the notion of a relationship with her old self. Gina found herself very curious about what it was like for someone to be old. But when the girl was sixteen, Gina didn't care so much.
Reenactment. A woman got a job as a maid at a hotel. She had a daughter. She made all the staff. She got a raise. But she was fired and had to start over.
Brad and the water life. Brad loved swimming. He was afraid of drowning. One day he decided to go swimming. Brad was very scared. Brad took his water life and was glad to swim.

Taxi. Rene had to get her sister a ride. When she got there, the car was flat and dirty. She tried to take the cab to the store but she was late. Rene had to call a tow truck. Luckily, the tow truck picked her up.

Nature. Cathy loved nature. She loved to go for hikes in the wild. Cathy decided to go for a hike at the park. Cathy enjoyed the experience. Cathy decided to go back to nature the next time she got in.

Ben's new pet. Ben went to a pet store and bought a pet cat. He put the cat in a cage with a mouse in the middle. He went to his cat's cage to get it examined. Ben's cat looked like a mouse! Ben was relieved to see his new pet was a puppy!

Larkscall. The kids wanted to go to the lake. They went to the lake early and waited. When they arrived at the lake they went to the top. They were scared but excited when they saw how well they went. They had the best time on their swim team!
Tennis. Ivy was excited to play tennis with her friends. The first game was the best ever. Ivy played well. She won the first game. Ivy would continue to play tennis in her upcoming game.

Christmas Morning. Jill was about to be out of work for Christmas. She couldn't decide if she should go or not. After looking at the options she chose, Jill decided to go. At the grocery store, she ordered an ice cream cone. It was cold enough to warm her in but it didn't dampen her nerves.

Tabby. Tabby was driving with her friend Jim. They were heading to the mall. Tabby felt very nervous about running for her purse. As the car slid down a hill, she decided to pull over. She was excited to be able to get a ride in.

Forgotten toothbrush. Yesterday, my dentist gave me my new toothbrush. However, my dentist couldn't take it. He told me that I had an appointment tomorrow. So, I decided to go to the store. However, I was told that the toothbrush had expired.

Homemade Cards. Randy's mother was getting ready for school. Randy's mother was playing around and wanted to know what he could make for school. She wanted to make a card card to help with her homework. She wanted to make an extra special card for her daughter. Randy's mother took the card and showed her how she made it.

On the Subway. A new subway line opened up for commuter service on Tuesday. Tina was on the subway waiting to cross the busy T20 bridge. The next morning Tina forgot her phone. She felt her breath waver as she walked to the stop. She tried to find her phone but her bag was in the cupboard.

No Kenny. Kenny was not looking forward to being called a Kenny. On his birthday Kenny celebrated his birthday with friends. Kenny gave the presents to everyone at the party. When he woke his parents took him to school. Kenny enjoyed a fun birthday as he was excited to be a Kenny.
Torn Pantyhose. We went to the mall. My wife had a bunch of torn pantyhose. She couldn't get them in the house. We put the pantyhose in the pantry. They were gone after 2 days.
Valentine's Gifts. Barry was at the fair. He had received a card for Valentine's. The card said it had a card for $50. Barry was so excited! He went home that day and bought a card for $50.

Gayle's chores. The man sat on a bench with a woman. He made sure they were on the same side. The woman said he was just a man who loves to cook. The man didn't mind, though. He decided he was going to be faithful to his wife.

Working hard. I recently got a job working at a retail store. One of my coworkers recommended I try out for the office. I accepted and applied and got the job. After a few days I worked out in the gym for about six months. I hope this is what I like for my job.

Metabolism or illness. I was looking forward to my final presentation to my friend. The presentation would focus on the new food on the menu. At the end of the day my friend got mad. He decided to eat the food he didn't like. Everyone made fun of me for that.

I Almost Killed Myself Playing Pokemon Go. My cat decided to go outside after school. While on his way, he tripped and got hurt. Since I was at home, he started to chase me. Eventually, I ran from the cat and ran to safety. I had to walk back home with his dog instead of going outside.

Chef's Kitchen. Joe wanted to learn a new language. He wanted to take an engineering course. He found a tutor for learning Russian. He took his course and practiced for a long time. Joe then made his best friends in Russian.

James's New Job. James worked at an electronics store. His job was to be the head of the customer service department. James got a promotion and was promoted. James's boss fired him. James lost his job.

Macy's Favorite Ice Cream. Macy always wanted ice cream from her grandma. One day she went to the store and bought some chocolate. She loved ice cream and wanted some ice cream, but forgot to put it in the freezer. When she went back home, she realized she had melted the chocolate! Macy ate her chocolate and was very sad.

Mule and Plow. A few weeks ago we decided to build a mud mower. We didn't have much time and decided to make a trailer. It took quite a while but eventually the mud started to fill the trailer. We loaded up the trailer and waited for it to go by. We then waited for the trailer to dry and arrived to begin construction.

The Jail. Tina was very excited for her first day at the prison. She had never been in jail before and knew nothing of the proceedings. She spent the entire day working on the security fence. When she arrived at the jail she was relieved and grateful. She walked inside and waited with her mom in the sunshine.
Keep on Giving. Sam needed money for school. He did not have any money at home. Sam put the money in savings. He made money on the savings. He made money with his money.

Working Stores. The Johnson family were in a tough spot. Their last store was closing. They were going to need to find a new place. One of the neighbors brought his old ones to the store. They were sold out of them after one month.
Goaltending. I went to the Hockey game in 1981. I saw the goalie standing in the net. He was a little late to the puck. He looked over his shoulder to get it. The puck sailed down the goal.
Banana boat. Tom wanted to go to the beach. He got a cheap boat. But the boat was very small. Tom tried his best. But it took too long.
The Beach. I went to the beach for the weekend. I made my friends have ice cream. I made a cone with ice cream. I brought the cone to the beach. My friends brought the ice cream.

Lost for Awhile. My wife and I were driving back to our house. We parked and went to a gas station. As we approached the station the cashier stopped us. I found my wallet. My wife and I had to pay for the gas.

New Shoes. The Smiths needed new shoes for their new house. They couldn't decide on one because they could not afford them. They went to a shoe store. The Smiths chose pairs they liked. They shopped around in their new shoes.

The Fireman's Dog. Jill was trying to figure out how to get her dog a job. So she decided she would take a new dog out into the country. She was determined to get her dog a job after a tough year. She hired a firefighter to get her to the job. Jill was so happy that she didn't have to leave her dog out in the cold.

The New Alphabet. Bob went to class yesterday. He started reading the new alphabet. He looked up many different things. He decided he would write it. After a few days he was able to type a lot of interesting things.

Time Lost While Playing. Tim was running for president. He had spent most of his time working on the campaign. After the election came Tim realized he didn't have enough time to run. Tim stopped working and asked for his help. Tim got back to work shortly after.

The Cat. Kelly wanted to buy a new cat. Her cat was getting old and needed to be fed. Kelly looked at the cat's collar for a while. It was just scratching, and she was upset. She had to feed the cat but it would not take her long to get used to it.

Spoiled. Joe and his dad were eating a sandwich. Joe started to feel ill. The next day he was diagnosed with chorionic leukemia. He had to take many medications to ease the pain. Luckily he was finally able to go home early that morning.

Can't see who's calling. Jim went to the beach to visit his family. They had a blast swimming in the ocean. After several hours they decided to leave the beach. They decided to drive to the nearby gas station. They drank some of their beer.
Animal safari fun. We went on a safari in Alabama. We went on several safari trips. We saw many wildlife. The safari got lost. We were glad to go home and explore.

Out of Beer. Ned was having lunch. He was in the cafeteria with his friend. After lunch he realized his friend was drinking beer. They went out to have lunch together. Ned was embarrassed for not telling his friend.

Home Econ. Nina's friends decided to go camping at her house. She put on her boots, boots, and gloves. When she woke up she smelled something burning. She looked around and saw that it was a fire cracker! She quickly took the cracker away from the fire and it died.

Cranky. Kathy was eating out with friends. She was at a restaurant. Suddenly, her waitress asked if she can be nice. Kathy tried to make the waitress laugh. Unfortunately, the restaurant was not having a good time.

Can't Click Away Fast Enough. A few weeks ago my boyfriend called me for breakfast. I thought I had gotten in the car and walked up to the couch. He told me I needed to watch the news and he didn't want to call me. I realized I didn't have to wait, I already checked my mail. I just needed to find my phone.

Too Hot For Ice Cream. When Jill's husband retired last summer, they had no extra money. Jill spent almost all of her money on ice cream. Her husband bought a hot cone for the summer. Her husband was not happy with how it tasted. His wife said Jill's ice cream had too hot for ice cream.

My niece. I was visiting from NY for the weekend. I saw that my niece was pregnant. We talked about our options on Facebook. She told me that she couldn't wait to take the baby. I agreed and we started planning a party to celebrate.

Jacob Breaks His Phone. Jacob notices that his phone is not working anymore. Jacob decides he can get a new phone for $20 cheaper. He goes to the electronics store and buys some new phones. Jacob has been using the phones for many months. Jacob is glad that his phone works so well.

Riley is too loud. Riley is really loud at home. He tries to find a way to get more out of his hearing. He goes to a music store and buys earplugs. Riley loves listening to music more. Riley's ears hurt much more with each time he listens to music.

Elizabeth can't kick. Elizabeth was playing a game of dodgeball. She took her ball to the ground. The ball fell and landed in Elizabeth's hand. Elizabeth tried to go for a punch, but the ball hit her in the eye. Elizabeth had to be hospitalized for a few days.

Cleaning the house. My cat loves to clean my dirty house. I decided to give her some cleaning spray. I sprayed the spray over the house. I put some into the cat's cage. Then I used a broom to remove the litter.

Too Fat. Jane started running in gym class one day. She tried to stay fit, but she ended up being overweight. Jane found out her weight problem was due to exercise. Jane started to read a book about how to exercise properly. Jane began to lose weight with a diet.
Small world. I was sitting in a class while I read a book. A girl asked me to come to the class. I had to say yes. She then gave me a small hug. It made the whole class very happy.
Going to School. I tried to study the English syllabus. It was not very difficult. I made a lot of mistakes. I was also unable to finish the class. I had to go home and study it.

Mahabharata. When I was in college I got to write Mahabharata. I wrote it in English in 1975. I read it almost every day for years. Eventually I got my book published. I made a lot of money and now I read many more Mahabharata.

Blanket head. Sam and Sue were playing basketball in their basement. Sam decided to give Sue a blow up balloon. Sue put the balloons in a bucket. Her friends got mad and threw her one too hard. They threw the balloons everywhere.
The Promotion. Gina didn't want to work at her current job. She would like to do well on tests. She tried applying to all the different schools. She did and they did. Her boss loved her promotion.

Sledgehammer. Bob went sledding down a snowy hill. He pulled up and noticed that he was out of his size. He decided to give himself a special sled for a surprise. Bob was excited to see a giant ice giant. When he got home, Bob put up a giant sign for a new sled.
Being rude. My wife bought me a drink last night. I was really drunk. It was very good and I wanted to eat it. However, I got into a fight with my wife. I ended up leaving and she got mad.
Test. Joe was studying for a test. Joe did not know the answers. He decided to go to the library. There, he studied for 5 hours. Joe scored an A on his test.

The Pencil. Bob sat on the floor looking at his homework. He was taking a math test. He didn't bother studying as he didn't want to mess up. He picked out a new pen for the test. The next day his grades improved a lot!

The Babysitter. Sam always wanted a new puppy. Her friend suggested she visit her mother to ask for one. After talking, she got on the phone and rang. Sam's mother agreed to take her to the shelter. She took her home and brought the puppy with her.

Dark Stranger. My grandmother went camping last night. We took her with us to her cabin. They put some heavy duty stuff on it to build the tent. They also put on a light to illuminate the outdoors. It turned out to be a dark tent that was really creepy.

Mounting Bills. There was an old lady at the store who asked me to help her move her things. I told her that my niece had moved to the attic. She thanked me very much. I took her into my arms and took her outside. She was sad that she had to take her niece out of the store.

Addictive Game. Nancy was addicted to the addictive games. She had tried everything from candy and crack to games of all sorts. As a result, she found herself getting bored and not paying attention. One day she decided to try some new video games. The addictive games were so addictive that she was addicted to them all.

Marco Visits Utah. Marco is going on a trip to Utah. He has never been before so he can't help but be apprehensive. It is a very hot desert, but Marco can't wait for his trip. At the end of the day, Marco has a great time. Marco loves visiting Utah and going to Utah.

The Interview. James had been waiting a long time to get an interview for his college. His friends were very nervous about this and decided to ask him out. cookies. My friend had a cookbook and we decided to make cookies. I decided to make cookies and put a little flour into the mix. However, it took me a long time to get everything together. I ended up giving up because the batter was too dry. I decided to make my own dough and bake it for myself.

New Car. My husband took us to a new car dealership to find a new car. It was very expensive. We all bought our new cars. I loved the car so much that I never stopped buying it. I would purchase it for a good reason.
Cute Girl. My niece was about to start high school. I sent her out to look for her. She was so cute! She looked for us all over town! When we left, we made sure she was okay.

Broken Stove. Dan was putting together an electric drill. He ran his drill into a socket. It would not work properly. He had to push his new set of tools through the socket. Dan couldn't find the socket, so he had to use a tool with his own.

Snowstorm. Yesterday was the last day of the winter break. I woke up early and went to the store. There was snow on the ground. I decided to stay and enjoy the snow. I left late.

Saying Hello. I took my dog out for a walk today. He came back right away and jumped on the rug. When I got to the front of the store, I realized it was empty. I had forgotten to turn on my dog's light. I told the employee what happened, and he was fired.

The Code. Ella's mom was in charge of her daughter's school. The code was in her daughter's room. But she didn't know the code! Ella's mom explained the code to her daughter. Ella's daughter loved the code.

The Bar. The girl who went to work was so bored. She had no work. She decided to try an art project. She put the art on her desk and walked over to it. She did not like that, she didn't want to be bored.

Ice Cream. There was ice cream everywhere. It was so great I wanted to try it. I ordered it as soon as I got home. It was the best thing I've ever tasted. When I got home I took a bite and thanked my mom.

Car Lock. I was at a party one day and I needed to change a tire. When I came to the tire store they were not happy about it. I asked their staff if I could make them change one. They looked so silly they had to make me change my tires. So I did and had to wait for another tire.

bank. My friend gave me a card to deposit a check into. I went to the ATM and deposited a check. I called the bank and began to deposit the check. The bank sent me another one. I deposited the next check and was able to get a good deal.

A Snack. I decided to go to a store and buy some snacks. I picked the most delicious fruit and veggies. It was a cold day so I went to the store and grabbed my bags. I tried to buy a few snacks but they were too expensive. I finally went home and bought my snacks.

Trey's Soup. Trey wanted to make a soup. He gathered all of his ingredients. He was nervous about how he would cook the soup. When he was done, he was excited to see how well it did. Trey enjoyed himself after that soup.

Losing a Wallet. Allie was shopping for her son. She wanted a gift. Allie decided to give him a gift card. When her son got to the gift store she had a different gift. She had bought the right gift card.

Wolf in Sheep's Clothing. My husband and I were walking down the street. Suddenly, the wolf came running up the fence. It had no collar and was barking at us! We saw a man holding a stick and ran over to it. The wolf was really angry with us, as he'd used it to get us a dog.

Greg's party. Greg had a party at his house one night. He was really drunk. He threw a party and everyone got drunk. Everyone was really scared to go to a party like that. Greg didn't want to go to that party.

Christmas Gift. I had a great Christmas last year. I opened the gifts every year to take them home. I opened gifts in the living room and went to bed. I made sure the gifts were clean and in good shape. On the day of the gifts I made sure my son received them.

College advertisement. Amy was a student. She had made an ad in her biology class. The class was excited to hear the advertisement. A month later Amy was given an A on the ad. The teacher was very surprised!

Home Perm. I used to go into the store for groceries. I would use the store's parking garage to access our cars. I would use the garage to purchase snacks. One day I realized that I had forgotten to turn the garage off. I was grounded for 2 weeks.

A Car Baby. Maryann was walking through her school hallway. She saw a very small baby looking at her. The baby was very tiny and had eyes. Maryann ran to the door and waited for the baby. The baby was very tiny and Maryann loved the sight.
Slow keyboard. I wanted to get an iPad. I went to the store. I tried the new keyboard. The keyboard was too slow. I had to buy an iPad.

Pretty Pictures. We were trying to get together on Valentine's Day. We didn't want anyone else to be there. My niece came over and hugged me and said I was really special. We spent the day together laughing and laughing together. We finally went out and had some pictures.

sky. My sister-in-law's husband was recently diagnosed with cancer. He had died in 2006. My sister-in-law is going to miss her husband. She told me she will miss him forever. I feel like she should go back to work.
Tonight's Supper. I woke up to a very sad sound. I ran into the kitchen. I found the dog curled up on the couch. I grabbed the dog by her collar. I brought the dog back home to her mom.

Interesting Run. I was running an amusement park near my home. As I turned around I heard a loud bang. I couldn't find my car, so I looked. I saw that my car was totaled. I ran in the street to try to find my car.

Jana Looks For A Home. Jana was searching for a new apartment. She looked at the vacancy listings and found a home she liked. She called her sister and asked her where to look. Jana was delighted to see her sister. Jana called her sister and thanked her.
Fajitas. My mother made fajitas and I loved it. She gave me two bowls to try it out. They were salty and not my favorite. However, I gave it one of a few puffs. I tasted it and I loved it!

Earl gets in trouble. Earl was driving a white van. He needed to get a driver's license. Earl was worried he wouldn't make it on time. When he got into his driveway, he realized he was going to crash. He pulled over and waited in the back of the van.

Sharks at the Aquarium. The aquarium at the beach was in an abandoned house. The owner of the house was angry at them because they were too noisy. The man agreed and took his son's place at the aquarium.
Jealousy. Kerry went to the casino. She wanted to win a big prize. She bet a hundred dollars. To her surprise she won. She went home and ate a burger.

The broken arm. Jill's mom went to the hospital to have a check-up with the doctor. The doctor examined Jill's arm and told her she needed surgery. Mike's Mountain Adventure. Mike was excited for his first adventure. He was about to descend a mountain. When he was about to start, he noticed a huge patch of rock. He jumped on it and saw that it was a bear. He jumped off and continued on his trip.

Baby Passport. I bought a passport for my daughter to go to NYC. She has not yet gotten her driver's license. I emailed her the photos of her flight to the airport. She is very excited to see the photos and look forward to it. I am happy I received the passport photo.

Media Day. The local news station announced a press conference. The program featured a report on the news about an upcoming hurricane. Hoping for a snow day. Jody was out for a walk. She noticed a lot of snow falling and saw a store to buy snow. Jody went to the store to buy some shovels. She went into the store to buy supplies. Jody returned home and went back to enjoy the snow.

President. I have to vote in a presidential election. I've been studying my life for years. I've never felt the need to vote for a candidate. I decided to vote in a presidential election. I am glad I did.

Visiting Santa. When I went to visit Santa in April, my friends and I celebrated with his company. When we left, he was waiting in a park. Bicycles are Fun. I rode a bike for a few weeks. One day I took too many risks. I had to pull over in front of a bus. There were two people on the bus who looked really weird. I took one last bike ride, and it was fun.

A grade. Sara got a C in biology and had to learn a lot. She needed the right answers to her questions to get the highest grades. She decided to take a test at night to try and pass her test. When she woke up she felt sick but ready to go. She took her test, made a new class, and got an A!

Creepy Basement. A girl named Tami got a creepy looking ceiling fan in her room. It scared her so bad it ruined her house. She was so upset that she left it alone all the time. She went to the store to buy some new ones. She was glad she had the fan in her room so she could play on it.

Cat and Dog. My wife's cat and dog had a litter of puppies in June. They kept them in cages for a while. She and my wife got rid of the litter every day. She has puppies and kittens now and wants them back. They both said that they would love it, though they can't.

Alternative. I was watching a movie with my sister. The movie was about a boy named Henry. Henry is a bully and tries to bully me with my sister. I thought that I should be a good boy so that I wouldn't be bullied. However, Henry is a violent bully who makes me laugh out loud.

Mario. My wife found a book at the grocery store. It was a story of her husband's life. She read it as if it was real. She was so happy! She ended up buying the book that day.

The Closet. John's room was very cluttered. He hated having to wash clothes. He used a vacuum cleaner every time he washed. He was annoyed that he couldn't see anything. He decided to purchase a new cloth and use it everyday.

The Surprise House. The family had been together for two months. It had been a long winter, but they were excited for spring. They packed up their things and left the house. There, they found the perfect surprise! They had finally had a surprise for the winter!
Fair. The Fair took place on Saturday, June 26. The winner was announced on the day of the race. There were no rules at the race. Everyone had fun. The day of the race was a fun day for everyone.

Hungry. When Tim bought a new watch, he had to throw it out. The other day he saw a brand new watch that he liked. He asked his wife if she'd like to use the brand new watch. She said yes, and Tim was happy. Tim was happy to be able to use the new brand and use it every day.
Grilled cheese. My husband loves grilled cheese. When we were in California he had it every year. I told him I didn't know, but he agreed. We ate it every day. Grilled cheese was my favorite!

First dibs. I was feeling sluggish after finishing my test. But I was already tired after drinking a gallon of water. I tried to start drinking it at the gym. But it tasted too bland. I went back home.

Gerry. Gerry wanted to get a horse for her birthday. She called up all her friends but none were willing to go on her birthday. She knew she had to be sure she got the right horse. Gerry decided to get the horse for himself. She had a wonderful birthday and wished she had gone to the store.

ice cubes. Amy bought ice cubes. They were the best in the world. She thought it would be delicious. Her husband did not enjoy them. She hated it.

The Anime. I watched the anime of my favorite anime series. I took a seat and looked at the shows. I found the shows to be very enjoyable. However, I got bored of watching anime after that. I became a fan of anime after that.

England. Tanya took a trip to England to visit her grandparents. She had always wanted to see England, but had never taken a trip. Tanya thought about the sights that there was to see. At the end of the trip she had a great time. Tanya felt happy because she was so excited about her visit.

Fast Playing. Kelly wanted to play the violin. But she did not know how to play fast enough. She asked her mom for a tutor. His favorite teacher taught her the art of fast playing. Kelly felt happy to learn fast play.
The Contest. Jane loved reading. She entered her favorite book in a contest. At first she was intimidated. Then she thought it would be a great idea. Jane won the contest.

Heavy rainstorm. There was a heavy rain storm in Alabama. There was lightning everywhere. I was forced to go outside and use the restroom. When I got home I turned on the sprinkler. I got a good sunburn.

Home Work. Kim needed to start a garden when she was four. It was very hot outside in the summer and she didn't have much room. She decided to plant a carrot in the fall. It was so beautiful! Kim enjoyed gardening with the new plants.
Sea Turtle. I went to the beach yesterday. I saw a sea turtle on the shore. It was a tiny fish. It was covered in scales. I thanked him profusely.
Dinner. Jim's girlfriend went on a date. It was his first time. He was very excited. Afterwards, he invited the date. The date went great and Jim got a great date.

Regrets. Jim had a baby. He had a small baby with a new name. The name was John. Jim got very upset and decided to change it. Jim was embarrassed to tell his parents the new name.

Protest. Yesterday at school, there were protests by students. A boy and a girl went up against each other. The boy tried to get the girl to stop. She yelled at him. He pushed the girl back.

Race. Tommy wanted to go to a race. He was very nervous. He called his friend to ask his opinion on the race. His friend said that his friend was not interested in him. Tommy told his friend that he should run instead.

The Scissors. Karen was playing with her mother's tools. But then she saw a scary looking box. She looked and saw the scissors! It was the scissors from her grandma. So Karen decided to try them on her.

Tom Gets a Mechanical Keyboard. Tom had just gotten a new laptop. He was trying to find some games to play with. He tried some of them on the laptop and it wouldn't work. Tom had to use a different mouse to play a few games. Tom was able to play all the games on his new laptop.
Movies. Joe was working on his first movie. Joe had to give it a shot. Joe was very excited. He loved to read the film. Joe loved the movie and gave it a shot.

FB Affair. Tom was in love with his girlfriend at school. She invited him over for dinner to eat. Tom was surprised to see her sitting around with his dog. He thought the dog was just looking for fun. Tom was disappointed but happy to have a new friend.
Sinking Boat. When I went to shore, I saw an iceberg. I went back to get a towel. I put the boat back in the dock. The boat sank right over the shore. I was so proud of my fishing skills.

The Man with the Cane. Bill was driving home from work. Suddenly, Bill's car started a loud noise. Bill realized he had been pulled over by a cop. Bill asked a woman to help him. The cop gave him a ticket and Bill got a new car.

Girl Scout Cookies. Alicia was excited to have a girl scout cookie. It was a new kid cookie for her. It was about a guy and her dad. She didn't know anyone who did it. The next day Alicia and her dad found out.

Car accident. John went for a walk in his neighborhood. A large truck passed by on the way there. The driver was speeding down the street. John turned his head to look at his brother. The driver saw his brother and crashed into John.

The Turkey Leg. I was cooking dinner for a party. It was a very hot night and the house was burning. It had started to thaw the meat and the vegetables. I could barely get a clean dinner in my kitchen. I had forgotten I had a turkey leg, so I ended up cooking for my friends.

A lost wheel. I was in the grocery store one day and needed to buy some groceries. I went to the counter and asked for the cashier's name. When she handed me her name, I felt very sad. I went back to check the cart, but she had no money. So I called her in tears and thanked her.

Exchange. I was going through my credit check in my old job. I got to the check, but it had been declined. I couldn't find a new job anywhere. I finally found the perfect job on the other side of the company. Now I'm at a small company with decent pay.

Down the Stairs. Tom was at a dinner party. He saw a group of people who wanted to go down the stairs. Tom decided to walk down them and bring them lunch. He had a good time and invited them over for a beer. Tom and his friends went down the stairs and had a great time.

Spaghetti. Randy had always wanted a vegetarian. He went to his local vegetarian restaurant. They had a special vegetarian dish. Randy was surprised by how good it was. He got a lot of meat on the plate!

The Track Meet. Janet was on her first track meet. She was nervous because she had never trained before. At the first meet, Janet felt better. She didn't think she did well at the race though. Janet felt discouraged that she would not win.

Used Books Suck. Allie was feeling sad that she had no money. She decided to donate books to a library. But after she read the books, the library owner did not accept them. Allie tried to explain the situation to the owner, but couldn't. So she donated a lot of the books to the library.
The Burger. My boyfriend and I had lunch at a local Mexican restaurant. We ordered a burger. He did not like the taste. We ordered the other two. We ordered the burger.

The Accidental Crime. The man was walking home from school. He heard a loud noise coming from the apartment. He looked around and saw a man struggling. He looked outside and saw a man holding a knife. The man was trying to stab the man in the leg.

Making Music. John wanted to find a good instrument to play on his piano. He went to the piano store but they were out of his budget. John picked out a piano that sounded amazing. He bought the piano and practiced his piano every day. After months of practicing, John was a musician!

beach. Kate bought a bunch of vegetables and fruit. She went out for a walk. She walked past the bushes. There was a dog on the grass. She decided to go home and see if it was gone.
