Fall. I had never been on a fall. I decided to take my girlfriend there. I went over the top of a tree to climb. We both fell to the ground. It was the most fun I've had at the party.

The Old Lady's Boots. Sheila's little sister always went to school with the boots. One day she lost the old lady's boots. Sheila was sad but determined to find her new boots. She searched all over the house looking for them. Finally, she found her new boots and went outside.
Bookmarks. Amy wanted to learn how to find her bookmark. She had no clue where to look. She did not have a compass. Her brother found a few bookmark spots to start. Amy had a great idea.

What Shade. Tom was at school. He noticed his friend's green friend was very ugly. Tom thought about what to wear for a fun day out. He bought the perfect shade for his friend. Tom was very happy with his friend's looks.
Feeding Frenzy. Tom had to take a trip. He had to go to a food court and get ice cream. The food was out of his reach. Tom was late. Tom got a sandwich instead.

Math pride. It was Halloween night and I wanted to make a Halloween costume. I bought some Halloween costumes and began working. I created a little monster and hid it under the couch. I did not think it would get any friends. Instead I got lots of good reviews on facebook.

Computer Problems. Jim had a very simple computer. Jim was worried about losing money. Jim talked to his family about how he could save money. The next day he received a package that said you could get free stuff. Jim got a great bonus for helping others.

The Futon. Riley loved to read the same stories over and over again. One day he was reading a whole book on an Futon. He was surprised to see that it looked really cool. Riley was so happy with how it turned out. He immediately started reading the whole book again.

Ghost Sheet. Tami woke up to her parents not knowing her parents name. She searched the house, and found a note that said she had gone out. The letter was from a person who knew Tami's parents name. The letter said Tami had gone out and left. Tami wished she had never gone out on her own.

Cooking Class. Nora had always wanted to try out cooking classes. It seemed she'd gotten everything she needed at the school. At the end of the first semester, Nora had a cook out the next week. At the end of the year, Nora had a cooking class. She couldn't wait to go back to class!

Ronald's Speech. Ronald decided to attend a business class. He was nervous that he would not be able to speak with the class. Ronald felt nervous so he practiced at home. Ronald did a few interviews at his local bar. Ronald was able to speak to the class.
Hot sun. Gina's friend was walking in the house. She asked if she could take her friend in. But no one agreed. Gina took her friend inside. She was so excited, she forgot her sunscreen!
Walking in the woods. Bob was out hiking alone. A bear was chasing a squirrel. Bob was too scared to go on his own. He grabbed a rock and went back to the trail. The bear had followed him!
Movies. My friends invited me to a movie with them. We watched a couple of movies together. The one that i had the most fun was The Reunion. It was very good. We all had a good time.
Cell Phone. Abe was bored with his cell phone. He asked a girl for a ride. He tried to ask her to borrow one from him. The girl was too shy to ask him. He told Abe she would call her later.

Dad's Comet. Gina's dad was in the store at night. He noticed that the clock on the display was ticking. He told his daughter not to worry about the clock. She did. When she looked back at the clock, the clock stopped ticking.
Trouble Board Game. Nancy was playing a board game. She got frustrated. She ran over to the board. She lost control of the board. She ran into a brick wall and broke the game!
Ring. Lily was at a party. Her husband was dancing. He had a ring. She put it on and admired it. She told him it was a good gift.

Puzzle game. Lucy was a very good puzzle game developer. She wanted to play a new puzzle game. She looked in her home game store for a game. She saw a tutorial and bought the game. Lucy had an idea and loved playing the game.
Taking my cat to the vet. It was a warm, sunny day. I decided to walk my cat. I decided to take her home. I took her home and then put her in a carrier. When she arrived, she was very happy.

Healthy. Mona had a small dog named Kitten. Kitten didn't eat the food that Mona prepared. Mona put Kitten in the garbage. She was not sure if she'd still be able to eat Kitten. Mona's dog was always sick to the bone.
Power House. Cathy needed a place to park her car. She found a Power House. Cathy looked around. The car had been stolen. Cathy decided she would never park her car there again.

New Job, Old Fear. My wife was sick of working. She went back to her old job and felt good. Her old coworkers were also nice, and it made her happy. She became more comfortable working in her new job. Now, my wife is happy and ready to work again.

New Jersey. John's family moved to New Jersey when he was five years old. His father was a very wealthy banker. He worked for the governor, but John never left his father's side. He had always feared his father would be his big brother. John and his family went to live with his grandparents in New Jersey.

The Peace Corps Beckons Again. It was time for the Peace Corps to start its annual program. The president had approved the Peace Corps program. However, the Corps was out of volunteers. The President asked the President if there could be another one. The President said he would consider a similar program.

Money. Katherine went to a casino. The jackpot was $40,000. Katherine checked all the numbers for the winning number. She had a lot of money in her checkbook. She used her checkbook to buy a gift card to take care of her bills.

Smell. Gina had just made an apple pie when she saw something awful. She had a terrible smell in her kitchen. She tried to figure out what the smell was. She realized her cat kept chewing on it. Gina was so mad that she ate it all the way back to her car.

Infestation. Benny was a very paranoid person. He would take his wife and kids to the beach every summer. One day he was watching movies at night. Suddenly his wife called to complain about the mosquitoes outside the window. Luckily, Benny had an exterminator installed and they went on a safe walk.

The Walk. My friend and I went for a walk in the woods. We took out our picnic basket. Then we went to the trail. We climbed a few trees and walked for a bit. We looked out the window, but nothing like what we expected.
Cheater Cheater. Tim had a friend who cheated on him. Tim felt bad for the friend. Tim's friend called the police. They investigated the case. They arrested Tim.

First Day of School. I had just moved into my new apartment. I had been taking a first year in kindergarten. All of a sudden the first day of school started to fall apart. My son started crying. I decided to take him home and help him with his problem.

Jasmine gets her car stolen. Jasmine was shopping for a new car. It was time to take her kids to the store. As she approached the store the lights went off. Jasmine realized she left the key in her car. She took the car to a pawn shop.
Being Missed. Tom was at school in the morning. He was nervous. A girl saw him and ran away. Tom felt awful. Then he remembered he was missing class.

Martha's Reward. Martha needed to make dinner. She wanted to have dinner for her family. She went to the store and bought chicken. Martha made the dinner and added it to her family's meal. Martha's family thanked her for the dinner.

Stress reliever. Bill had a huge baseball game at work. He kept losing. One day he tried his best effort. He gave his team a chance to win. It went well for him and helped to help his team win the game.

Fool's gold. Jenna had an important project to do. She spent the night playing hide and seek with friends. When the night was over she had money and pencils to make a movie. Jenna got a script written and put it in her journal. Jenna was pleased with the movie she wrote!
Waiting. My mother was waiting outside to be picked up. A man came with a box of coins. He asked me if he had seen my mother. I said no. I walked to the store and got my coin.

The Girl. Jill's cousin had gone to her mom's. Her aunt and uncle were in the lobby. Her aunt had told Jill she would go there when her cousin came. Jill knew the girl had been watching television. She was afraid she would be caught by the police.
expensive troubles. Tim was at the fair. It was time to buy him a drink. He found a bottle of iced coffee in a cupboard. Tim drank it. It cost a lot of money to clean up.

The Art Thief. Rufus had been trying to paint some artwork for a while. He would often use brushes and paintbrush to fill his canvas. Eventually he decided to give up the hobby entirely. After a few more years he decided that his art was really old. Rufus decided to stop trying to paint and just start a new hobby.

Dental work. I have to do dental work every day. I work from home and take all my exams. Afterwards, my dentist tells me how much work to do. I also get to work late every day. I will start to make more money from this job.

Sign Language. Lois was trying to write her English paper. Unfortunately, her paper was not as fast as her friend's. So Lois couldn't sign the paper. So her friend asked her to sign the English paper. Lois didn't want to pay someone to write her paper.

Pregnant again. Kelly and Kim were going through a difficult divorce. Kim and Kelly both thought it would be ok to break up. However Kelly thought it was very difficult to work together. Kim told Kelly not to say anything until she was ready to leave. It was also important to Kelly, because it had been a long time.

Kate. Kate was a new babysitter at a small town. She was excited to help kids get along. But one day, Kate's husband was making fun of her for being so quiet. Kate got on the phone to her husband and confronted him. Kate's husband stormed out the next day, angry at her and her husband.

First Day of School. Lucy needed a new school to attend. She went to the new school. Lucy learned that there was a bus full of kids. Lucy asked the kids if they wanted to stay with her. After an hour of waiting they all decided to stay.
It was his call. I was riding my bike home from work one day. A stranger was behind me. He said he was riding his bike. I asked him what was wrong. He said he wasn't wearing a helmet.

Blind Date. Sam needed to find a new job. He looked in the newspapers and talked to his friends. Sam asked for a job and had no luck. He went to an interview and ended up being fired. Sam felt horrible but didn't care because he wasn't gay.

Paying off credit card. Tina got a credit card online. She went to the card store and looked around. She found out that she could have paid by check. The company didn't accept credit cards. Tina had to go to the cashier to pay.
New Phone. The man opened the box. There was an old camera. He opened it to take a picture. His phone came out and it was not working. He had to call a few friends to fix the phone.

Fast Food Party. I got together with friends over the weekend. We tried a few food and tried a few drinks. We really had a great time. When it was time to get home we had to order pizza. It was a big success.
Out of Hot Water. Tom was walking in the street. He noticed a cool water fountain. It had shut down and he was having a hard time. Tom's dog ran up to get him. Tom gave him water and ran away.

Belly. Jenny was tired of eating a burger. Her stomach began to hurt. She decided to go to the hospital. The doctor found out that she had a stomach virus. Jenny could eat the burger for a rest of her life.

Late Night Swimming. When I was little I took my sister and her friends out to a pool. The pool was really quiet and I had no idea where we were. One night I had trouble swimming so I had to run to the nearest house. After we left we decided to swim. Once home we were both glad to be swimming.

Big Moose. One day Mike decided to visit a local pet store. He decided on an elephant. He thought it would be fun. When he tried to feed the elephant it was dead. He returned the elephant to the store.
He Returns. Bob went to get a beer at the bar. He bought a new grill. He then went back to the bar. The grill had been stolen! Bob went home and realized it was him that stole it.

Snow Day. I decided to put on my best snowman snow suit. I got out the sled and got down. I pushed my snowman and the sled fell over. My husband came out to fix the snowman. I felt so good I was so happy!
The Great Coach. Larry was the coach of a basketball team. He was a great leader. The coach wanted a change. Larry agreed to let players play for free. Larry became the new leader of the team.

Laughing At Good Price. Tim bought a new television. He decided to try it out on a local TV station. He was excited to see how good it would be. When the station ran its ad, they paid him for it. Tim was so excited he yelled at them.

Jenny. Jenny was really unhappy when her friend didn't come over. It was a really hot day, so Jenny decided to leave. When her friend came over, Jenny felt even more stressed. The next day, Jenny realized she had to leave. She started a new job in a different town, but Jenny was happy.

Musician Signs Himself. Iggy had signed up for his first concert. He really wanted to see a different band. He decided to try out for the band. It was not for him though. The band was good, but not great.

The World Series. The baseball team was playing in the big championship game. The team was very good so they kept winning. Their pitching was terrible. The other team lost by two runs. It was their best performance ever!

Hopscotch. My daughter's favorite show on Youtube is hopscotch. She always plays the piano. Last night I heard it play at the park. I listened to it for the whole next week. I wish she was better at it.

Dax's Decisions. Dax was a very fast man. He was the fastest man in the state. One day the school bus pulled up to his home. Dax went and walked inside. There, his brother said he needed a lot of time to get home.

A Trip to the Store. Tom had just returned from a trip to the store. He had planned on staying all night at the store. Unfortunately the weather turned out to be much worse. Tom had to walk home from the store. Tom wound up going to bed early.

Bill's Big Break. Bill went into the kitchen and saw that his son was gone. He called the police and reported the lost dog. The police came to the house and took the dog. They found the dog laying there in the yard. Bill was very sad that the dog had been lost.

Phone case. Anna looked through her backpack to find a phone case. She grabbed it and looked around. She couldn't find a phone case anywhere. Then, she realized that it was empty! Anna quickly picked up the phone and thanked her.
Quentin Tastes Cheese. Quentin was hungry. He searched the refrigerator. He saw nothing. Quentin looked under the table. Quentin's food had been spoiled.

Kitchen. Anna had ordered pizza. But it was way too expensive for her. Then her friends invited her over for a special treat. Anna and her friends ate at the local pizzeria. Anna's friends couldn't wait to try something different.

Mary's Flower Basket. Mary was making bouquets for her friends. She had a lot of flower baskets at home. She decided to add to them all in a few hours. She spent the rest of the day making many more. She was proud that her friends were going to love her flowers!
Tennis. Jake wanted to try out for the tennis team. So he practiced every day. Jake even went every other day. Jake was excited when he found out he made the team. Jake was so happy he made the team.

Kids in a Pool. Jared and his friends went to a pool. They decided to play in a pool. They started to play a lot and noticed a pool. They decided to try to swim in the pool. Soon the kids were all out and happy.
Buying Water. I was at the park with my girlfriend. The kids were going to play. I brought water to drink. I started to drink water. When it was done, I started to play.

First Credit Card. I was nervous about buying a new credit card. I went to the bank to make my purchase. They gave me my credit card number. The security guard didn't believe me at first. After a few minutes, he gave me my card number.

Inventor. One day, a small child in a neighborhood shop approached. He asked the small child what to do with a hammer. The small child pointed the hammer at an egg in the street. The child yelled that the egg was for a museum! The small child's mother laughed, and made a point of taking the egg to the museum.

Rude Joe. Joe decided to do some political campaigning. Joe bought a shirt to cover his eyes. When the weather was nice Joe started doing it on a rainy day. Joe got the shirts on and began to do it again. Joe had his shirt turned red and the weatherman called him rude.

Arm Wrestling. Bob's arm was hurting and breaking. He decided to get some stretching before work. He worked out for hours, stretching and even eating healthy foods. He was very pleased when it was done. Bob was able to keep his arm and improve his health.

Job Promotion. Nancy wanted a promotion as an electrical engineer. She looked everywhere for a promotion. Unfortunately, she didn't have enough money. So she went to the local union. They told her that she had to do something extra.
Noise Complaint. Nina was waiting for a bus. She was getting very nervous. Suddenly, the bus stopped. The sound of a noise caught her eye. She called the police.
The Drunk. Tom was at a bar. Suddenly, someone bumped his drink. Tom kept it. He was so drunk he tried to run away. A drunk driver swerved into a drunk man.

Doug has a problem. Doug has a big test in front of him and was really nervous. He has a good feeling that he will do well. He has a great feeling and gets his answers right. Doug has an important test tomorrow. Doug has made the best grade he has ever had.

School. Mandy was scared to start kindergarten. She decided to play with a new toy. She got out of the classroom to play with a new toy. The toy was a toy that looked very similar. Mandy and the boy played around for a while until she got home.
The White Dog. The man took out the dog. The dog ran in the yard. The man chased after the dog. The dog ran out the yard. The man caught the dog.

The Reporter. Jane thought she would like to go to the library. She was nervous because she had a crush on a man. She called her crush and asked if he was interested. When he answered she was in awe! The reporter smiled at Jane and told her to go with him.

Too much. Lacy's hair was starting to grow. She wanted to get it done but it was too much. She went to her hair stylist and told her to try again. She went to the store but the hair stylist left too much. Lacy decided to get another haircut instead.

Elms College. I've always wanted to learn how to ride a horse. I decided to take archery lessons at my college. I ended up winning the race. I decided to take archery lessons again. I am very proud of my accomplishment.

The one that perseveres. Betsy was sitting at home alone. But suddenly, something felt weird and exciting. Suddenly, Betsy saw a huge fish that was staring at her. And it was a giant fish. Betsy went inside and took it with her and ate it.

The Fruit Juice. Sam's mother said he could eat fruit. Sam looked around and noticed the fruit in the fruit jar. Sam picked up several packages and placed them in the jars. The next day, Sam saw he had forgotten one package. He brought the fruit home to pick it up.
The Wild Cat. John had a pet cat. It was a black tabby cat. John and his family lived in a tiny house. It lived in the very front yard. John got fed up with cats and had to move in with his family.

Rude Awakening. Ana woke up to her parents coming home from the library. She was scared and told them that she needed to relax. After a couple of days she was calm and content. When the parents came she realized that she was awake. Ana didn't realize what had been wrong with her.

Caterpillar Panic. We were eating fried chicken one day. It was a caterpillar. I got so mad, I ran to the kitchen to get a snack. As I was walking past my dishwasher, I saw a caterpillar. I ran into my neighbor's and took it away.

Gross Mold. Jenna was in a small hotel. It was full of moldy surfaces. Jenna decided to clean it up by washing it out. The mold got so bad that it left a permanent stain. Jenna had to call the local insurance company for an refund.

Monument. I went for a walk down the sidewalk. Suddenly I saw a man's shoe-covered shoes on the ground. I walked to him to see if he had any shoes. He gave me a look, and said, "I don't want to see you that high. I want to keep in mind that you can have the same shoes.

The Tire Machine. Tom worked at a car repair shop. Tom was unsure about the kind of tire he needed. He looked in a few places and saw that they were expensive. Tom called the repair people and began his day. The workers were friendly and helpful.

The extra cookies. Jill wanted extra cookies for the Christmas party. But she didn't have any money. She asked her friends to help. They spent all afternoon making some extra cookies. Jill's Christmas party was very delicious.
Shoes. Tim was feeling tired one day. He tried his best to stay awake. Then he felt his legs start to ache. Tim went to the doctor. He was told he needs to lose weight!

monster. John and his brother lived in the middle of the country. When John got in the car he heard someone yelling at him. He drove over and saw a monster coming up. John ran over to see what it was and saw the source. John got a gun and the monster came out and killed the monster.

Ray. Ray was very tall and thin. The doctor told Ray he had osteosarcoma. Ray decided to seek an osteopathic remedy. Ray went to the doctor and ordered a bone marrow transplant. Ray's doctor said the bone marrow was healthy and healthy.

Music man. When I was younger I loved to play music. One day I decided to enter a local band. I was excited to play and felt so confident. However my music was terrible and I was embarrassed to be playing. I went home and never played in a band again.

Lost. The car had been stuck in traffic for a long time. The mechanic told me that it had been towed. I tried to call the mechanic back but he kept waiting. Eventually, I was able to call someone out to fix it. They let me go and it finally came back to me.
The Bird. Rina's cat was a big brown bird. The cat loved to eat eggs. Rina liked to feed the bird eggs. The cat was very excited to learn about the egg hunt. The cat had a wonderful day!

Bird Friends. Anna's class went to a zoo to see how birds like animals. The zookeepers were very attentive. Anna went to feed birds with an earring. Anna got a really big bird to feed. It ate her entire bag of bird food!

Playing by the Pool. Cathy was a new member of the housekeeper's crew. She had come over for a nap and she had been having a hard time. Cathy wanted to make sure she was being helpful. She went in the kitchen and filled some milk and cheese to make jelly. Cathy made a good impression on her guests and they all drank well afterwards.

Max Cooks an Omelette. Max was feeling very hungry and couldn't figure out what to eat. He decided to make a grilled omelette. He put on his favorite pair of boots. Max cooked the omelette at a hot, sunny temperature. Now Max is a healthy and healthy eater.

Breakfast. I decided to eat a bowl of breakfast every day. Today I tried to eat it but it was too weak. I ended up falling out and broke my arm. Thankfully, I got better a few days later. I vowed never to try that again.

Peanut. I always make peanut butter sandwiches. They are super spicy. The only problem is that you have to mix it with butter. But I make peanut butter sandwiches anyway. I think I'll try this one tomorrow.
Dan loses a bet. Dan was a professional boxer. Dan lost to a professional boxer. Dan had a lot of money to win the fight. Dan got paid a large sum of money for the fight. Dan won the fight.

Erica Trips. Erica had decided that she wanted to take gymnastics. She was excited because she was always asked to try out. Her family encouraged her to go with them on her first trip. Erica went on her first trip to the gym. She was happy that she had a chance to try out for her school.

Casual Friday. Curtis was going on a business trip with his girlfriend. They had an hour long drive up to Las Vegas. He booked a cab to go to the Vegas Strip. He got to the Strip. After the drive to Las Vegas, Curtis couldn't wait to go back to sleep.

Too many favors. Kirk went on a fishing trip with his father. Kirk caught two fish and one caught none. He didn't know that he had to pay the fishing fees. Kirk decided to pay the fees anyway. He didn't regret it at all.

Snoring. I went to sleep because I didn't want to wake up. I tried to think of something to do for a long time. I looked all over the house to see if I could do anything. I finally sat down on the couch and went to sleep. I finally felt refreshed.

Gold Digger. Jill loved to collect rare gems. She bought a gold digger for her house. It was a small thing, but it would do a great job. Jill was able to buy enough gold to make many pieces. She sold her gold digger for a lot of money.

Poisonous Mushroom. One day my sister and I went to a local cafe. We had chicken nuggets and some mushrooms for lunch. I brought some chicken nuggets to sit next to my. I spilled water all over the floor. Luckily it took my little sister a few minutes to get over it.
Cupcakes. Lance was out for a walk. A squirrel approached him. The squirrel started feeding Lance cake. Lance fell and broke his leg. Lance had to pay for the pain.

He Wasn't Much of A Fan. He wanted to make his own pizza. His friend suggested he make some pizza dough. He kneaded the dough for a few minutes. He was so proud when it came out perfect. He was pleased when he tasted it.

Lessons. Dan was always a big basketball fan, and had a big game coming up. His favorite team was coming and needed some help. They couldn't afford the expensive equipment, so they made a video game. Dan decided that he should practice to help his team win. It wasn't that hard to do that but he did it fast and hard.

Uncontrollable. Sue was on the way home from work one day. She was walking her dog when she passed by a neighbor's shop. Her dog jumped out and got stuck. Sue went home and cleaned the dog up. Her dog returned and Sue's dog was allowed to keep his leash.

What color. I loved making strawberry ice cream. One day I forgot to take it home. It fell out of the freezer and was crushed! The ice cream was really salty and gross. I decided I should make homemade strawberry ice cream for everyone else.
Shelly's Lunch. I decided to make some lunch in the school cafeteria. I was too lazy to make it myself. My friend gave me a box to use. I opened it and started to eat. Shelly started to cry.

Visit to the Doctor. Jane was taking a vacation to the beach. She got some bad news. The doctors told her that her cat had died. Jane's cat had been taken in by the hospital. Jane went home that day with a lot of hope.
4K TV. My husband bought me a 4K TV. I was going to get it on Saturday night. The day of the party I told him I wanted it. He said yes. I gave it to him as a surprise.
Jerky. Ida's grandma was very hungry. She put some hot dogs and a burger into the fridge. Afterwards, she poured some jelly on it. Her grandma didn't notice. She felt satisfied when she ate it.

New Friends. My wife and I decided to go to the local restaurant. We ordered chicken. After a couple of minutes, it got very cold. We decided to go out for lunch. We all got warm but then got cold again.

Anything for Pizza. Kia had never cooked pizza before. The only problem was, she couldn't cook it herself. She decided to make a pizza with her friend's homemade sauce. They both enjoyed it but it was very bland. Kia decided to just throw the pizza away for good.

Unemployed. I found out that I need to work part time to pay my rent. It took me over a month to get my rent paid. After working for almost two months, I was able to pay my rent. On the way home I saw that my car was broken. It was worth it because I was able to get a job.
Major Switch. Joe's parents were always getting bored. It made Joe sad. He tried to turn on the radio. He could not find any other radio stations. Joe was forced to leave the house and go to sleep.

No Free Money. A woman in a car had to leave a restaurant in order to pay her rent. She was at a fast food restaurant. When she got out of the car, she saw that her card had expired. She realized that the money in her pocket was not her money. She called the number on her card to cancel the trip.
The Upset DJ. Tim was playing at a music festival. Someone grabbed him. Tim was in shock. The person kicked him out. Tim called an ambulance.

Check on it. Kathy's coworker had a pet parrot. Kathy's coworker didn't know who the parrot was and didn't want to get rid of it. Kathy made a list of things to do to protect the parrot. She asked for a letter of credit but the coworker said no. Kathy did not have to worry about what the letter would say.

Butch Awakens. A Chihuahua died at a farm. Butch had always been a little mean. One day, Andch's father told him to not approach a cow. Butch said he would and ran to the nearest fence. Andch learned to trust his dad.

Binge Watching. Lana hated binge watching movies. She thought they were boring. When she saw a movie she was hooked. But she knew what she wanted. She made a change and now she watches movies every day.

Lion. The goat came into my backyard with a big yellow horn. I brought it in and brought it home and pet it. I peted the goat's horn and took a picture. Then I sent it home with pictures. I named the goat lion.

Mopping the Floor. The mopping machine was having trouble. It took a long time to fix. Unfortunately the mopping floor was making noise. I had to buy a professional. I was able to install the mopped floor and move the machine.

Cooking. Alicia was going on a date with her boyfriend. She was nervous but decided to try to be brave. She waited outside to surprise him. But when he turned out of the house, she saw him! He had eaten all his food!

Fired. I sat at my computer all day, and nothing happened. Suddenly, the manager announced that my work had been given a new call. I immediately called my boss to tell him that it was for a new video game. His boss was very confused. I told him I was very excited to see the new video game.

Hotel Lobby. Kelsi's boyfriend and girlfriend were moving out of town. His boyfriend was visiting from out of town, and she needed to move. The hotel lobby was closed for two days. Kelsi and her boyfriend decided to go for a walk. After walking, Kelsi realized she forgot to bring a hotel key.

Boot Camp. My friends and I decided to visit a boot camp. We had a lot of fun. We had ice cream at every place we went. We also had ice cream sandwiches and some beer. Afterwards, we decided to hang out and play again.
Pantsuits are great for work. Joe loves to paint. He paints in his backyard every day. His favorite hobby is his pajamas. His pajamas will last for weeks. Joe is now a very good painter.

Hurting my mouth. It was the middle of summer and I was still feeling tired. I decided to stay out until it was sunny. My mom went to visit and asked if we could eat lunch together. After lunch we went home to take a shower. I was too lazy to eat alone.

Diapers. My daughter's old diaper bag was missing. She said she got a replacement one for free online. I contacted the store but was told there was no refund. I called the store but was told no refund was due. I decided to buy the new bag for her.
The Perfect Couch. Tom was walking through the park. He saw a couple of coyotes. He quickly picked up a pair of camo pants. He put them on and walked around. Tom made sure his feet didn't get soaked.
Lunch box. Lily decided to make a new lunch box. She did not have enough money to make it. She started sewing. She did not want to be late again. She made the perfect lunch box.

Midnight mass. Sue's family went to an outdoor mall. They were looking for a few nice women to hang out with. They were very bored so they had none. They decided to head to the mall. They decided on the beach, and everyone had fun.

Broken Heart. Drew was having a hard time keeping a straight face. His girlfriend had told him to go to bed early because it was dark. Drew was so tired and didn't want to go to bed. When the night came, Drew fell asleep to a thunderous wind. Drew awoke to his broken heart.

Teaching French. Tim was a great English teacher. He was doing great in his class. Tim worked hard to improve his teaching skills. He was proud that his students had improved. He felt very proud of himself for making a difference.

The Dance. It was Billy's first time at the dance. He had a lot of new ideas for his routines. He started to experiment and make new dances. When Billy performed his own dance routine, everyone loved it. The crowd cheered Billy on and helped him win the ribbon.

Mean women. Kia's boyfriend wanted to see her again. He was a man who was always mean and annoying. Kia decided to try hard to be mean to him. He went on facebook to message him constantly. She felt very comfortable about it.

The purse. Bella was at her favorite candy store. She opened up a gift card to give to the employee. The employee gave Bella a fake purse. Bella gave the fake purse back to the employee. The employee gave Bella a new one.

The Easter Present. Anna was planning to bring her Easter present to school. She made a list of all the things she wanted. She got her list and read it out loud. Anna read it out loud and thought she'd do well. Anna's teacher said she could bring the present to school on Easter!

Love Song. One day Jim was playing a song in class. He thought it was a love letter. Then Jim forgot his own name. He felt awful for forgetting that name. After a few more hours of listening, Jim felt better.
Eyeglass Debacle. I needed to buy some makeup. I couldn't afford it. But my friend suggested it as an alternative. I went to an eye doctor. They told me that it was a great idea.

Cold Sore. I was sitting with my dog eating cereal when he started coughing. He started sneezing quickly, so I put some warm milk in his mouth. After a few minutes I stopped him, and he started coughing again. I went into my room, and examined him with some suspicion. He had gotten pneumonia, so I immediately put some cold milk in his mouth.

Headed to France. The weather was good. There was no wind so I decided to take a taxi to Paris. It was dark so I was scared I wouldn't get in. As it turned out I had enough gas so I made a stop near the airport. When I got there it was so foggy I had to drink two glasses!

Pain in the Back. Anna was walking in the neighborhood. Suddenly, she realized something was wrong. She tripped on a wet ground! The wet ground was starting to move the dirt from her feet. Anna had to get a job to fix it.
Mild Food. I was at the grocery store. I ordered a large burger. However, I did not like the way the burger looked. I decided to go home. I then ordered another large burger.

Seeing an Ex. When i was little my grandmother told me that we could visit. We went in a big hotel and my mom and dad went inside. We took pictures of the exhibits and they were so great. I didn't have anything else I wanted so I went to bed. I went back to my grandmother when i got up from the room.

Joan. Joan was tired of the idea of her boyfriend being a father. She decided she would get a divorce. She contacted the lawyer, but he never replied. Finally Joan's lawyer was able to talk to her ex-boyfriend. Joan felt better about moving out of the house.

Keyboard. Lizzy and her son Joe were playing in their basement. They were playing with the keyboard for a long time. Suddenly, they noticed that Joe's was missing. Lizzy ran outside and searched his room. Finally she found Joe's keyboard under the keyboard.
Baking Hand Pies. I bought a new bakery for Christmas. I decided to bake hand pies. All I had was bread and icing. I mixed it together and baked them. Afterwards I served them to my guests.
The wrong cake. Norman was making a new cake. He accidentally cut the cake out. It came out horribly. Luckily Norman's wife came over to help him. He had a cake he made the next day.

A New Pet. Jim took his new dog for a walk on a sunny afternoon. He heard a loud crunching sound coming from his front door. When he opened it, his dog wasn't there. Jim opened the door, and saw a raccoon in a corner. Jim chased the raccoon off and it got away.

School for the Blind. When I was little, my mom took me to the local library. The books I needed were too expensive. I searched through them for books to read. When I finally found one, I had to look everywhere. The librarian found it all there.
Mom's Cookies. The mom decided she needed a new cookie. She wanted the best cookie she could find. She looked in all her freezer bags. She found the perfect batch. She went to eat the cookies.

From New to Broken. Jill started a new job at the local convenience store. She was very nervous when she got to work that day. She thought that she would be the first one to come in and make the change. Her coworkers got her to go to the store and she changed into a new outfit. The new outfit was very cute and Jill really liked it.

A cat. It was late at night when Anna found a stray cat in her kitchen. She quickly grabbed the cat and ran to the pantry. Her cat looked scared and very afraid. She crept into the pantry and snatched the cat's coat off the floor. Anna realized that cats didn't need coats, and decided to put on some socks.

Unorthodox Choice. Susie was running for school board. She went to school on a bus to make sure everyone was safe. When Susie went to make sure everyone had a seat, she saw a teacher. Susie wasn't afraid, she had been warned. Susie made a decision and made the bus safe.

The Story. Tina was the star of the new television show. She had never made a living. She got a job working at a grocery store. But she never had the money to pay rent. And she became a full-time waitress.

Kind Words. Anna was in class. She forgot her teacher's name. Anna looked around the classroom for her teacher. Anna asked her teacher if she could pick out a name. Her teacher smiled at Anna and smiled again.

Barefoot. Sandy was walking down the street. She heard a horrible crash and looked down. There was a dog on the ground. She had no idea what it was. Her friend helped her pick up the dog and bring it home.

Never too late. Ava was working at a restaurant. She was always a bit nervous about a new girl. Her manager was just as nervous as Ava. She decided to give her a warning that her coworkers were late. The next day Ava was in a bad mood.

Tree. Tom and his brother bought a tree for Christmas. Tom and his brother started playing with it all the time. One day Tom ran out of leaves and it was raining. Tom had to put up a fence. He went to get more leaves for more.

Teacher Leaves. Nancy was very sad about her teacher leaving. She had been working on her desk for weeks. Nancy was finally getting to work on the desk for 2 hours. After that, Nancy was finally able to get to her work. She was able to get the lunch that she needed and then get a raise.
Strike. Tom was playing in a game on a remote. He was trying to strike a target. Tom accidentally hit a tree. Tom went down and suffered a lot of pain. Tom had to go to the hospital for stitches.
Swan. Nancy was going to college today. She went to the first school she could find. They told her they had a special gift for her. It was a wreath. Nancy loved wreathing it.
Cat Food. Jim was making dinner. He had made his own cat food. He decided to put it on the plate. The cat ate the cat food and drank it. It looked delicious.
Tired workout. Tim was getting tired. He wanted to relax. He decided to go to the gym. He got to work on his workout routine. Tim was tired throughout the day.

Driving after my stroke. I used to go to AA meetings. But, as I had a stroke in 2011, I started to drive. In 2014 I started my first AA meeting. As soon as I got on the ground, my voice stopped. I had to go to AA meetings.

Halloween on the street. Tim's birthday is coming up and he wants to have a party. He decides to put up signs in his neighborhood warning of bad weather. Unfortunately, it's getting colder the night before. Tim loses his birthday party at school. Luckily, the police can stop the bad weather.

Birthday Cake. We went to the bakery for a cake. The manager told us there is no cake day. We decided to order a cake. After we tried the cake the manager told us the cake did not come. We gave the cake away for free.
The Tree. The Smiths got into a big fight over a tree. It had grown several times. One night they decided to cut it. They called it the Treehouse. Now they have a new home in their new home.
The cook off. Lisa needed a job. Her friend invited her to a cook off. She thought it would be a good idea. Lisa met with the manager. The manager was impressed.

Wedding Day. When Kelly and Mary were ready to go, they went outside. They got their clothes on and set up. When they arrived at the reception desk the reception was closed. Kelly was very upset because the reception staff had a nice surprise for her. Kelly had a great wedding!

The Big Test. Jake was nervous about his big test at school. The teacher was so cute and everyone was smiling. Jake asked to join his teacher's class. His teacher gave him a hug. Jake took a few notes and wrote down a name for the test.

Banging Noise. Cindy had been invited to a party. She and her friends decided to hang out on the beach. Cindy began to panic. All of a sudden the noise made Cindy want to get home. Cindy's friends had to leave to the emergency room.

Freshly baked rolls. Today, I decided to try some fresh baked rolls. I put a slice of cake in the oven. I looked in the oven and the rolled looked different. I decided to mix everything up. It was delicious.
Zoo. The man picked up a Ziploc bag. The bag contained a plastic bag. He brought it to the zoo. He had fun. He had a great trip.
The present. The present was a new bike. The present was a new bike. She went to the shop to look for it. There were no bikes left. She had to get one.

Wrong Change. It was a cold day and the sky was dark. Tina had to walk to her car. She forgot to bring her umbrella to the shed. She decided to hide in the shed. She was scared the light would not turn on.
Bad Back. Tom had to use his cane to walk to the bar. It wasn't working, though. He tried using the cane again. But the cane ended up hurting. Tom had to be more careful.
Guys. Jade liked to read. She decided to enter her crush in a trivia game. Her crush agreed and they went to the game. They had a great time. Jade is very glad she entered trivia.

New York. Ava felt like an outsider in her class. She had to attend college in New York City. She had never experienced New York. When she got there, she couldn't figure it out. Then she saw a bus tour, a concert, and her very first vacation there!
Shareholder. The company's stock rose from its low point. Everyone was elated. They had won the right to vote. It was worth it to them. They are hoping to continue to do this.

Family Photos. Bethany needed to use a bathroom. She found a picture of her family in her living room. She shared it with her siblings. Bethany's siblings told her she should not share her photos with anyone. Bethany felt like a child.
Too Fast. Barry wanted to do a few laps in a row. He was running really fast. He didn't like the feel of it. He ran faster every lap. Barry decided to just run faster.

Bad Pie. Randy loves eating pie. One day, he went to go get some from the market. Randy tried to make pie out of the pie. He tried to make it a big pie. But after he made it, it came out really rotten.

Plumbing Problems. My son's plumbing has started leaking after a few months. The plumbing was set off. I called customer service to see what was going on. They recommended that I call the company to repair my plumbing. The company did come and fixed my plumbing.
Missing. Ike was supposed to see his grandma. But it was a busy time. He left early to get to his grandma's. Instead he stayed home instead. But he left the house because it was busy.

First Day of School. Maggie wanted to take her new math class today. She decided that she would take it first. Her teacher agreed that she should take the class. Maggie took the class in her new school. Now she was in good shape and ready to start her new school year.

A Bad Movie. Samuel is a director and producer of a tv series. The tv show was very popular and loved by many people. He decided to make a bad movie and decided to take a break. He went on the internet and saw the movie and saw the ending. Samuel had to cut his vacation and watch the movie that was bad.
Double Rainbow. Dana and Jane were having a date. Jane was really into wine. Dana asked if they could have dinner. Jane suggested a double rainbow. Jane agreed to the wedding.

Jesus the great. Ethan and his friends were having a barbeque. They were so nervous they asked God if they could have one. They finally decided to give it a shot. They had so much fun! Ethan ended up throwing his party in the backyard.

Violin. Ida was excited when she got to the guitar class. Her first lesson was at violin. It was an extremely long piece of music. She practiced every day to prepare herself for her lesson. On the day of the lesson, she was so happy that she found the perfect piece.

Distraction. Ava had a big date. Her date had the same haircut. As they got into the restaurant, Ava didn't have much fun. Her date asked her what's wrong with her hair. She said it was because she was too sensitive to it.

Registering to vote. Last month I signed up for registration to vote. It's not easy, but I was excited to get in line. After I got in, I did my registration and registration application. I drove out, made my way to the register. I got the votes and registered to vote.
Lemonade Stand. I was making lemonade. I went to the store to get some lemonade. I walked to the stand to grab some. There were too many jars to grab. I decided to just buy more.

Saturday Cartoons. It was a busy Saturday night. All the kids were playing cartoons. My mother was sad that she couldn't go to bed. She went to bed tired but not sleepy. I had a great time playing cartoons.

Dinner Proposal. I had never had a big dinner, so I asked if I could have a small one. He came to the table, and I asked what I wanted. He said I could have a large, sweet, spicy pizza. I was so excited and I decided to go with it. It was so good, I was so happy to have it!

Sushi Roll Prices. Rita was always eating at sushi rolls at the restaurant. Her favorite place to eat was at the KFC place. This is one of the most popular places in town. Unfortunately she could not afford to go there. Rita ended up having to call back a week later to find out the prices.
Henry gets caught. Henry was out shopping at the mall. He sees some pretty women. He meets some very attractive women. Henry gets caught. He is suspended from the mall for a week.

New Beds. I had been saving for two Year's for the new bed. I had only two days left to spare and decided to do something with it. I bought the bed from the department store. It was cheap and the bed I was using broke in half! I put the new bed back on and it was as fun as it had been.
Bra. Tom bought a new motorcycle. It needed a new brake. Tom drove the bike home. The brakes broke. Tom had to pay extra for a new bike.
Vacation. Tom went to the beach every summer. He was always at the beach. He went with his friend and planned a trip. They went fishing. They had fun going to the beach every day.
The bug bite. Tom was out with friends. He noticed a fly in their food. He threw the fly in the trash. It came out and it hurt. Tom had to buy a bug spray.

The Cleaning Lady. Ethan decided he was going to clean up his house. He was hired as a cleaner and was not very successful. Ethan cleaned his house up. He cleaned up his living room. Ethan was very happy with his job at a cleaner.
Lost Book. Kate had forgotten to set the bookmark. But she looked everywhere. Kate had put her books back in her bag. She looked around for the lost one. But she couldn't find it.
Bonfire. I decided to make bonfires in the woods. I got my woodworking supplies and got out the poles. Then, I lit some candles. I was amazed at the beauty. I went home and started the fire.

The War. I bought a war machine for my daughter's birthday. I had to use the machine to check her room. I took her to a gun show. When she arrived, she asked for a gun. I took her to a museum for a gun test.

The Pizza. When I was little I wanted to be like Santa Claus. I looked for his stuffed animals and found them everywhere. When I was fourteen my grandma gave me some treats. I ate all the treats! When I was eighty I finally found him in a box.

Bad First Day. The day came for Mike to go to the pool. He was very excited because it was his first day at the pool. Mike was nervous but excited to swim. His friends encouraged him to try different kinds of water. Mike's first pool was so cool that he decided to try the new waters.

Icy Road. The two girls went on a road trip through their new country. At first they weren't very interested. But as the trip went by they began to learn. Soon they knew it was a beautiful and wonderful country. After a few days of studying it was a wonderful place!

Fertility. My wife was expecting a baby. She told us she was happy. We talked to her about the birth plan. My wife suggested we start saving money so we can have a baby. She suggested we try birth control and get pregnant, to save money.

Nerves for the date. I was dating a friend of mine in high school. She told me to keep quiet and go with him. I never did because I thought he was mean. The next day he told me I could go alone. I accepted and I made it home happy.

The bad grades. Susie always had bad grades. Susie decided to get a new one. When she tried it it turned out she got it wrong. She ended up getting worse grades. It was an effort to keep herself from getting worse.
Detention. I had a dog. I put him outside everyday. He got into trouble for a long time. I eventually gave him a second chance. I think he finally likes being outside more.

Far too hot. It was the middle of summer and Sarah wanted to go on a run. She went outside and saw the stars. She ran through the clouds to find out what the stars were. She saw a lot of stars. Sarah had to go back inside to find out what the stars were.

A gift she didn't like. Eli loved candy. He decided he would give his neighbor a big present for Christmas. The little boy could not believe how happy he felt! His parents gave him a big box of treats for the holidays. Eli was so happy that he threw away the candy!

Startled Cat. Anna had a cat who was a bit clumsy. She would not keep his cage open. One day she went outside to look for him. Anna found him outside of his cage. Anna ran upstairs to see if he could keep his cage open.

Full Volume. Sam heard his daughter's first song on the radio. His daughter knew this song. She went to the store to buy more. Sam went home to hear the song on the radio. He decided to try out this new song on her birthday.

Back to Ukraine. I went to visit a family in Ukraine. There I learned about the conflict there. I learned they had a war in Crimea and were fighting Russia. I learned they were preparing for another war. My family and I went back home to live in Ukraine.

Knots. Bob was doing some gardening. He accidentally went into the canister without properly closing. The hose went down the drain. He had to walk all the way to the other drain. Bob decided not to worry.

The broken headphones. Tim was out in the country with his friends. They were going on an important trip. The headphones were very broken. Tim was embarrassed. He spent the next weekend buying new ones.
Chicken to Car. We went to McDonalds to buy fried chicken. They were out of chicken. We didn't want to get anything else. We tried on several different items. We got the chicken, fries, and eggs.

Fish. I was swimming on the beach one day. I was running and I caught a huge fish. I thought it was crazy, but the fish was actually real! The fish got big and I took it home. I then felt a lot better because I had never seen such a big fish.
The Pool. The kids went to the pool. The pool was empty. They were all alone. They decided to play a prank. They jumped the slide and they ran home.

Brand new phone. It was time to buy my new phone. When I got it it was the best on my list. The only problem was that it was out of stock. It was difficult to buy because I was too busy to work. I went online and bought a different one anyway.

Tennis Table in Tennessee. I went to a tennis table. The table was old and needed repairs. I looked online for new ones. The prices were too cheap. The owner of the table said they would charge me more.

Flute. Ella played the flute for the first time at the school. Her instructor asked if she could try it out. Ella had never tried flute before. She tried it out and it wasn't good. The instructor told her it wasn't her best and she didn't know.

haunted house. The girls wanted to look into the haunted house. They went up to the counter and sat down to look at it. There were no ghosts at all. They went through the whole house and then looked at each individual. After a while, the girls realized that the house had been haunted.

Loud Construction. Jane was excited to open a small store in her town. She knew the store would benefit from construction. She decided to plant a tree next to her. Jane was surprised at how good the tree did. She hoped the tree would help improve the town's air quality.
Lost and found. My brother in law's wife left him a note in the house. It said she's moving to Ohio. I thought I read the note. I found it on the porch. I'm not sure what happened.
Auschwitz. I visited Auschwitz. I was very nervous because I was afraid. I did not know anybody there. I went through a lot of physical and emotional abuse. Luckily, I found a friend who helped me.
Carla's Phone. Carla's phone went missing from her apartment. She was upset. She called a friend. The friend said Carla had to pay for a new phone. Carla was relieved and happy.

Addison rides a ferryboat. Addison has always wanted to go the beach. Her parents don't want her to go anywhere else but to the beach. Addison decides to learn to ride the boat. She loves the boat! Addison loves going to the beach with her family.
The shadow. Sally was walking in the yard one day. The shadow was moving slowly down the garden. She stepped on the grass. She saw the shadow go right to the garden. She had to walk away quickly.

Getting some running in. Jake was running late for his friend's prom. His friend was having a good time. He had some good times. He decided to run a couple laps before the prom. Jake made it all the way in, he was too nervous to go.
No service. Tom had to leave his house for work. He was in a rush. He asked his brother to pick him up. He brought him his phone. Unfortunately they had trouble picking him up.

Banana Split Fiasco. Sue was trying to save a banana from the refrigerator. Her mother told her to not cut the banana. Sue's mom explained that a banana is very brittle. When Sue was done cutting the banana, she was shocked to find out how fragile it was. Sue's mother said she used a banana split as a sharpener.

The Bad Rental. Jim took his first vacation to a new country. He booked a rental car. When he got back he noticed a problem with the car. The rental car was not on it's own. Jim had to call the rental company.

Saving Grace. Tom loved going to his college library. One day, the library staff was running late. Tom ran in front of the library and began to cry. The staff realized the man who needed help needed to go home. Luckily, Tom went home and had a nice chat with the man.

Copper Kettles. Gina was walking to work when she heard a loud crack. A large cat was running through the open window. It began to sniff the kettles and grab them. Gina screamed when she saw the cat licking some apples. The cat left the window and Gina decided to go back to work instead.
Kite Flying. Jody was doing kite flying at his friend's house. He took the kite and placed it in his pocket. A loud bang followed. He was scared. His friend apologized.

Dog. Jake and Amy have been best friends since birth. They are both very excited to see each other. One day Jake was playing in his backyard when he tripped. Amy tried to get Jake to stop but failed. They decided to have a pet instead.
Marty. Marty was a skinny guy. But he wanted to be taller and skinny! He started to get really interested in height. Marty knew he had to start growing. So Marty decided to start being a barista!

Traveling. Ricky had always wanted to travel. He took his friends to Mexico. They flew over and stayed with them there. The family learned so much about the culture. Now Ricky has a great trip to Mexico!

Better Cardio. Kate had been watching a new show on Netflix. She decided to binge watch the first season. As the seasons got further on, she felt better. When she tried out the show, the show didn't play well. Kate realized that her average cardio was too high.

Metamorphosis. Sandy loved going to the movies with her parents. She would take her siblings out to see the films. Her brother and brother-in-law played with them all day and night. One day Sandy forgot to turn on her parents movie. Her parents grounded her for a week.

Friends at the Arcade. Tom loved to play arcade games. Tom invited his friends over to play. Tom had a great time. Tom was a huge fan of the games. His friends were upset because they thought Tom was cheating.

New Science. I came back from school on the first day of class. The class had a presentation due that day. The teacher asked if I could give a presentation. I told her I needed to. She gave me a free seminar on the subject.

Ruined blanket. My wife and I were looking at a sweater for sale. She was only 16 and we wanted something in particular. We had never looked at any fabric before, but they were too expensive. We ended up buying something in a small fabric box. I was so happy to purchase that sweater.

Grandpa Fish. Trey was an aspiring chef. His dream was to make grand masters fish. But he didn't have any fish to eat. Trey's fish became very full and full. He realized it was best to only eat fish for food.

Windy Accident. We had just gotten a big truck. My wife was driving it from Boston to Phoenix. It was raining hard and it was freezing. We were trying to get out of the car. We managed to get out by the time we made it back to our house.

A Walk in the Park. Randy loved to go to the park every day. He got the most out of all of the walking opportunities he was given. When he turned 21, he moved to a new state. Randy decided to take walking lessons at the community center. He now loves taking walks the same way every day.

Yacht Story. Lily was planning her first yacht tour. She went to an Italian restaurant to sample a couple of things. When she arrived, she was disappointed when they were out of champagne. The waiter called her over and apologized for her mistake. Lily was not happy with the experience.
Curly hair. Alicia's hair started falling out. Her friends took her to the salon to try to straighten it out. It was difficult. She even had to get cut. But luckily, Alicia did.

Loud Alarm. It was 9 AM and Tina heard a loud knock. The person was calling 911 and she couldn't figure out what it was. As Tina walked outside the man knocked on the door. He said he just heard a phone ring and told her they were ok. Turns out that the police had heard a man yell in the front yard.

Online deals. Jane's father bought her a tablet for her birthday. Jane was excited to read it on the computer. She opened the book. Jane realized it was a pirate paperback. She was disappointed to find the book was actually a pirate paperback.

Crush. There was a bad storm brewing in Louisiana. The storm created a huge tornado around my house. All of the lights went out in my house. I went outside to find a broom to fix the damage. It turned out I accidentally hit an electrical socket in my window.

Keys Overboard. Gabby was playing chess with her boyfriend. His brother was playing against her. When she turned one of his pieces over it flew into his friend's. She was annoyed and started to cry. Her boyfriend wasn't mad at her.

Chef. Karen is a chef in a high rise restaurant. Her favorite part is the cleanliness of the place. This is because of the low water level. But as she went through the kitchen, she noticed something strange. Karen was cooking her dinner with no yeast in it.

Don't Try This At Anywhere. Mary was walking home from work one morning. She noticed a cute dog sitting on her front steps. Her stepmother was taking her to the park. Mary felt nervous and went to her walk. She didn't get to play with the dog until she got home.

Movie. Sara was about to watch the first film in a theater. She didn't have any friends. Suddenly, she realized her parents couldn't afford a movie. She went online and found a movie theatre nearby. She was able to enjoy the movie and was happy.

The Shower. Jim went to work and noticed he had run out of water. Jim called a cab for help. The driver arrived at the scene and took Jim's temperature. Jim went to the doctor and got a diagnosis of dehydration. He was pumped up and went to work the next day.

Salesman. Kia was an accountant in a fast-growing business. Her boss told her that her company's best customer was a salesman. Kia tried everything to convince herself she was good at sales. Her boss tried everything and Kia was elated. Kia was able to win the promotion with salesmanship.
Shoes. My son's sister was at a party. She got into a fight. She pushed me. My sister got on my shoes. I was late getting my feet wet.
Crime. Fred was playing a new game. He was really good at the game. His brother told him to try harder. Fred did, and his brother didn't. Fred was too lazy to play anymore.

greedy. I had to make hamburgers at home. The first two ingredients were the first two ingredients. The third one was the second ingredient. I had to make the hamburgers themselves. However, my hamburgers weren't good.

Camp. Beth was excited for her birthday party. She went to the store to buy gifts for her kids. Beth got a big box and a gift card. Beth bought her kids a big new dress. Beth's kids couldn't wait to party for the party.

Daniel Moves Out on His Own. Daniel had just gotten his girlfriend back from college. Daniel was really upset that he had left his dorm to go out with friends. His girlfriend called him into his room and said she didn't want to go out. Daniel had to go and change his room as well. Daniel never returned his call.

Being sick. Nola had been feeling sick for 2 weeks. She was trying to find an alternative to her illness. She decided to call her friend. Her friend was able to get Nola some food for her sickness. Nola was so thankful for her friend.
Depew. Gwen needed to cut some grass. She took out her tools and tools and went to her garden. She plowed her lawn. She sprayed flowers in the yard. Gwen planted a small garden.

GENGHIS. Bob's mom warned him not to eat food too high in soy sauce. Bob tried to eat rice and rice pasta. When his mom gave him a taste test, she thought he was sick. Bob took the food and ate it anyway. Bob's mom told him to eat less rice and pasta if he doesn't eat it.

The Blanket. Jim decided to buy a new blanket for his house. He purchased all of the needed items from the store. When he was done with the project, Jim felt like the project was done. He knew it was time for him to put on his new blanket. Jim was happy he bought the project for the project.

Canceled Playdate. Jim got a call that a play date was on the way. Jim was not sure how to cancel a playdate, but thought he should. Jim called the playdate, and they sent an official to cancel the play. Jim called to cancel the playdate, but the director gave him the keys. Jim is going to keep a close eye on the dates of upcoming plays.
The Paddleboard. Joe wanted to ride a board. Joe couldn't get a board. Joe was in his backyard. He decided to build a giant paddleboard. Joe won first place in the board game at the end of the night.

Mark has a bad tooth. Mark was walking home from school one day. The first thing he did was to cut his tooth. It was awful, but Mark felt more alive and better. He was so relieved to see that his tooth was actually in the water! Now Mark is able to walk as if it were normal.
