Maya the Writer. Maya was an aspiring writer. She was so excited to be a part of a big book. When she started, she did not feel very confident. She took many tests, but nothing went right. After the test, Maya was proud of herself.

Skydiving. I had never skydived before, so I asked my dad if I could. He said yes, and we took off on the board. We floated all night and night until we landed. When we came to land we were surprised to see stars all around! We then got off of the board and looked over the course of three hours.

Innovation. Kate and Beth wanted to design a wedding dress for her boyfriend. They found a design book with a beautiful photo of her. Then they went online to design the dress themselves. They finished the dress right away. They sold the dress at a thrift store.

Angry man on the bus. Allie was going down the stairs. She got scared and didn't know what to do. Finally, she decided to pull over. The bus driver came and took her out. When she got home, she was happy to know she did not go to that bus.

Biking with Noah. Alicia decided that she loved biking. Her friends convinced her to go to a local mountain biking event. When she got there, they all had a blast. Alicia rode every hill with her friends and loved it. Now Alicia likes to bike with her friends.
Paula Plays Harpsichord. Paula is a musician. She plays a Harpsichord. Paula performs with other people. Paula was invited to her local concert. Paula ended up winning the Harpsichord.

Depression. One morning I went to the library to check out my book collection. It was all books I read on a particular subject. The professor looked at my books, so I left it there. The professor came back later, and he said he didn't realize my book was there. I had to go to the library to change the subject.
Steps. The coach needed someone to help with the defense. He made the players more aggressive. He asked the player to run faster. The player ran faster. He scored his first goal!
Harp. My cousin works in the city as an office assistant. My cousin is retiring soon. We don't know who has the job. I hope she gets the job. My cousin is moving to Houston.

A Dog Savior. The Smiths moved into an apartment building. They liked the dogs, but their neighbor Joe wanted to get a dog. So Joe suggested they buy a dog. Joe went and bought a dog. Joe and his wife had a great time together.

Baseball Injury. Tom hit a ball and slid it up the court. Tom's coach called him out for the foul. Tom got hit by the ball and had a fracture. Tom missed the game in pain. He was never a baseball player again.

Jump Rope. I went to the library today and I was there to read. I started reading when I saw a squirrel in my house. I walked up and grabbed a jump rope. I climbed onto the squirrel and started jumping and jumping. I ended up losing my balance.
Playing Checkers. Tom loved playing checkers. He would play them on his lap at school. One day Tom accidentally dropped his ball. He looked all over the place for the ball. He never found the ball.

Cats are crazy. Tom went to the store to buy eggs. The only problem was that there were a lot of them. Tom kept walking until he found a little pack of cat food. He used the cat food to make a bowl of eggs. They were delicious!
Bad pie. I decided to make a pie. I was going to make a chocolate pie. I tried some different types of cookies. I loved the taste of the cookies. I made the pie.

Dare. Amy went to the supermarket to buy a few food items. As she got in the car, she noticed she had been on the wrong lane. Amy thought about what she should do. She chose the wrong lane and put her food in the wrong car. Amy drove home feeling sad that she had wasted a long night at the supermarket.

Homework. I got a new job last night. I had to be very organized in my work. I wrote all of my assignments in one day. I also completed all of my homework assignments from the previous week. I feel very happy to be able to do this.

The Bad Potter. Barry was a toddler. He loved all types of toys, from play to toys. But one day, he saw that his favorite toy was a new one. He begged his parents to buy him one. His parents finally obliged and the family was much more excited.

Test Drive. When we drove home, we decided to take a test drive. The car we were taking looked a lot different than our previous car. We decided to drive around the town to test drive. The car we were driving in front of seemed really nice. We took it home and went back home and drove a bit more.

Cutting School. The girl was playing in the yard. She was cut off from the rest of the kids. She tried to tell her mother what happened. Her mother tried to comfort her. She finally understood what happened.

Found Wallet. Amy was looking for a new gift. She went to the store and found her wallet at the counter. She gave it to the cashier. She gave the cashier a new gift. The cashier smiled and gave Amy her wallet.

Bad cold. I decided to take a cold shower on my morning walk. I was sweating a little bit and wanted to stay warm. I did not think I'd get that cold. I went into the bathroom and put my clothes on. I got it to just barely stay cold but still felt better.

Mail. I sent a text to my girlfriend yesterday to send her a gift. I was not sure if I was a good person. But my wife sent me a thoughtful gift and I was thrilled. Later I saw she received her gift and thanked me. I was very appreciative and thankful for all the good things.

To The Bathroom. Anna hated to go to the bathroom. Her mom said that the bathroom needed a good scrubber. Anna tried many times and the bathroom was not clean enough. She thought about buying a new scrubber. Then she decided to take a shower.

New Sandals. Susie's mother bought her a new sandal. She took it to her mom who was afraid of it. Susie's mother was upset with her because she didn't know the style. She asked her daughter to try something new. Her daughter picked up a pattern and used it.

Going to the drive in. John needed to take his dog for a drive in. He went through several parts of the road, getting his car started. He pulled over to the side of the road to take a look. His dog came in the back seat, and he sat in his seat. The dog was excited and said to go away to go home.

Waste of an Hour. I had a job that required me to drive. The hours at the store were limited. I decided to take a short break to catch up. As I drove, I realized I forgot my wallet. The store shut my shop on me since I forgot my wallet!

Beach Trip. John was getting ready to go. He had a long day at work and wanted to make it to the beach. John got all his things ready. When he got home, his work car and supplies were all gone. He was really bummed he could have gone for only one trip.

First Day Treat. My family and I decided we wanted to eat breakfast. We decided to eat toast with some eggs. We started off by picking up a few muffins. When we finished, we went back to our car. We both thanked each other for the nice breakfast.

Jasper Makes Linguine. Jasper is a great cook. He knows that there is nothing to do. So he decides to cook something simple. He puts a little sauce in his linguine. He cooks it and has a delicious meal.
Thanks!. Jim's son was in a car accident. He got hit by a car. His son fell and broke his leg. Jim tried everything to help him. He finally got a new car after a few months of searching.

Planting and growing. I was looking forward to my wedding anniversary. It was just days away. I put in a lot of work and got ready. When it was time to be put up for sale I was shocked. I bought the same brand as the one I was told to be picked up.

Good Deed. My nephew works in a car dealership. When he got out of his car, the car was totaled. He thought that it was due to his good deed and bad deed. I called him to tell him that it was just a part of his garage. He said that he was only looking for the garage.

Shark Attack. My wife had a great birthday party. She was going to bring home a brand new aquarium. She asked her friend who lived nearby for a gift. She said they could make it and that it would be free. She was disappointed but excited about the gifts she had.

The stealing friend. John was walking home. And he saw a thief. John looked for him but could not find him. He eventually realized that he had bought his own shoes. He thanked the thief profusely and left the store.

Small Town Jean. Every Christmas morning, a small town girl and a town boy meet. The town girl and the boy meet at the park and play on the swings. The town girl decides she should go to the park and meet a boy. The town girl then goes to the park and meets the boy. When they both get to the park, the town girl and boy have a great time.

Stray. Sara's grandma would often come to visit. The other days she wouldn't see her grandmother. Her grandmother was getting a lot older and sad. When she saw Sara she was touched by her. Sara was glad she didn't miss her grandma anymore.

Checking the mail. Lucy was running late for work. She had to leave her office in less than an hour. When she got home she realized it was raining. Lucy went to the store to buy a shower curtain. She got it and felt bad afterwards.

Face paint as costumes. I went to my parents house and bought makeup. I wore my makeup all the way through the day. After I was done with my makeup, I walked down the hallway to the bathroom. The door of my house closed so I got in there. My mom said I was dressed up as a zombie costume.
Making pizzas. I decided to make some pizza dough. I went to a pizza place for the dough. I bought all the ingredients. Then I began to assemble the dough. I had the dough baked and ready to eat.

Scholarship. Cathy was trying to get a scholarship to her hometown. But she couldn't afford the tuition she needed. Cathy decided she would try online shopping. But Cathy's mother was very generous. Cathy decided she would apply to a local university and she got a scholarship.

The Garage Sale. Allie wanted to purchase a car but needed one that would fit her budget. She found a nice car and picked it up. She began planning out her list. After an hour of shopping, the garage sale was over. Allie decided to just pick up her car and sell it!

Randy's Train Ticket. Randy rode his favorite subway ride. Randy boarded his train to a big city. On the way to the big city he felt something. Randy's train was shaking as it headed his way. Randy realized that this was a ticket he was never looking for.
Pads. I went to an ATM at the mall on Sunday. I paid to use the ATM. I did not pay any cash. I got kicked out of the store. I ended up leaving the cash inside.

Soccer. John had a huge soccer game in his town. He wanted to show his friends he was a good sport. He took his team to a local soccer park. John and his team had a good time. John felt good about himself after the game.

China. Timothy was excited about the new game from China. He asked his friend to play with him and was excited to see what he had. He played for an hour. He got to see every aspect of the game. It was amazing.

Chess. Kaitlin loved to play chess. She was good at playing the game. But she could not beat her best friend Kim. Kaitlin played a round against Kim in a game she played for a friend. Kaitlin won the game, and her friend cheered.

The awesome batch. I was working on a batch at my local grocery store. My co-workers came over and told me about the food they were giving away. I told them they were giving away free samples of fresh fruits. They were really excited about this, so I opened up a website. I made a lot of new friends and even got to pick my favorite fruit.

Jennifer wins big. Jennifer's car had been stolen from her. It was the second time she had been stolen in a year. Her mom asked for help. Jennifer said no since it wasn't enough. They drove to a friend's house to talk to her.
The Pop Quiz. Sam loved to write. His favorite part was the pop quiz. He asked his class if they wanted to win. They decided to take the quiz. It ended up being the best quiz they've ever done.

Best Friend. Alfred was the new best friend he had. He wanted to make the most out of his friend's hard work. He would do everything he could to make his friend happy. His friend became sick with cancer. He had to miss an important date with his friend's friend.

Bringing Home Baby. Tom had just gotten home from work. He was so happy he was starting fresh again. When he came back, he saw his new baby. He cried so hard that his mother made him promise not to bring home baby. Tom's parents were very relieved.

Grown Man Selling Barbies. Jim liked to collect souvenirs for his family. He especially liked his Barbies. His family took him to the local market. When they were done, Jim went home to look for his Barbies. His grandfather's family returned them to Jim to decorate them.
Crash. Tom bought a new car. It started running on time. It was supposed to be in the garage. The car broke down. Tom got the car fixed in the garage.

Impressing Girls Is Easy. Anna was at the school play. Her mom was taking her to the bathroom. Her mom asked her to hold up her hand. She got up and began to play with her hands. Then her mom turned around and told her Anna was very attractive.

The Wire. Gina's friend Jane was very worried. They had gotten the job, and Jane was so worried. They had just gotten a new job, but it was a huge hassle. Gina had to find another job that made her feel comfortable. She could finally let her go on to have fun.

College?. The Johnson family was ready to take their first real shot at college. They decided they'd go to college with a friend. They enrolled and had to take all their classes. They finally got the hang of it and it was fun. They didn't make any mistakes though.

Olga. Olga and her friends went to the park with some friends. At the park there was a long line. Olga was stuck in a line for too long. When Olga finally got to the park she was very sad. She had been playing basketball for 2 hours straight.
Poor Eyesight. I went to my eye doctor in 2006. They told me that I was blind. He suggested they start wearing glasses at night. I decided to try it out. After five tries it felt better than I did.

Smile. I wanted to be a rapper in high school. I decided to be an actor in an action movie. After years of playing football, I had a lot of scholarships. In high school I started working out for the local gym. Now I am very successful with my acting resume.

The Gross Seat. Cindy had been looking forward to the Thanksgiving dinner for months. She had never taken such a large meal for dinner, and was getting nervous. As she approached the table, she realized she did not have any money to make it. Her grandmother gave her a small plate of steak for dinner. With a tip, she was able to cook an appetizer to make herself a dinner.

Too much fun. Sam was a heavy drinker. He had so much alcohol that he wanted to quit. He asked his dad to find something else to drink. He asked for a drink that was less expensive. His dad found a cheap drink and tried to quit.
Dance Team. Bob wanted to play basketball. His friends asked him for help. Bob agreed to help out. He practiced every day. After a few weeks Bob was a great basketball player.

Hockey Fan. Dan is an amateur hockey player. Dan decides he needs to join the local high school hockey team. Dan asks his parents to buy him a ticket. They tell him that they have a local high school hockey team playing in the city. Dan's parents cheer him up and cheer him to go to the game.

The Booking Failure. John was on his way to his first book signing. John called his friend, but he didn't know who was there. John drove to the bookstore, to the bookstore's line, and into the store. He did not know anyone at the bookstore that day. John ended up being disappointed that someone could not bring his book.
Fried Trout. Dylan was on vacation with his family. The food was not good. Dylan asked for some fish. It turned out he forgot to add the fish. His family decided not to eat the fish.

Bicycle. The Johnson's went to the park on a bicycle. They saw a big black bear approaching the park. They stopped to see if the bear would stop and look. It would take a few minutes to get away. They walked away slowly.
New Style. John hated fashion. He thought that it had been taken over. John decided to get a new style. He started wearing jeans and a t-shirt. John loved the way he looked.

Fight on the Train. The family sat in the backseat. Their mom was angry with the boys. They argued about what to do about it. The boys went out to lunch with their mother. Mom let them watch a movie on TV after the movie.
No. Tom was late for work one day. He tried to go to his car but the sun was out. He was forced to wait for his bus. Tom was late again and had to wait. The bus finally arrived and Tom had to wait.

The Sheets. My daughter was doing laundry last Saturday. She needed to remove some sheets from the dryer. We went to the store to buy sheets. We were able to do laundry for a couple of dollars each. The sheets were much needed and we enjoyed them.

Student's Nightmare. Tina was an aspiring singer. She was working very hard in school. But she felt like she was doing very well. A friend of hers who had a lot of success came into the class. Tina sat and listened intently and was relieved.

Stars. I went to the store to get a telescope for my birthday. I went in and bought a very nice little telescope. I took the telescope out and took pictures. It was amazing looking at planets. I am happy I have my telescope back.
Impatient. Kate was at a party. She decided to order a burrito. She noticed that there were a lot of people eating it. So she decided to order a few. Unfortunately, it started to get very gross.
The Run. Tim and his family went on a hike. While hiking, Tim saw something funny. The trees were dying. Tim was frightened. He decided to run home instead.

Finding Cards on the Street. I went to my local pawn shop to look for cards. I tried to swipe some out of a drawer, but they were gone. I decided to buy two cards. I then tried to swipe the other out of the drawer. I never found the other cards again.

Cat Treats. Jane decided to take a cat to the animal shelter. She tried to put her cat on a leash but it kept barking. She asked the worker if she could get a bowl of cat treats. She took a bag and put it on the cat's fur. She got the cat treats on the cat's tummy.
Presents. Tom had just bought a new home. He spent a long time in the house. Tom forgot about his presents. Tom found out about the presents he had bought. He was happy to have some presents!
Jean. My sister-in-law Ann was visiting in 1981. They met in Chinatown. Ann and her husband were the best of friends. Ann's husband wanted Ann to marry him. Ann said no.

Lost money. A man called Joe who worked at a gas station. He told Joe he would give him money if he returned it. Joe took Joe out for a look. Joe found $500 worth of cash on the ground. Joe returned it and he deposited the money back in Joe's account.

Curtain. Dan was doing his weekly cleaning. He had a huge room to make the curtains look good. Dan asked his friend Tim to do a trick with the curtains. Tim's friend did the trick, and Dan did the trick too. Dan's curtains look great now!

The Fever. Kia had a fever. She called the doctor to see what was wrong. The doctor said Kia had a blood clot. The doctor scheduled an x-ray of Kia's wound. Kia was healthy and could now eat healthy food!

Lois gets a scare. Lois notices that her cat is scared. She decides to get some cat food to make him feel better. Lois buys some cat food to keep him from getting scared. Lois feels better after feeding the cat food. Lois feels much better after she gets all the cat food.
Tacos. Ivan went to the beach with his family. He picked a tuna sandwich. He ate it. He felt very sick. Afterwards Ivan stopped eating the sandwich.
Basketball. Tim wanted to play basketball. He saved up a lot of money to do it himself. He tried for years but failed. Eventually he saved up enough to play for his team. He won.

Bad Breath. Jane was walking home from school. She smelled something burning. Jane ran to get it out of her throat. When she got back it was gone. Jane had bad breath and had to go to the emergency room.

Speeding. Lane was a young boy who liked to drive fast. He drove too fast and crashed into a patch of trees. Lane was forced to drive home from school. He was very late to school. Lane never drove fast again.

Naughty Nancy. Janet was a mean little girl who liked to tease everyone. Her friend told Janet to stop teasing her. Janet ignored him but her friend began to fight. Janet and her friend got into a big fight and Janet's friend won. Janet's friend had to get a restraining order against her from the bully.

Grocery List. Today was the last day of the school year. Sara made a grocery list for school. The grocery store closed down and we went to another store. I decided to check out my grocery list. I was happy with the decision.
Bad Crash. My wife was playing with the car. It was hitting a patch of concrete. It started rolling down. The car wouldn't stop. Luckily my wife helped.

A Need to Pee. I took a big shower in order to get ready. I woke up the next day with pain in my back. When I went to the restroom, it wasn't there. I could hear my cat scratching and sneezing. When I looked at my back, I realized I had stepped on a shoe.
The magic trick. Tom bought a set of headphones. He put them on the headphones. He took a picture of a monster. It was his favorite! Tom took pictures of his head everywhere.

Careless Mistake. I wanted to give a friend a chance at a friend gift. I was in my kitchen making a dinner dish. I forgot to bring my plate, and my friend was not happy. He called a friend and told him he forgot the food. The next day, I had to apologize and send him a gift.

Shooting Star. I got into a really bad accident while driving. I got out of my car, saw a deer on the road. I was scared and ran back to my car. I called the police, but they said it was too late. I had to pull over to be towed.

Tight On Brandy. Tom got up early to go play a game of golf. He was only twelve and his friend didn't believe in it. Tom began to make a hole in his tee box and lost it. His friend then went out to fix his hole and gave him a chance. They went to dinner and watched the game.

Prank. Amy was at school and her teacher gave a lesson on pranking. Amy asked if her teacher gave a joke. Amy had no clue what to do. She just laughed. When she tried to tell her teacher she felt guilty.

The Interview. Tom had been working as a computer laborer for six years. He hadn't done much at all. He decided to ask a random interview. He got the job and was glad he got the job. Tom had a great interview.

Football Match. Lily always loved watching football. She decided she would join the cheerleading team. She made all her friends and family cheer for her team. She was happy that they would have fun at all. She had a great first try out of the cheerleading squad.
One Car. John's sister had passed away. John looked in his car for a car. John found a used one in his car. He went to the store and bought it. He drove it home to his sister's funeral home.

Overtime. Diana was tired of waiting for her day off from school. When she woke up, she noticed she had to do her homework. It was due on Monday so she had to go to work early. Her teacher told her she didn't have time for homework any longer. It turned out to be a mistake and it ruined her day.
New Lamp. I love to read. My mom bought me a new lamp. She gave me a new one. I loved my new lamp. I will always have a new lamp.

Broken pencil. Dan had a pencil that was missing. He searched the shelves but found it nowhere to be found. He searched all day for the pencil. Finally, a friend found it in the mail. Dan was able to put it back.
Losing battery. Kelly loved watching the football game. Kelly's favorite team had the ball. She wanted to keep it. Kelly threw it into the goal and it went in. Kelly lost the ball.
The new roll recipe. Tina made a roll for her family. She put it in the oven. They were all shocked when it looked great. It was perfect. They loved it!

Child Support. Tom was having trouble paying child support. His parents promised to pay his back. Unfortunately Tom's parents were not satisfied. They filed a discrimination claim. Tom's parents learned to file a discrimination lawsuit.

Gargoyle. Dan decided he was going to build a gargoyle. He saw someone build one at his yard. The guy was a good kid and he knew how to use the ladder. Dan got out the ladder and climbed up to build the gargoyle. He hung it up and he looked at it with a proud face.

Not The Best Class. I was watching a movie when I got up to leave. The movie was so scary I almost fainted. I saw all the kids staring at me. Then, I saw all of the kids acting mad. I ran home and cried.

Anne and the Money. One day Anne felt sick. She didn't know how to wash her clothes. Anne's friends suggested she wash her clothes at home. Anne decided to do so. She was able to wash her clothes and felt much better.

Fair visit. Jana was going to visit her old high school. She had just finished college and wanted to go back. She booked an expensive vacation. It was a big and long trip. She was glad to finally go again.

He Can't Photograph. Tom hated to see his neighbor's work. So his dad sent him a picture of him. Tom saw and took the picture. He tried to upload it on facebook. He saw it and said he could not upload it again.

Dilemma. Tina and Tom had been dating for a while. She had finally convinced Tom to try and have another engagement. But they were in love, they didn't get along. They started dating online. After a few months they stopped going out.

Makeup. A man made his living as a makeup artist. One day he realized that he was not quite getting the job. He decided to make a different type of product to make people look better. He was able to get the job in a way he could not have imagined. He was very happy about it.
Homework. I finished my homework last night. I had a bad feeling about it. I decided to just go home. I woke up in a mess. My teacher made me clean it up.

Exhausted. Janet was having a hard time keeping up with her dog. It would bark at her daily and she got scared. Her best friend let her stay until she calmed down. Janet had to work on her problem. She got to spend time with her dog.

Scary Movie Night. The kids were getting ready for a scary movie night. They all went out to the movies hoping it was ok. At the movies they all waited for the scary movie. They all got scared. The kids ended up with a very scary movie night.
Tami Joins. Tami was a single mom. She wanted to be with her kids. She wanted to take care of them with their own hands. She went on a volunteer program. Tami became a teacher.
Time Out. I had my first job interview. I was so nervous. I waited in line all day. When I got to the interview I was so nervous I left. I went home and cried my whole interview.

Run. I had run all summer and summer. It was so much fun that I decided to run again. As soon as I finished I made sure to do a half mile run. I ended up finishing in 1st place. I can't wait to see my grandpa again.

No Address. Gina was sitting on the bus in her apartment. As the bus driver drove past she saw her school. As she looked outside she noticed a sign in a bus. Gina didn't think there was anything wrong with the bus. She was glad she had a chance to be home.

The King. The man and woman lived in a large house. It was a small house so they lived in a larger house. They shared a bathroom. The woman left her bathtub covered with towels. Her son was the only one of the friends there that day.
Old Lunch. Tori was at school. Her lunch was getting close. Tori began to feel hungry. The lunch was cold. Tori decided to not eat that lunch.

Assisted Living. Sara decided to move to a country in the Middle East. She applied to many different jobs and applied for welfare. Sara applied to almost ten different welfare programs. Sara got an interview and was sent to live in a homeless shelter. Sara ended up being accepted into a shelter for the winter.

Big Rain. Bill had just gotten home from work. As soon as it started to rain his car wouldn't start. He looked all over his house for the problem. He then realized he was driving in the rain! Luckily the car turned out to be a convertible.

Mark and the Author. Mark decided to write a book about a fictional monster called the "monster". He wanted to make his own monster book. He took a book that he read online and put in his book. The publisher read the book and approved the book. Mark turned out his book is actually a fake monster and sells it online.

Squirrel. Anna loved going to the park. She didn't have any food and didn't have much money. She decided to walk down the path. She saw a squirrel sitting on a leaf branch. Anna's dog sniffed it and was excited to catch a squirrel.

Wrong Recipient. I used to go to the library for reading. The library always had a wrong record about my book. One day the library gave me a new book. I couldn't believe it. The book was not the same as the original.

Terry's love. Terry had a crush on a girl named Ashley. Terry told her she wouldn't let him see her. One day, Ashley wanted to go to a club to see Terry. Terry was disappointed because Ashley liked him. Terry told Ashley to keep waiting for him.
New necklace. I bought a necklace last week. I wanted to wear it to my wedding. I tried on several pieces. I bought the most comfortable. I wore the necklace to my wedding.

A new movie. Tom was going to see his favorite new movie. Tom wanted to see the new one. Tom didn't have enough money to buy tickets. He asked his brother to take him. He spent the whole day watching the movie.

Ice Cream. Jim wanted ice cream, but he didn't have any money. So he went to the store and picked a few. But as soon as he got home, he was in big trouble. And now Jim was getting into trouble! Jim decided he could never get in trouble without a job.

Getting into the NHS. Manny went to visit a doctor for his first visit. When he got to the clinic, there was nothing to see. Manny asked his wife if she knew where he was going. His wife knew where he was going. She helped him look up his location.

Cat. Kate and Joe wanted to adopt a cat for their own family. Their family was very religious and very difficult. They knew their cat could be a perfect match and chose it. Kate and Joe began researching and adopting cats. They realized that their cat had the right personality!
Please Go Home. A friend of Dan's was very angry with Dan. They had been arguing all day. Dan wanted to send him a gift. His friend didn't like Dan's idea. Dan threw away the gift and went home.
Pool. Berta liked going to the pool every day. Every night she would swim at the pool. One day she decided to go swimming. Berta couldn't swim in the pool anymore. She felt bad for her.

Date. I was so nervous to go to the movies with my sister. As we sat there, she made it easy for us to see each other. She was a sweet girl but shy and never showed up. I ended up having a good time because I met her. I never forget that day.
The church. A man decided to visit the church. He arrived at the place. He bought some food. He had a great time. He left happy.
Red. I was working out in the yard with my friends. We ran through the forest. One of them went over to see me. He grabbed a few berries and ate them. He took a big bite out and then left.

Dog Love. Amy was excited to have her best friend in high school come over to help her. While Amy was getting ready to run, she started to feel sick. Amy was worried she was out of food and wasn't sure she had food in the fridge. When Amy got home, she discovered she had an unknown virus. When the virus was found, she called and got her best friend, Adam, to come help.
Mailbox. There was a mailbox at the library. I checked in it a few times. None of the packages was correct. I asked my boss. He gave me the wrong package.

All Too Common. Dennis is an obese man. He likes to eat fast food but doesn't like being skinny. Last week he saw a friend eating food at a restaurant. The friend said he could fit two sandwiches into one burger. This is what I say when I tell my friends to stop eating fast food.
Drinks. Bob had a craving for drinks. So he went to the store and grabbed some. But he couldn't decide what he wanted. So he was unable to find a drink. So he had to order another drink to try out.

darkness. The man noticed his dark hair. He realized he had just washed his hair. He started to comb it. He saw that the hair was very thick. He put it back on for a long time.
